Title: Alpha Blondy yasezeranye imbere y’Imana n’umunyamakuru ukora kuri radiyo ye
Body:
Seydou Koné waryubatse nka Alpha Blondy mu muziki wa Côte d’Ivoire yasezeranye mu rusengero n’umunya-Tuniziya Aelysa Darragi usanzwe ari umunyamakuru kuri radiyo ye ‘Bl Alpha Blondy FM’.
Seydou Koné waryubatse nka Alpha Blondy mu muziki wa Côte d’Ivoire yasezeranye mu rusengero n’umunya-Tuniziya Aelysa Darragi usanzwe ari umunyamakuru kuri radiyo ye ‘Bl Alpha Blondy FM’.
Muri Mata 2019 nibwo urukundo rwa Alpha Blondy na Aelysa Darragi rwashinze imizi ubwo bakoraga ubukwe bwa mbere gakondo. Muri Nyakanga 2019 aba babyaranye umwana w’umuhungu.
Ku wa Kane tariki 20 Gashyantare 2020 bakaba barasezeranye imbere y’Imana mu musigiti wa Riviera Golf.
Alpha Blondy yari asanzwe afite umuryango ndetse ibinyamakuru by’iwabo bihamya ko afite abana 11 harimo babiri bakorana mu buzima bwa buri munsi na batatu bihebeye umuziki nka we.
Alpha Blondy yabonye izuba ku wa 01 Mutarama 1953, avukira i Dombokro. Ni umuhanzi wiyeguriye injyana ya Reggae w’umuririmbyi n’umwanditsi w’indirimbo, yubatse izina mu gihe amaze mu muziki.
Indirimbo ze yazubakiye kuri Politiki n’ubuzima busanzwe, aziririmba mu ndimi zitandukanye zirimo; Dioula, Igifaransa n’Icyongereza rimwe na rimwe akanakoresha Icyarabu.
Alpha Brondy yakunzwe mu ndirimbo zitandukanye nka "Guerre Civile", "Jerusalem”, “Brigadier Sabari”, "Journalistes en danger" n’izindi. Mu bihe bitandukanye yagiye agera mu Rwanda mu bitaramo n’ibirori yabaga yatumiwemo nka Kigali Up Music Festival n’ibindi.
Amaze gushyira hanze album nka: Jah Glory! (1982), Cocody Rock!!! (1984), Apartheid Is Nazism (1985), Jérusalem (1986), Revolution (1987), The Prophets (1989), S.O.S Guerre Tribale (1991) n’izindi.

Title: Babou agiye gusubukura iby’umuziki nyuma yo kurangiza amashuri yisumbuye (Video)
Body:
Shema Arnaud benshi bamenye nka Babou nyuma y’uko arangije amasomo mu mashuri yisumbuye yahishuye ko agiye gusubukura iby’umuziki cyane ko yari yabaye abihagaritse kubera kwiga.
Shema Arnaud benshi bamenye nka Babou nyuma y’uko arangije amasomo mu mashuri yisumbuye yahishuye ko agiye gusubukura iby’umuziki cyane ko yari yabaye abihagaritse kubera kwiga.
Mu myaka yatambutse abagiye bakurikiranira hafi ibya muzika bamenye uwari umwana witwa Babou wamenyekanye cyane mu njyana ya Hip Hop.
Mu 2017 uyu musore yaje kuburirwa irengero mu muziki we gusa we ahamya ko byatewe n’uko yari ahugiye mu masomo.
Uyu musore warangije amasomo ye mu mwaka wa 2019 muri St Andre i Nyamirambo, aho yize imibare, ubugenge n’ubumenyi bw’Isi, akaba umwe mu bategereje amanota yavuye mu kizamini cya Leta yakoze.
Babou yatangiye umuziki afite imyaka umunani urukundo rwawo arukomoye kuri nyirarume Jerome Peterson wabarizwaga muri TFP Crew yari igizwe n’abahanzi batandukanye.
Avuga uko yinjiye mu muziki yagize ati” Nigeze kujya mu gitaramo cyarimo marume, ndeba uburyo baririmbye abantu bakishima dutashye mubwira ko mbishaka ansaba ko ngomba gutsinda neza mu mashuri abanza kugira ngo anyemerere kubijyamo. Mbaye uwa mbere icyo gihe nibwo yanyandikiye indirimbo aranayinkoreshereza.”
Babou avuga ko icyo gihe yafashijwe cyane na nyirarume ndetse n’itsinda ry’abo bakoranaga muri TFP.
Uyu musore yavuze ko ubwo yari agiye mu mwaka wa kane w’amashuri yisumbuye aribwo yahisemo kuba aretse iby’umuziki kugira ngo ahe umwanya amasomo ye.
Nyuma yo gusoza ibyo kwiga amashuri yisumbuye, Babou yabwiye IGIHE ko agiye gusubukura iby’umuziki ndetse mu gihe cya vuba azashyira hanze indirimbo ye nshya.
Kugeza ubu uyu musore aracyakorana bya hafi na nyirarume Peterson n’ubundi wamwinjije mu muziki.
Babou avuga ko umuziki w’u Rwanda kugeza ubu uhagaze neza, wateye imbere ndetse harimo amahirwe menshi yaba mu buryo abahanzi binjiza amafaranga ndetse n’ibikorwa remezo bituma abahanzi bakora neza mu buryo bworoshye.
Uyu muraperi wamenyekanye akiri umwana yashimiye buri wese wamubaye hafi akinjira mu muziki yaba abahanzi, abanyamakuru ndetse n’abakunzi b’umuziki bamuhaye icyizere cyabo, anabasaba kuzongera kumwakirana yombi mu gihe azaba agarutse.
Babou yamenyekanye cyane mu bwana bwe aho yafatwaga nk’umuraperi ukiri muto, aha akaba yari afite indirimbo zinyuranye zirimo iyitwa; Rimwe kabiri, Do it, Njye na Muzika yakoranye na Tuff Gang n’izindi nyinshi yaririmbye zirimo Arambona agaseka yaririmbye.
Babou yavuze ko agiye gusubukura umuziki
Njye na muzika Babou yakoranye na Tuff Gangs

Title: Nyampinga wa Botswana, Sudani y’Epfo na Ghana bitabiriye ibirori bya Miss Rwanda 2020
Body:
Oweditse Phirinyane wo muri Botswana, Rebecca Nana Adwoa Kwabi wo muri Ghana uyu wazanye n’igisonga cye cya kabiri Princess Owusua Gyamfi na Mariah Nyayeina wo muri Sudan y’Amajyepfo baraye i Kigali bitabiriye irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020.
Oweditse Phirinyane wo muri Botswana, Rebecca Nana Adwoa Kwabi wo muri Ghana uyu wazanye n’igisonga cye cya kabiri Princess Owusua Gyamfi na Mariah Nyayeina wo muri Sudan y’Amajyepfo baraye i Kigali bitabiriye irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020.
Usibye Oweditse Phirinyane Nyampinga wa Botswana yageze i Kigali ku mugoroba wo ku wa Kane tariki 20 Gashyantare 2020, aba bakobwa bandi bageze i Kigali mu bihe bitandukanye byo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 21 Gashyantare 2020 aho bitabiriye umuhango wo gutanga ikamba muri Miss Rwanda 2020.
Ku mugoroba w’uyu munsi nibwo Mariah Nyayeina, Nyampinga wa Sudani y’Epfo na we yageze mu Rwanda.
Uwanyuma wageze mu Rwanda ni Nyampinga wa Ghana, Rebecca Nana Adwoa Kwabi wabaye uwa gatanu witabiriye Miss Rwanda 2020.
Aba bose bahasanze Oliver Nakakande wo muri Uganda ndetse na Sylivia Sebastian wo muri Tanzania bahageze mbere y’abandi.
Miss Rwanda 2020 niyo ya mbere yitabiriwe n’abakobwa bo mu bindi bihugu.
Irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 riri kugana ku musozo, abakobwa bahatanira ikamba bari mu mwiherero mbere y’iminsi mike ngo hamenyekane uzegukana ikamba. Ubu basigaye ari 19, nyuma y’uko Ingabire Jolie Ange yasezeye mu irushanwa kubera uburwayi.
Amatike yo kwinjira mu birori bizatangarizwamo Miss Rwanda 2020 yamaze gushyirwa ku isoko, abayashaka bashobora kuyagura bifashishije Mobile Money (*182*8*1*333111#), Ecobank cyangwa bakayasanga kuri Camellia muri KBC, Keza Saloon no kuri Smart Design.

Title: Abakobwa bari muri Miss Rwanda bahishuye agahinda batewe na Ingabire wavuyemo kubera uburwayi
Body:
Hagati mu mwiherero wa Miss Rwanda 2020 nibwo umwe mu bakobwa bahataniraga ikamba Ingabire Ange Jolie yasabye ubuyobozi ko yasezera mu irushanwa kuko yari yahuye n’uburwayi bwamusabaga kuba kwa muganga akitabwaho ari mu bitaro.
Hagati mu mwiherero wa Miss Rwanda 2020 nibwo umwe mu bakobwa bahataniraga ikamba Ingabire Ange Jolie yasabye ubuyobozi ko yasezera mu irushanwa kuko yari yahuye n’uburwayi bwamusabaga kuba kwa muganga akitabwaho ari mu bitaro.
Tariki 17 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo ubuyobozi bwa Miss Rwanda bwatangaje ko Ingabire yavuye mu irushanwa kubera uburwayi.
Nyuma y’iminsi avuye mu irushanwa abakobwa bahataniraga ikamba rya Miss Rwanda babwiye IGIHE ko bababajwe n’uyu mugenzi wabo utarabashije gukomeza guhatana kubera impamvu z’uburwayi.
Benshi muri aba bakobwa bahishuye ko ryari ijoro ribi cyane igihe basezeraga kuri Ingabire. Bahamya ko bababajwe nuko ibyamubayeho ari impamvu zatunguranye kandi nta yandi mahitamo bari bafite.
Ikindi aba bakobwa uko ari 19 bahurizaho ni uburyo Ingabire yababaniye neza mu mwiherero ku buryo kuvamo kwe byabaye agahinda gakomeye.
Kirezi Rutaremara Brune umwe mu bahatanira ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020 yagize ati ”Jolie Ange sinzi uko namuvuga; aritonda, mu bantu nabonaga bashoboraga gutwara n’ikamba na we yari arimo. Kumva ko avuye mu irushanwa atari iyindi mpamvu ari uburwayi, njye ku giti cyanjye byarambabaje.”
Uyu mukobwa avuga ko bose byabababaje cyane ku buryo iyo baganira muri rusange basanga iyaba hari ikindi cyashobokaga bari kugikora ariko byarenze ubushobozi bwabo.
Teta Ndenga Nicole wiganye na Ingabire mu mashuri yisumbuye we yavuze ko yababajwe bikomeye nuko uyu mukobwa w’inshuti ye yavuye mu irushanwa.
Akaliza Hope yavuze ko Ingabire ari umukobwa wakundaga kubatera imbaraga kenshi kabone n’iyo babaga bari gukora ibintu bigoye akababwira ko we yumva ntacyo bimutwaye.
Aba bakobwa bose bababajwe no kuva mu irushanwa kwa mugenzi wabo bamusabira gukira akamera neza ariko kandi akanihanganira ibyabaye bamwibutsa ko atari ryo herezo ry’ubuzima.
Ingabire Jolie Ange yasezeye mu irushanwa nyuma yuko yari yaryinjiyemo atsindiye guhagararira Intara y’Amajyepfo.
Itike yakuye mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo niyo yamwinjije muri Pre-Selection, aha naho yahanyuranye umucyo bituma yinjira muri 20 berekeje mu mwiherero.
Uyu mukobwa yasezeye muri Miss Rwanda nyuma y’icyumweru yari amaze mu mwiherero uri kubera La Palisse Hotel i Nyamata. Kuri ubu abakobwa basigaye bahatanira ikamba bakaba ari 19.
Umukobwa uzambikwa ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020 uzasimbura Nimwiza Meghan ufite irya 2019, azamenyekana mu birori biteganyijwe kubera muri Intare Conference Arena i Rusororo mu ijoro ryo ku wa 22 Gashyantare 2020.

Title: The Ben yasinye amasezerano y’imikoranire na Onomo Hotel yiyemeje kumushyigikira mu muziki we
Body:
Mugisha Benjamin wamamaye mu muziki nka The Ben yasinye amasezerano y’imikoranire na Onomo Hotel yiyemeje kumushyigikira mu muziki we.
Mugisha Benjamin wamamaye mu muziki nka The Ben yasinye amasezerano y’imikoranire na Onomo Hotel yiyemeje kumushyigikira mu muziki we.
Aya masezerano yasinyiwe kuri Onomo Hotel iherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali, ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 21 Gashyantare 2020.
Umuyobozi wa Onomo Hotel i Kigali, Emile Nizey, yabwiye itangazamakuru ko bishimiye guha ikaze The Ben mu mikoranire bagiye kugirana.
Yavuze ko amasezerano bagiranye ashingiye mu gushyigikira uyu muhanzi mu bikorwa bye bya muzika yaba mu Rwanda no ku rwego mpuzamahanga cyane cyane mu bihugu 18 iyi hoteli ifitemo amashami.
Yavuze ko bazashyigikira bishoboka umuziki wa The Ben mu rwego rwo guteza imbere uyu musore nk’umuhanzi w’Umunyarwanda bifuza gushyiramo imbaraga kugira ngo arusheho gutera imbere.
Ku ruhande rwa The Ben we avuga ko azaba yamamaza anamenyekanisha ibikorwa bya Onomo Hotel.
The Ben yavuze ko yanyuzwe n’imikoranire yemeranyijeho na Onomo Hotel ndetse anayishimira gahunda nziza bafitanye.
Amasezerano ahuriweho n’impande zombi nta gihe cyashyizweho agomba kurangiriraho, ahubwo naba atagitanga inyungu zihuriweho azashyirwaho iherezo.
The Ben abajijwe niba hari amafaranga yahawe n’umubare wayo, yagize ati ”Amafaranga nibyo arahari ariko twahisemo kuyagira ibanga.”
Ku kijyanye no gukorana na hoteli iri mu Rwanda nyamara ubusanzwe yibera muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, The Ben yavuze ko ntaho bizahurira kuko uburyo azakorana nayo ari ibintu ashobora gukorera ahantu hose azaba ari.
Nizey yifashishije urugero mu gushimangira iyo mikorere yavuze ko ” Wenda hari igihe yajya muri Tanzania, Afurika y’Epfo n’ahandi dufite amashami. Iki gihe aba yizeye ko nta kibazo agira cy’aho kuba n’uburyo bwo kubaho kimwe n’ikipe ye. Tuzamufasha muri buri kimwe dushoboye.”
Mbere yo gusinyana amasezerano na Onomo Hotel, The Ben yijeje abanyamakuru ko abona ubu bufatanye buzamufasha mu iterambere rya muzika ye cyane ko bizanamufasha ku rwego mpuzamahanga bikagabanya ingorane yahuraga nazo.
The Ben yavukiye i Kampala muri Uganda ku wa 9 Mutarama 1988. Ni mwene Jean Mbonimpa na Esther Mbabazi. Ni uwa kabiri mu muryango w’abana batandatu barimo nka Danny Scott (na we wabaye umuhanzi, ananyura mu itsinda rya B Gun), Green P (umuraperi wamamariye muri Tuff Gangz) n’abandi.
Uyu muhanzi Nyarwanda uririmba injyana ya RnB/Pop. Yatangiye impano y’ubuhanzi abihereye mu muryango aho yakuze akundishwa n’ababyeyi be gusenga cyane.
Byatumye ajya muri korali aho yari ari kumwe n’abandi bahanzi bamenyekanye nka Meddy, Lick Lick na Nicolas.
Indirimbo yazamuye izina rye ni ‘‘Amaso ku Maso’’ yasohoye mu 2008. Izindi ndirimbo zizwi ni ‘‘Si beza’’ na ‘‘Mbwira’’ yahuriyemo na Tom Close; ‘‘Uzaba Uza’’ yaririmbanye na Roger, ‘‘Wirira’’, ‘‘Imfubyi’’ yahuriyemo na Bull Dogg, ‘‘Wigenda’’, ‘‘Uri he’’, ‘‘Sinzibagirwa’’, ‘‘Amahirwe ya nyuma’’ na ‘‘Zubeda’’.
Nyuma yaho yaje no gusohora indirimbo nka ‘‘Ese nibyo’’ mbere yo kwerekeza muri Amerika aho yakomereje ubuhanzi bwe.
Ubu akunzwe mu ndirimbo z’urukundo zirimo nka ‘‘Ko Nahindutse’’, ‘‘Urabaruta’’, "Ndaje’’, ‘‘Habibi’’, ‘‘Ntacyadutanya’’, ‘‘Only You’’, ‘‘I’m In Love’’, ‘‘Can’t get enough’’ yakoranye na Otile Brown wo muri Kenya n’izindi.
Ni umwe mu bahanzi bake b’Abanyarwanda babashije kwagura umuziki wabo ukamenyekana no mu bindi bihugu.

Title: Miss Rwanda 2020: Ibyo abakobwa bazakumbura mu mwiherero n’umushinga wa buri wese (Video)
Body:
Abakobwa 19 bari kurangiza umwiherero wa Miss Rwanda 2020 mu gihe bitegura umunsi wa nyuma w’irushanwa uzatanga Nyampinga w’u Rwanda wa 2020.
Abakobwa 19 bari kurangiza umwiherero wa Miss Rwanda 2020 mu gihe bitegura umunsi wa nyuma w’irushanwa uzatanga Nyampinga w’u Rwanda wa 2020.
Aba bakobwa babaye 19 nyuma y’uko mugenzi wabo Ingabire Jolie Ange atabashije gukomeza cyane ko yasezeye kubera uburwayi bwamutunguye bugatuma atabasha gukomeza irushanwa.
Aba bakobwa uko ari 19 bose twabasuye mu mwiherero tuganira ku bintu binyuranye birimo uko bari babayeho mu mwiherero, ibyo bazawukumburamo n’incamake ku mishinga yabo.
Mu biganiro n’aba bakobwa bose bahuriza ku kuba bazakumbura umwiherero wa Miss Rwanda kuko bari babanye neza, babayeho nk’umuryango.
Akaliza Hope yagize ati “Nzakumbura abakobwa tubana muri rusange, uko twasangiraga, uko twagendanaga mbega ni byinshi.”
Musana Teta Hense nawe uri mu bahatana muri Miss Rwanda 2020 yavuze ko azakumbura bagenzi be, ibiganiro bahabwaga n’ibindi.
Ati “Nzakumbura aba bakobwa twabanye, buri wese afite umwihariko we. Nzakumbura ibiganiro byari byiza. Kubona amahirwe yo kubona abayobozi batuganiriza nzabikumbura.”
Nishimwe Naomie na we yagize ati “Ikintu nzakumbura ni ugusangira nijoro n’abandi bakobwa ubundi tukaza kumva gahunda z’undi munsi turi kuririmba nzabikumbura cyane.”
Imishinga yabo
Ikirezi Rutaremara Brune yavuze ko afite umushinga wo gufasha abanyarwanda bafite ubumuga bwo mu mutwe. Ingabire Rehma we afite umushinga wo guteza imbere imibereho ya mwarimu.
Teta Ndenga Nicole yavuze ko afite umushinga wo gukangurira abanyarwanda n’urubyiruko guhinga ibiti by’imbuto. Akaliza Hope we yavuze ko umushinga we ushingiye ku gukangurira abana b’abakobwa kwitabira kwiga ubukerarugendo.
Mutesi Denise afite umushinga wo kugabanya umubare w’abantu badafite akazi mu gihugu cy’u Rwanda. Umutesi Denise umushinga we ni uguteza imbere uburenganzira bw’abaguzi.
Mutegwantebe Chanice afite umushinga wo guhuriza hamwe abantu batishoboye basabiriza ku mihanda mu rwego rwo kubafasha kwiteza imbere.
Nishimwe Naomie afite umushinga wo kurwanya ubwigunge mu rubyiruko. Musana Teta Hense we umushinga we ni ukurwanya kanseri mu Rwanda.
Umuratwa Anitha umushinga we ni ugufasha abana kubyaza impano zabo umusaruro cyane cyane siporo. Marebe Benitha umushinga afite umushinga wo kubaka ubushobozi bw’urubyiruko rufite ubumuga.
Irasubiza Alliance umushinga we ni ukurwanya inda z’imburagihe mu bana bakiri bato bari munsi y’imyaka 18.
Ingabire Diane afite umushinga wo kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge cyane cyane mu rubyiruko. Uwase Aisha we afite umushinga wo gukangurira abahuye n’ihohoterwa kutariceceka.
Mukangwije Rosine afite umushinga wo gushishikariza urubyiruko kwiteza imbere binyuze mu kwikorera.
Nyinawumuntu Delice we afite umushinga wo gushishikariza abana b’abakobwa kwiga siyansi n’ikoranabuhanga. Ingabire Gaudance afite umushinga wo gushishikariza urubyiriko kwitabira ubukerarugendo bw’imbere mu gihugu mu gihe Umwiza Phionah afite umusinga wo kurwanya ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina rikorerwa abana bari munsi y’imyaka 18.
Kamikazi Rurangirwa Nadege we afite umushinga wo kwita kubana bafite indwara izwi nka “Down Syndrome” no guhugura imiryango yabo uburyo babitaho. Ni indwara ifata umwana ukiri mu nda ya nyina. Ishobora gutuma umwana avuka hari uduce tw’umubiri tumwe na tumwe abuze cyangwa se mu mutwe he hadakora nk’ibisanzwe.
Kugeza ubu irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 riri kugana ku musozo abakobwa bahatanira ikamba bari mu mwiherero mbere y’amasaha make ngo hamenyekane uzegukana ikamba.
Aba bakobwa bari mu mwiherero bamaze kuvamo umwe cyane ko ubu basigaye ari 19 nyuma y’uko Ingabire Jolie Ange asezeye mu irushanwa kubera uburwayi.
Umukobwa uzambikwa ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020 uzasimbura Nimwiza Meghan ufite irya 2019, azamenyekana mu birori biteganyijwe kubera muri Intare Conference Arena i Rusororo mu ijoro ryo ku wa 22 Gashyantare 2020.
Kugeza ubu amatike yo kwinjira mu irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 yashyizwe ku isoko; abayashaka bashobora kuyagura bifashishije Mobile Money (*182*8*1*333111#), Ecobank cyangwa bakayasanga kuri Camellia KBC, Keza Saloon no kuri Smart Design.

Title: Abakobwa batabashije gukomeza muri Miss Rwanda 2020 bakomereje ibikorwa by’urukundo mu Karere ka Gisagara
Body:
Nyuma yo kwiyemeza kwihuriza hamwe bagakora ibikorwa by’urukundo, abakobwa 34 batabashije kurenga ijonjora rya nyuma (Pre-Selection) ry’irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 bakomeje gushyira mu bikorwa imishinga bari barateguye.
Nyuma yo kwiyemeza kwihuriza hamwe bagakora ibikorwa by’urukundo, abakobwa 34 batabashije kurenga ijonjora rya nyuma (Pre-Selection) ry’irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 bakomeje gushyira mu bikorwa imishinga bari barateguye.
Abo bakobwa bibumbiye mu itsinda “We for the Nation” kuri uyu wa Kane tariki ya 20 Gashyantare 2020 bakomereje ibyo bikorwa mu Karere ka Gisagara aho baganirije urubyiruko rw’abanyeshuri ku gukumira gusambanya abana ndetse no kurwanya inda z’imburagihe ziterwa abangavu.
Ni nyuma y’uko ku wa 13 Gashyantare 2020 basuye ikigo kirererwamo abana bafite ubumuga cya HVP Gatagara i Gikondo ho mu mujyi wa Kigali; aho baganiriye n’ubuyobozi bwabasobanuriye ibikorwa bihakorerwa buri munsi ndetse banagira umwanya wo kwifatanya n’abana baharererwa yaba mu gusangira ndetse no kwidagadurana.
Gaju Evelyne uhagarariye iryo tsinda yavuze ko bahisemo kuganiriza urubyiruko ku ngingo yo gusambanya abana no gukumira inda ziterwa abangavu kuko ari ikibazo gihangayikishije muri iki gihe.
Ati “Buri mukobwa muri twe yari afite umushinga we; uyu wo gukumira inda zitateganyijwe ni imwe muri iyo mishinga. Gusa ikibazo cy’abana basabanywa ndetse n’icy’abangavu baterwa inda kirahangayikishije ni yo mpamvu twiyemeje gutanga umusanzu mu kuzikumira tuganiriza urubyiruko.”
Kuri ubu itsinda “We for the Nation” rigizwe n’abakobwa 34 ariko abaje kuganiriza urubyiruko mu Karere ka Gisagara ni 10 kuko bagenzi babo bari mu bindi bikorwa birimo kwiga n’ibindi.
Mu Karere ka Gisagara baganirije urubyiruko rw’abanyeshuri biga kuri GS Saint Philippe Neri hamwe n’abiga kuri Saint Eugenie Smet aho bari bahuriye ku kibuga cy’umupira w’amaguru kuko ayo mashuri yombi yari yakinnye.
Igihozo Dianne watanze ikiganiro yagarutse ku ngaruka zo gusambanya abana no gutwara inda imburagihe, asaba urubyiruko kwirinda ibishuko bishobora kubashora mu busambanyi.
Yagize ati “Cyane cyane nkamwe b’abanyeshuri na twe twese akenshi hari igihe badushukishaga amandazi, bombo, amafaranga n’ibindi. Icya mbere ni uko abana b’abakobwa tugomba kumenya ko dufite agaciro tukirinda abadushuka.”
Yabibukije ko umukobwa usambanyijwe agaterwa inda bimugiraho ingaruka mbi zitandukanye bikamwicira ejo hazaza.
Ati “Muri mwe harimo abazaba Abadepite; Abaminisitiri cyangwa mukazayobora mu bundi buryo. Mureke twirinde ibishuko bitwicira ejo hazaza.”
Nyuma y’ibiganiro byatanzwe urubyiruko rwahawe umwanya wo kubaza ibibazo bitandukanye byibanze ku buzima bw’imyororokere.
Umukozi ushinzwe uburinganire n’iterambere ry’umuryango mu Karere ka Gisagara, Sewabo Vincent, ni we wabakiriye ashima ibikorwa byabo abizeza ubufatanye.
Ati “Ni byiza kuko biraza gutuma hari icyo twunguka mu kugabanya imibare y’abana bakomeje gusabanywa mu karere.”
Sewabo yavuze ko mu mezi 11 ashize mu Karere ka Gisagara hagaragaye abangavu bagera kuri 214 bari munsi y’imyaka 17 batewe inda imburagihe.
Urubyiruko rwagiriwe inama yo kudahishira abasore n’abagabo basambanya abangavu kuko babicira ubuzima bityo bakwiye guhanwa by’intangarugero kugira ngo abandi babonereho hatazagira utekereza kongera guhirahira asambanya umwangavu.
Gaju Evelyne uhagarariye “We for the Nation” yavuze ko bishimiye uko igikorwa bateguye mu Karere ka Gisagara cyagenze bityo byabongereye imbaraga zo gukomeza ibyo biyemeje.
Yavuze ko bashinze uwo muryango bagamije gukora ibikorwa by’urukundo nk’uko bari babyiyemeje ubwo bitabiraga irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 bityo biteguye no kwakira umufatanyabikorwa wese waza kubashyigikira.

Title: Niyo Bosco yasohoye indirimbo nshya yise “Ibanga”
Body:
Niyo Bosco umaze kubaka izina mu mitima ya benshi mu bakunzi b’umuziki w’u Rwanda kuri ubu yasohoye indirimbo ye nshya yise “Ibanga” ikurikira “Ubigenza ute?” uyu musore yaherukaga gushyira hanze.
Niyo Bosco umaze kubaka izina mu mitima ya benshi mu bakunzi b’umuziki w’u Rwanda kuri ubu yasohoye indirimbo ye nshya yise “Ibanga” ikurikira “Ubigenza ute?” uyu musore yaherukaga gushyira hanze.
Indirimbo “Ibanga” ya Niyo Bosco ikubiyemo ubutumwa bukangurira abantu kugira ibanga, agaragazamo ingaruka zikunze kuba ku bantu batarigira.
Mu nyikirizo y’iyi ndirimbo uyu muhanzi agira ati ”Ibanga ni igihamya cyemeza ko uri umwizerwa, kugira ibanga nibyo bishimangira ubupfura bwawe. Uko waba uri kose utagira ibanga amagambo uvugwa niyo menshi kurusha ayo avuga! Jya uvuga uziga […].”
Uyu muhanzi yakanguriye abantu kuvuga baziga, bakavuga ibyo babajijwe cyane ko n’umunyarwanda yaciye umugani ko akarimi kabi gasemera agasaya.
Niyokwizerwa Bosco wamenyekanye nka Niyo Bosco ni umusore w’imyaka 20 y’amavuko ukora umuziki ariko afite ubumuga bwo kutabona.
Mu kiganiro aherutse kugirana na IGIHE, Niyo Bosco yasabye abantu kutumva ko yaba akunzwe kubera impuhwe agirirwa ku bw’ikibazo afite ahubwo bakita ku mpano ye mu muziki.
Uyu wahereye cyera aririmba ariko atarabona ubushobozi, yaje kurabukwa n’umunyamakuru Irene Mulindahabi wamufashije kumenyekanisha impano ye mu 2019.
Nyuma yuko Isi yose ibonye impano iri muri uyu musore, abantu banyuranye biyemeje kumufasha, kuri ubu Niyo Bosco afite ikipe imufasha mu bijyanye na muzika ndetse no mu buzima bwa buri munsi.
Iyi ndirimbo ye nshya mu buryo w’amajwi yakorewe muri Uno Record ikorwa na Producer witwa Santana mu gihe amashusho yayo yafashwe akanatunganywa na Bagenzi Bernard uri mu bagezweho muri iyi minsi.
Reba indirimbo "Ibanga" ya Niyo Bosco

Title: Gisubizo Ministries na Gentil Misigaro bahuriye mu ndirimbo ihumuriza abihebye
Body:
Umuramyi w’Umunyarwanda ukomeye cyane ukorera muzika muri Canada, Gentil Misigaro yahuriye na Gisubizo Ministries mu ndirimbo nshya itanga ihumure ku bantu muri ibi bihe Isi itorohewe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Umuramyi w’Umunyarwanda ukomeye cyane ukorera muzika muri Canada, Gentil Misigaro yahuriye na Gisubizo Ministries mu ndirimbo nshya itanga ihumure ku bantu muri ibi bihe Isi itorohewe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Iyi ndirimbo nshya yiswe "Ntidufite Gutinya" ni iy’ ihumure ku bahuye n’ingaruka za Coronavirus n’abandi bose bari mu bibazo bitandukanye.
Hari nkaho ivuga ngo "Ntidufite gutinya habe na gato kuko ubuzima bwacu buri muri we, haba mu byago no mu makuba aturindisha imbabazi agira, kuba turiho ni ubuntu bwayo, kuba turiho ni imbabazi zayo."
Umuyobozi Mukuru wungirije wa Gisubizo Ministries, Runyambo Eddy, yabwiye IGIHE ko bari barifuje guha abantu ihumure no kubabwira ko nta handi barikura uretse ku Mwami Yesu.
 Yagize ati “Muri iyi minsi abantu bari mu rugo mu ngamba zafashwe mu kwirinda ikwirakwiza rya Covid-19 abantu benshi bafite ubwoba, hari abandi banduye baribaza uko bizagenda, ihumure nta handi riva ni ku Mana yonyine yaremye ijuru n’Isi. Niyo yonyine yavuze ngo yemwe abarushye n’abaremerewe nimuze munsange ndabaruhura."
Abajijwe impamvu bahisemo gukorana na Gentil Misigaro avuga ari ibintu bari barifuje kuva kera.
Ati “Ni umuramyi ukomeye kandi twifuje kenshi gukorana na we indirimbo, twatangiye kubitegura kuva batangiye gutegura igitaramo bari bafite mu Rwanda mu ntangiriro z’uku kwezi, igitaramo kimaze gusubikwa kubera COVID-19 twihutishije uyu mushinga cyane ko indirimbo yari ijyanye n’ibi bihe Isi iri kunyuramo byo kurwanya Coronavirus.”
Mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus yugarije Isi, Leta y’u Rwanda yashyizeho ingamba zitandukanye zirimo gusaba abantu kuguma mu ngo zabo, kwirinda guhura n’abantu benshi cyangwa kwegerana nabo nk’ibisanzwe, gukaraba ibiganza n’amazi meza n’isabune inshuro nyinshi n’ibindi.
Ntidufite gutinya ni indirimbo igizwe n’iminota ine n’amasegonda 13, amajwi yayo yatunganyijwe na Producer Boris na Bruce mu gihe amashusho yayobowe na Fleury Legend.
Itsinda rya Gisubizo Ministries ryamamaye mu ndirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana mu Rwanda no mu Karere ka Afurika y’Uburasirazuba. Ryamenyekanye cyane mu ndirimbo zirimo “Amfitiye byinshi”, “Mana uriho”, “Ndaguhetse ku Mugongo”, “Narababariwe”, ‘‘Halleluya’’ n’izindi.
Gisubizo Ministries imaze guhabwa ibihembo byinshi mu muziki birimo ibya Groove Awards Rwanda aho mu 2016, ryegukanye bitatu birimo icya Korali y’Umwaka, Indirimbo nziza y’Umwaka n’iyo Kuramya y’Umwaka ndetse mu Karere ryatwaye Groove Awards Kenya 2017 ryegukanye mu ruhando rw’andi makorali yo muri Afurika yo hagati n’iy’Uburasirazuba.
Izina rya Gentil Misigaro ryakunzwe binyuze mu ndirimbo zirimo ‘Biratungana’, ’Hano ku Isi’, ’Hari imbaraga’, ‘Yesu ndiye Dereva’, ‘Hano ku Isi’, ‘Buri munsi’, ’Iyo mbimenya’ n’izindi nyinshi zamaze kwinjira mu buzima bwa buri munsi bw’abemera Yesu nk’Umwami n’Umukiza wabo.
 	Reba hano indirimbo ya Gisubizo Ministries na Gentil Misigaro

Title: Ninah Musinga yiyongereye ku banyempano bakorera umuziki uhimbaza Imana hanze y’u Rwanda
Body:
Umuhanzikazi Ninah Musinga yinjiranye imbaraga mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana ashyira hanze indirimbo ye ya mbere yise ‘Ni igihe’ yanditse iturutse ku iyerekwa yagize.
Umuhanzikazi Ninah Musinga yinjiranye imbaraga mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana ashyira hanze indirimbo ye ya mbere yise ‘Ni igihe’ yanditse iturutse ku iyerekwa yagize.
Musinga ubusanzwe arubatse, ibikorwa bye bya muzika yabitangiriye aho abarizwa muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Gusa yemeza ko kuri we n’ubwo yatinze kubikora ku mugaragaro ngo abwirize Isi ubutumwa bwiza, iki ‘cyari cyo gihe cy’Imana’.
Ninah Musinga ku ikubitiro yashyize hanze indirimbo ye ya mbere yise ‘Ni igihe’ avuga ko kuyandika bitavuye kuri we ahubwo ari ihishurirwa yagize riturutse mu ijuru.
Ati “Njya kuyandika, ntibyavuye kuri njye nari ndyamye gato, mvuye mu ishuri nduhutseho ngo nsubire gusoma, ngira inzozi zidasanzwe nanjye zanteye ubwoba. Nibonye ndi ahantu ndimo kumesa ndi kumwe n’abandi twabanaga, mbasigaho ngiye kwanika imyenda ngera ahantu hari imigozi itatu ikoze mu nsinga imanitseho ingofero eshatu zera cyane sindabona ikintu cyera nkazo, zarushaga urubura kwera zari ingofero z’uruziga zari zitangaje cyane.”
Ngo yakomeje kuzibazaho ako kanya yumva ijwi rivugira inyuma y’uruzitiro rwari rukikije iyo migozi rimuhamagara rimubaza niba yitegereje uko izo ngofero zera.
Ati “Ryarabimbwiye rirakomeza riti urabona hari ikizinga wazibonaho? Narikanze nshaka kureba uvuze ibyo ariko sinamubona ndasubiza nti ‘nabibonye’, arambwira ati ‘genda ubwire abantu ko ari igihe cyo kwezwa no gutunganywa kuko nk’uko wabonye ziriya ngofero zera nta kizinga niko nifuzako bamera kuko benshi bibwira ko bejejwe nyamara buzuyeho ibizinga’.”
Ngo iryo jwi ry’uko azabwira abantu ubutumwa ryari rimaze kumuha mu kumusubiza rimubwira ko agomba guhimba indirimbo.
 Ati “Narabajije nti ubu se nzababwira gute aransubiza ngo genda ukore indirimbo uzayumva wese nzamugirira neza kandi uzabwire abantu ibyo wabonye ndetse ambwira amazina y’abantu bamwe nzi arambwira ngo abe aribo ba mbere nzayiha hanyuma nyigeze no ku bandi bose nzabasha kugeraho.”
Avuga ko ariyo mpamvu y’iyi ndirimbo ndetse akavuga ko ashima Imana ko iki aricyo gihe ishaka abantu ko bumva ubu butumwa bwiza kandi bukiza.
Ninah Musinga yatangiye kuririmba akiri muto kuko yakuriye mu muryango wa gikirisitu. Yabyirutse akunda amasomo cyane ari nako abikomatanya no gukorera Imana mu buryo bwo kuyiramya no kuyihimbaza.
 	Umva indirimbo ya mbere ya Ninah Musinga yise ‘Ni igihe’

Title: Barumviye baratabarwa! Icyo Bibiliya ivuga ku bakijijwe ibyorezo no kuguma mu rugo (Video)
Body:
Abemera Bibiliya bahamanya n’umutima wabo ko ijambo ry’Imana ari ukuri kuzuye. Niyo ivuga bikaba, yategeka bigakomera; ifite imbaraga ziri hejuru ya byose. Bemera ko mu bihe bikomeye ijambo ryayo ryitabazwa, iyo abahanga b’Isi batsinzwe rikifashishwa ndetse abemeramana ntibashidikanya ko rirema ikintu rikagikomeza.
Abemera Bibiliya bahamanya n’umutima wabo ko ijambo ry’Imana ari ukuri kuzuye. Niyo ivuga bikaba, yategeka bigakomera; ifite imbaraga ziri hejuru ya byose. Bemera ko mu bihe bikomeye ijambo ryayo ryitabazwa, iyo abahanga b’Isi batsinzwe rikifashishwa ndetse abemeramana ntibashidikanya ko rirema ikintu rikagikomeza.
Kuri ubu Isi ihangayikishijwe n’icyorezo cya COVID-19, cyatumye ibihugu bikaza ingamba zica intege ikwirakwira ryacyo. Iki cyorezo cyagaragaye mu Bushinwa mu Ukuboza 2019, umurwayi wacyo wa mbere mu Rwanda yahabonetse ku wa 14 Werurwe 2020.
Kuva icyo gihe Leta yakajije ingamba zo guhangana nacyo zirimo guhagarika ibikorwa bihuza imbaga nk’ibitaramo, guhagarika ingendo z’indege zitwara abagenzi no gusaba abaturage kuguma mu ngo zabo no kwirinda ingendo zitari ngombwa.
Ku bemera Bibiliya, indwara z’ibyorezo si nshya mu matwi yabo, hari izo babwirijwe, izo basomye ariko bamwe ni ubwa mbere babonesheje amaso yabo, ubuhanuzi bubasohoreraho.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Umuvugabutumwa muri ADEPR, Dusengimana Théophile, yavuze ko ibihe bibi bidakwiye gutera ubwoba uwatewe yiteguye.
Yagize ati “Kuva kera Abayisiraheli bahuraga n’ibyago, indwara zikaze nka mugiga, kagungu ni icyorezo, inzige, guhagurukirwa n’amahanga n’intambara za hato na hato byose byabaga ari ibyorezo.’’
Mu bihe by’amage, Abayisiraheli bahabwaga umuburo, rimwe na rimwe bagasabwa kuguma mu ngo kugira ngo bicishe bugufi, bitekerezeho, basenge batabarwe.
Yifashishije Igitabo cya Yesaya 26.20 havuga ko ‘Wa bwoko bwanjye we, ngwino winjire mu nzu yawe wikingirane, ube wihishe akanya gato kugeza aho uburakari buzashirira’, yavuze ko “Icy’agaciro kwari ukwita ku ngamba zagenwe.’’
Ubu u Rwanda ruhanganye na Coronavirus ndetse kuyihashya bisaba abarutuye kubahiriza inama zitangwa n’inzego z’ubuzima.
Dusengimana ukorera ivugabutumwa muri Paruwasi ya Kacyiru muri ADEPR, yashimye ingamba za Leta zo guhangana na Coronavirus.
Ati “Abaturage mbere yo kuba aba Leta, ni ab’Imana. Leta nayo yashyizweho n’Imana. Ibyemezo bifatwa ni Imana iba yabifatiye muri Leta. Buri muntu akwiye kumenya uruhare rwe muri iki gikorwa.’’
 	Nowa n’umuryango we 
Bibiliya igaragaza ko abantu bo ku bwa Nowa bakoze ibyangwa n’Imana ibarimbuza umwuzure kuko binangiye bakanga kumvira.
Dusengimana ati “Nowa yabaje inkuge avuga ibigiye kuzaba, abatarabyumvise bagereranywa n’abatumva umuburo wa leta uyu munsi. Abantu bo kwa Nowa, ntibumvaga ibyo avuga kuko hari haciye imyaka 40 imvura itagwa [bumvaga ari igisubizo kuri bo], yari atuye ku gasozi ndetse ubwato yategetswe kubaza bwari bunini cyane babona bigoye kubuterura.’’
Igihe cyarageze imvura iragwa Nowa n’umuryango we binjira mu nkuge [igereranywa n’inzu], urugi rurakingwa, abinangiye bararimbuka.
 	Abayisiraheli bavuye mu buretwa mu Misiri 
Abayisiraheli bari bamaze imyaka 430 mu buretwa mu Misiri, babuvuyemo nyuma yo kumvira itegeko ryo gusiga amaraso ku nkomanyizo z’umuryango [bakaguma mu nzu] kugira ngo Malayika natambuka urwo rugo rube rufite uburinzi.
Umwami Farawo yemeye kurekura Abayiisiraheli nyuma y’uko Malayika yishe abana bose b’imfura mu Misiri.
Ati “Ni urugero rugaragaza kumvira kw’Abayisiraheli. Na Coronavirus buri wese iramureba, niyo mpamvu agomba gushyira mu bikorwa imyanzuro ya Leta. Abayisiraheli barinzwe n’amaraso, uyu munsi turasabwa kuguma mu rugo.’’
 	Moridekayi yatabariwe mu rugo
Bibiliya ivuga ku nkuru y’Umuyuda Moridekayi wari wamanikiwe igiti cyo kubambwaho ariko akaza gutabarwa biturutse ku Mwamikazi Esiteri watakambiye Umwami ari mu rugo, akamubwira akaga ubwoko bwe bufite.
Itegeko ry’Umwami ryaje kwanzura ko Hamani ari we umanikwa ku giti cyari cyateguwe; hanyuma Moridekayi atambagizwa umujyi wose ku ifarasi.
 	 Umunyegiputakazi Hagari yaratabawe!
Hagari wari umuja yasenzwe na Aburahamu, ageze mu nzira yiyambaza Imana, nayo yumva gutaka kwe.
Aburahamu na Hagari babyaranye Ishimayeli, ariko uyu mugore yirukanwa kubera gusuzugura nyirabuja.
Dusengimana avuga ko “Imana yumvise kurira kwe, niko kumubwira ngo subira mu rugo, arongera asubira kwa Aburahamu na Sara. Hanze Imana yabonaga ko azahapfira.’’
 	Rahabu yatabariwe i Yeriko
Imana igabiza Abayisiraheli Kanani, hari indaya yahakiriye kuko yagumye mu rugo. Ubwo abagabo 12 boherezwaga gutata Kanani [igihugu cy’isezerano] hari indaya yitwaga Rahabu basezeranyije ubutabazi .
I Yeriko hari amoko arindwi yagombaga kurimburwa, kandi Imana yari yabibwiye Yosuwa. Rahabu wacumbikiye abatasi, yasabwe kuzashyira agatambaro ku idirishya ku buryo nibahagera bakakabona bizaba ikimenyetso ko ari muri urwo rugo.
Mu bandi Bibiliya igaragaza ko bakijijwe no kuguma mu rugo harimo Eliya wahagaritse imvura agahungira ku mupfakazi akanatungwa n’ibyo kurya bike yari asigaranye ndetse na Aburahamu, inshuti y’Imana yaburiwe guhunga umujinya w’Imana binyuze mu kuguma mu rugo.
Bibiliya yerekana ko iyo Abayisiraheli bahuraga n’ibyago, buri wese kuva ku Muhanuzi wabazaga Imana icyateye icyo kintu n’icyakorwa ngo kiveho, Umutambyi warebereraga idini n’Umwami [Igihugu] watangaga amabwiriza, bafatanyaga kubirwanya.
Iyo usomye mu 2 Ibyo Ku Ngoma 7:13-14 havuga ko “Nindamuka nkinze ijuru imvura ntigwe, cyangwa nintegeka inzige ngo zone igihugu, cyangwa ninohereza mugiga mu bantu banjye, maze abantu banjye bitiriwe izina ryanjye nibicisha bugufi bagasenga, bagashaka mu maso hanjye bagahindukira bakareka ingeso zabo mbi, nanjye nzumva ndi mu ijuru mbababarire igicumuro cyabo, mbakirize igihugu.’’
Dusengimana avuga ko “Coronavirus ishobora kuba ingamba za Satani ariko hamwe n’ingamba zo kuguma mu rugo, tukabibyaza umusaruro wo gusengera umuryango, itorero n’igihugu Imana ishobora kuyirukana inyuze mu bashakashatsi bagashaka imiti, mu gusenga cyangwa igakoresha uko abantu birinze.’’
Yasabye abantu kudahagarika imitima ahubwo bakizera Imana no kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda COVID-19.
Ati “Abanyarwanda bahumure, icyo Leta ibahatira si leta gusa kuko n’Imana irabibahamagarira. Nibamenye impamvu zo kuba mu rugo kugira ngo birinde, barinde n’ababo. Iyo ushyize mu bikorwa, amabwiriza ya Leta n’ay’Imana, yishakira igitambo.’’
Kuguma mu rugo harimo inyungu nyinshi cyane ko bibungabunga ubuzima bwa buri wese n’igihugu cyose kigakurwaho umutwaro wo kwita ku barwayi.
Abakirisitu bakwiye kuba icyitegererezo mu kubahiriza ingamba zo ‘Kuguma mu rugo’ cyane ko hari uburinzi budashidikanywaho n’umwanya wo kwibutsa Imana imirimo bakoze.
Video: Niyonzima Moses na Hakizimana Souke Olivier

Title: Ntiduheranwe n’igicucu cy’urupfu kuko Imana ntijya ikererwa!
Body:
Muri iki gihe cyo guhangana n’icyorezo gikomeye cya Coronavirus, ahantu benshi ubuzima busa nk’ubwahagaze. Mu mibereho isanzwe ya buri muntu hari ibyapfuye, ndetse na we ubwe hari aho yapfuye. Abantu bikingiranye mu nzu, biragoye kumva ijwi ry’umuturanyi, abantu baracecetse bameze nk’abapfuye.
Muri iki gihe cyo guhangana n’icyorezo gikomeye cya Coronavirus, ahantu benshi ubuzima busa nk’ubwahagaze. Mu mibereho isanzwe ya buri muntu hari ibyapfuye, ndetse na we ubwe hari aho yapfuye. Abantu bikingiranye mu nzu, biragoye kumva ijwi ry’umuturanyi, abantu baracecetse bameze nk’abapfuye.
Twiheranwa n’igicucu cy’urupfu. Iri jambo Nyagasani yaduteguriye ridukore ku mutima. Aragira ati “Ngiye gukingura imva zanyu mbavanemo mwebwe muryango wanjye, maze nzabagarure ku butaka bwanyu” (Reba Ezk 37, 12-14).
Nyagasani araduhumuriza, ngo agiye kuza adutabare maze atugarure mu byacu twavanywemo n’iki cyorezo kimeze nk’icyadutwaye bunyago.
Muri uko gutegereza ubutabazi bw’Imana, hari icyo dusabwa nk’uko tugiye kubizirikana twifashishije ivanjili ya Yezu azura Mucuti we Lazaro (Yh 11, 1 -45).
Imana ntijya ikererwa: Mu gihe Lazaro yapfaga, Yezu ntiyari ahari, baramushatse baramubura. Aho abonekeye abavandimwe b’uwapfuye (Marita na Mariya) baramubwira bati “Watinze, iyo uba hano Musaza wacu ntaba yarapfuye”.(Yh 11, 21.32). Nyamara nyuma yaje kumuzura, arongera abaho kuko Imana itajya ikererwa!
Nitugira ukwemera, tuzabona ikuzo ry’Imana: Marita abwira Yezu ati “Nubwo yapfuye bwose ariko n’ubu ngubu nzi ko icyo wasaba Imana cyose yakiguha. Ninjye zuka n’ubugingo; unyemera n’aho yaba yarapfuye azabaho” (Reba Yh 11, 22-25).
Ahandi Yezu aramubwira ati “ ariko sinakubwiye ko niwemera urabona ikuzo ry’Imana”. Aho Kugira ngo twicare dutegereje ibitangaza gusa, duce bugufi, maze nk’intumwa za Yezu tumusabe tugira tuti “Nyagasani, twongerere Ukwemera” (Reba Lk 17, 5-6).
Twibuke gukura mu nzira ibyatuma Nyagasani atatutugeraho ngo adutabare: Igihe Yezu ageze mu rugo, yabasabye kumwereka aho bamushyize no gukuraho ibuye (Yh 11, 33-39). Natwe Nyagasani aradusaba gukuraho ibidukingiriza kumubona: Icyaha, ubwoba, gushidikanya, agahinda, umutima utabona abakene n’ibindi.
Tumenye ko ibidashobokera abana b’abantu imbere y’Imana bishoboka: Igihe Yezu abasabye gukuraho ibuye ripfutse imva y’uwapfuye, Marita yaragize ati “ntibishoboka ndetse ubu aranuka kuko uyu munsi ari uwa kane” (Reba Yh 11, 39). Bavandimwe, natwe dushobora kugira duti “Ntacyo wakora Nyagasani, kuko byararangiye dore hashize amezi atatu bamwe, abandi ibyumweru bibiri ntawe ugera hanze”. Twongere twibuke ko Imana itabara nk’abantu, iyo isaha yo gutabarwa igeze Imana iratabara kuko ntijya ikererwa.
Twibuke gushimira Imana mu bihe byose: Bamaze gukuraho ibuye, Yezu ntiyahise yihutira gukora igitangaza cyo kuzura Lazoro ahubwo yarabanje azamura amaboko ashimira se uri mu Ijuru agira ati “Ndagushimira Dawe kuko wanyumvise kandi nsanzwe nzi ko unyumva”. (Reba Yh 11, 41-42). Natwe dushyire amizero yacu yose mu Mana.
Twiringire Imana kandi dufite icyizere gikomeye cyo gutabarwa ariko muri uko gutegereza, duhinduke tureke kugengwa n’umubiri ahubwo tugengwe na Roho w’Imana nk’uko Pawulo abitwibutsa (Rom 8, 8-9). Nk’uko Zaburi ya 130 ibidufashamo duce bugufi dusabe Imana imbabazi tugira tuti “Nyagasani tubabarire kuko uramutse witaye ku byaha byacu ntawarokoka, ariko rero tuzi ko usanganywe imbabazi kugira ngo tuguhoranire icyubahiro.”
Mana nziza, ngwino udukure mu mva zacu twikingiranyemo: imva z’urwango, imva z’ubugome, imva z’ishyari no kwikuza, imva z’icyaha n’ibyago, imva z’agahinda n’ishavu, imva z’ubwigunge n’ubwoba maze nk’uko wabirahiriye kuva kera utugarure ku butaka bwacu. Ku bwa Yezu Kristu Umwami wacu. Amen
Padiri Victor Amerika

Title: Kiliziya Gatolika yatangaje uburyo Pasika ya 2020 izizihizwa, kubatiza bikurwaho
Body:
Kiliziya Gatolika mu Rwanda, yatangaje ko kubera ibihe igihugu kirimo byo kwirinda Coronavirus, Pasika y’uyu mwaka wa 2020, izihizwa mu buryo butandukanye n’ubusanzwe, harimo ko ibikorwa bimwe na bimwe abakristu bazabikurikira ku maradiyo na televiziyo bari mu ngo zabo, imitambagiro, koza ibirenge, batisimu n’indi mihango ntibeho.
Kiliziya Gatolika mu Rwanda, yatangaje ko kubera ibihe igihugu kirimo byo kwirinda Coronavirus, Pasika y’uyu mwaka wa 2020, izihizwa mu buryo butandukanye n’ubusanzwe, harimo ko ibikorwa bimwe na bimwe abakristu bazabikurikira ku maradiyo na televiziyo bari mu ngo zabo, imitambagiro, koza ibirenge, batisimu n’indi mihango ntibeho.
Kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 24 Werurwe 2020, Inama y’Abepisikopi mu Rwanda yasohoye itangazo rihumuriza abakristu muri ibi bihe bya Coronavirus, ndetse inabatangariza imirongo migari y’uburyo Pasika yo kuwa 12 Mata 2020, izizihizwa.
Itangazo ryashyizweho umukono n’Umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Butare akaba na Perezida w’Inama y’Abepisikopi mu Rwanda, Musenyeri Philippe Rukamba, rigaragaza umurongo ibiro bya Papa byahaye Abepiskopi bazagenderaho mu bihe bya Pasika.
Ubusanzwe Pasika ni umunsi mukuru, abakristu Gatolika bafata nk’umutima w’umwaka bagenderaho bita “Umwaka wa Liturujiya” ndetse ukaba ufatwa nk’umunsi udasanzwe mu minsi mikuru bizihiza dore ko wizihizwa iminsi itatu.
Ibanzirizwa n’igisibo kimara iminsi 40 igasozwa n’umunsi mukuru wa Pentekosti. Iryo tangazo rivuga ko iyo minsi itatu yizihizwamo izagumaho kuko ari izingiro ry’ukwemera kwa Kiliziya Gatolika ariko ikizihizwa bijyanye n’ingamba zashyizweho zo kwirinda coronavirus.
Mu kwizihiza iyo minsi habaho ‘misa y’amavuta matagatifu’. Ku bijyanye no kwizihiza iyo misa, itangazo rigira riti “Hitawe uko mu gihugu bimeze, Umwepisikopi azashyira iyo misa ku wundi munsi. Byaba byiza bibaye nko mu ntangiriro za Nyakanga Mbere yuko dutangira iminsi y’itangwa ry’ubupadiri.”
Ku byerekeye iminsi nyabutatu, rivuga ko kubera ubuyobozi bwa leta n’ubwa Kiliziya babujije amahuriro, iyo misa izizihirizwa muri Kiliziya za Katedarali n’iza Paruwasi nta bakristu bahari.
Rigira riti “Mbere na mbere turabamenyesha ko muri Kiliziya Katedarali no muri za Paruwasi, Musenyeri n’abapadiri bakuru bazizihiza iyi minsi y’inyabutatu ya Pasika. Icyo gihe nta Bakristu bazaba bari mu Kiliziya.”
Abasaseridoti bazamenyesha abakristu isaha bizaberaho kugira ngo bifatanye nabo mu isengesho aho bari mu ngo zabo. Kiliziya itangaza ko Ikoranabuhanga ririmo Televiziyo y’u Rwanda na Radiyo Mariya n’izindi Radiyo na Televiziyo bizaba bitangaza icyo gikorwa bigafasha abakristu kwifatanya.
Ku wa Kane Mutagatifu, muri Kiliziya Katederali no muri kiliziya ya Paruwasi, abapadiri babishoboye bazizihiriza hamwe misa y’isangira rya Nyagasani nta Bakristu. Kiliziya ikavuga ko umuhango wo koza ibirenge utazakorwa kandi nyuma y’isangira nta mutambagiro uhari, isakaramentu rikazaguma muri Taberenakuro.
Ku wa Gatanu Mutagatifu, muri Kilizaya Katederali no muri za paruwasi, umwepisikopi cyangwa Padiri mukuru bazizihiza ububabare bwa Nyagasani na none nta bakristu bari muri Kiliziya. Mu isengesho rusange umwepisikopi akazasabira abarwayi, abitabye Imana ndetse n’abari mu gihirahiro.
Iryo tangazo rivuga ko Igitambo cya misa n’umunsi mukuru wa Pasika bizizihirizwa gusa muri Kiliziya za Katedarali no mu za paruwasi. Ku bijyanye no kwizihiza igitaramo ntibazacana umuriro mu ntangiro yacyo. Hazacanwa itara rya Pasika gusa nta mutambagiro uzaba, hakurikirero indirimbo y’igisingizo cya Pasika habone gusomwa ijambo ry’Imana.
Kuri Pasika ubusanzwe hamenyewere batisimu [umubatizo] ntabwo uwo muhango uzaba, itangazo rikavuga ko hazabaho gusubiramo amasezerano ya Batisimu gusa.
Itangazo riteganya ko ibyo bikorwa abakristu batazagiramo uruhare mu Kiliziya, birimo imitambagiro n’iminsi nyabutatu ya Pasika, umwepisikopi ashobora guhitamo ko bijya mu yindi minsi ‘nko mu matariki ya 14 na 15 Nzeri 2020’.

Title: ADEPR yanenzwe kunyunyuza imitsi y’abakirisitu bayo
Body:
Abantu batandukanye bakomeje kunenga Itorero rya ADEPR, ryasohoye itangazo ryereka abakirisitu baryo uburyo bakoresha mu gutanga amaturo muri iki gihe amateraniro yahagaritswe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, aho bavuga ko ari ugusonga abantu mu gihe cy’amage.
Abantu batandukanye bakomeje kunenga Itorero rya ADEPR, ryasohoye itangazo ryereka abakirisitu baryo uburyo bakoresha mu gutanga amaturo muri iki gihe amateraniro yahagaritswe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, aho bavuga ko ari ugusonga abantu mu gihe cy’amage.
Itangazo ryo ku wa 20 Werurwe 2020, ryashyizweho umukono n’Umuvugizi wa ADEPR, Rev Karuranga Ephrem, rigira riti “Nejejwe no kubandikira iyi baruwa ngira ngo mbagezeho uburyo bwo kwakira amaturo muri ibi bihe bidasanzwe Isi yose muri rusange n’u Rwanda by’umwihariko duhanganye n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.”
Rev Karuranga avuga ko ‘zimwe mu ngamba Leta y’u Rwanda yafashe mu rwego rwo kurinda ubuzima bw’Abanyarwanda harimo no guhagarika amateraniro y’abantu benshi, bityo mu rwego rwo korohereza abakirisitu gushyigikira umurimo w’Imana, mbandikiye iyi baruwa mbagezaho uburyo butatu bwatoranyijwe bwakwifashishwa’.
Ubwo buryo burimo gukoresha uburyo bw’umudiyakoni [agasanduku k’amaturo kaba mu rusengero. Gukoresha uburyo bwa konti yo muri Banki ya Paruwasi igahabwa abakiristu no gukoresha uburyo bwa Mobile Money na Airtel Money, itorero ry’akarere rigakoresha nimero rizahabwa n’ibiro bikuru, izo nimero zikamenyeshwa abakirisitu.
Ni icyemezo cyanenzwe n’abantu batandukanye aho Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Urubyiruko n’Umuco, Bamporiki Edouard, akaba n’Umuyoboke wa ADEPR, yavuze ko muri ibi bihe iri torero ritari rikwiye kwaka amaturo ahubwo ryagombaga gufata ku yo abakirisitu batuye rigafasha abakene baryo.
Bamporiki yanditse kuri Twitter ati “Mushumba wacu wa ADEPR, muri iyi minsi idasanzwe twari dukwiye gutekereza uko abashumba batunga intama, kurusha ko intama zatunga abashumba, kuko nizo zifite intege nkeya. Mubyiteho aho mubona bishoboka, mufashe abakene bo mu itorero ryacu. Tumaze imyaka dutura mukore mu kigega.”
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga ushinzwe Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, Amb. Nduhungirehe Olivier, yanenze amadini n’amatorero ashaka kungukira muri ibi bihe bya Coronavirus.
Ati “Muri iyi minsi twugarijwe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, ntabwo amadini n’amatorero yari akwiriye gushaka kubyungukiramo, asaba abayoboke bayo amaturo cyangwa icya cumi. Ahubwo ayo madini yari akwiriye gushaka uburyo yafasha abayoboke bayo batakibona ikibatunga kubera COVID-19.”
Uwitwa Ndayishimye Jean Claude yunzemo ati “Ni byo rwose Hon. Aya madini rwose akwiye kwiha akabanga. Bajyaga bavuga ko ari ubucuruzi (business) abantu bakabikerensa none birigaragaje. Nta tandukaniro n’abacuruzi bazamura ibiciro bitwaje ibi bihe turimo.”
Indi nkuru wasoma: Amadini yahinduye umuvuno mu misengere no kwakira amaturo y’abayoboke

Mubyiteho aho mubona bishoboka, mufashe abakene bo mu itorero ryacu. Tumaze imyaka dutura mukore mukigega. pic.twitter.com/PYcE9IFOqX

Title: Mwumvire Leta kuko iri gukorana n’Imana- Impanuro za Apôtre Gitwaza ku guhangana na Coronavirus
Body:
Umushumba w’Itorero Zion Temple Celebration Center, Apôtre Dr. Paul Muhirwa Gitwaza, yavuze ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus giteye inkeke bityo amatorero yose agomba gufata ingamba zo guhangana nacyo ndetse abayoboke bayo bagakurikiza ingamba zafashwe n’igihugu.
Umushumba w’Itorero Zion Temple Celebration Center, Apôtre Dr. Paul Muhirwa Gitwaza, yavuze ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus giteye inkeke bityo amatorero yose agomba gufata ingamba zo guhangana nacyo ndetse abayoboke bayo bagakurikiza ingamba zafashwe n’igihugu.
Ni ubutumwa yatanze ku mugoroba wo ku wa 14 Werurwe 2020, abunyujije mu kiganiro Isaha y’Agaciro kinyura kuri Radio na Televiziyo Authentic.
Mu butumwa yise “Ni gute itorero ryiteguye guhangana na Coronavirus (COVID-19)? busa n’ubwo yageneye amatorero ya Zion, Apôtre Gitwaza yasabye abanyamatorero gukurikiza amabwiriza atangwa na leta mu rwego rw’ubuzima bw’igihugu.
Yagize ati “Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ibyo irimo ivuga muri ibi bihe turasaba ngo abakirisitu mubitege amatwi. Mutega amatwi ibyo leta irimo ivuga abantu bagomba gukurikiza muri ibi bihe amatorero aho muri mwese…’’
"Mukurikire mwumve nibababwira ngo mukore gutya mukurikize ibyo kuko barakurikira buri mwanya ibirimo biba kandi na bo ni ababyeyi bafite impuhwe.”
Apôtre Gitwaza wasaga n’ubwira abayoboke b’itorero ayoboye yavuze ko aho ari hose atagomba gusobanya na leta mu guhashya COVID-19.
Yagize ati “Oya uyu mwanya mwumvire leta kuko irimo irakorana n’Imana ku kibazo cya Coronavirus, mukurikire amabwiriza atangwa n’igihugu. Nibababwira ngo ntimuterane mubyumve, nibababwira ngo muterane ariko mukoreshe aya masuku mubikore, nibababwira ngo amashuri abana banyu ntimuboherezeyo mubikore. Icyo bababwira muri ibi bihe ndasaba ngo mubyumve kandi mubikurikize kuko bayobowe n’umwuka wera muri iki gihe tutarabona umuti urambye ujyanye n’iki kiza.”
 	Gufatanya Kwizera no kwirinda
Apôtre Gitwaza yavuze ko bimaze kugaragara henshi aho abanyamadini basobanya na leta mu ngamba ziba zafashwe mu kwirinda ibibazo bitandukanye ahanini bakavuga ko babiyobowemo n’Imana.
Mu murenge wa Rusasa ho mu karere ka Gakenke higeze kumvikana abaturage badashobora kujya kwa muganga kubera imyemerere yabo bashingiraho bavuga ko Imana ariyo izabakiza kuko nta kiyinanira.
Ku baba bafite imitekerereze nk’iyi Gitwaza yavuze ko abantu bagomba gukaza cyane gusenga ariko bikajyana no kwirinda no kumvira leta.
Yagize ati “Ndabizi ko abarokore dukunda kwizera kandi kwizera koko kurakora. Dushobora kwizera tugasengera abarwayi bagakira ariko kandi si ko twese dufite uko kwizera hari ababikora bigana abandi hari n’abavuga ngo kanaka yabasengeye, hari n’abakirisitu bashaka ko abapasiteri babashyira ibiganza ku mutwe, ati ‘Pasiteri umwana wanjye yarwaye, ntamujyane kwa muganga akamujyana kwa pasiteri ngo munshyirirero ikiganza’. Ndabibasaba bakirisitu tugerageze gukoresha kwizera kwacu ariko tuguhuze no kwirinda, ntufate gusa kwizera kudafite ibikorwa.”
 	Kwirinda, ubwenge buva ku Mana
Gitwaza avuga ko kwirinda ari imbuto y’umwuka wera ndetse bikaba n’ubwenge buva ku Mana.
Muri ubu butumwa yageneye abayoboke b’itorero rye, yagize ati “Rero ndabasaba ngo ntimupfe kugerageza abashumba banyu, namwe bashumba ku bw’urukundo rw’intama ntugende ngo uyifate uyihobere uyikorakoreho n’amaboko nurangiza ukore no ku bandi bantu, oya. Ndabasaba ngo muri ibi bihe dufatanye kwizera no kwirinda.’’
 	Yesu ukiza indwara?
Gitwaza yasabye abayoboke ba Zion Temple ko kutitotombera Imana bayigerageza kuri Coronavirus.
Ati “Ndabizi hari uwavuga ati ‘ese none ibyo muvuga ngo Yesu arashoboye, Yesu arakiza ni ibiki? Kuki utubwira ibyo?’ Ntabwo Yesu yavuze ngo mureke kwirinda igihe cyose, yaravuze ngo dore mbohereje mu masega ariko mugire ubwenge, dore mbohereje ahantu hagoye mugire ubwenge mwirinde, ntabwo yababwiye ngo mugendane kwizera gusa, yaravuze ngo nimwirinde mugire ubwenge. Iki ni igihe cyo kugira ubwenge, iki ni igihe kidasanzwe. Rero ndabasaba bakozi b’Imana, bakirisitu kwizera kwanyu muguhuze no kwirinda.’’
Ikindi Apôtre Gitwaza avuga ko muri ibi bihe atari igihe cyo gutererana abarwayi ngo abakristu babavuge nabi bavuga ko ari ibihano by’Imana. Yabakanguriye gufasha umuntu wese warwara cyane cyane gufasha umuryango we mu bihe bikomeye arimo.
Ati “Kibe igihe cyo kwerekana urukundo nk’abakristu, igihe cyo gufasha.” Avuga ko nubwo bitemewe kwegera umurwayi wa Corona ariko abantu bagomba kuba hafi y’umuryango we bakamenya niba afite uko yivuza, icyo barya mu rugo n’ubundi bufasha.
Ikindi uyu muvugabutumwa avuga ko ibi ari ibihe byo kuba umuyoboro w’ihumure aho yakanguriye abayoboke b’itorero rye guhumuriza abafite ubwoba bose. Kandi ko bakwiye gushaka ijwi ry’Imana bakamenyya icyo Imana ivuga muri ibi bihe.
Uyu mugabura w’ijambo ry’Imana yakomeje avuga ko ibi ari ibihe byo guhamya imbaraga za Yesu n’urukundo rw’Imana.
Ati “Muri ibi bihe mubwire abantu ko Yesu yatsinze indwara, nimwerekane imbaraga za Yesu hejuru y’urupfu, imbaraga z’umuzuko n’urukundo Imana ikunda abantu. Mubwire abantu ko Yesu yaje muri iyi Si kuko Imana yakunze abantu.’’
 	Igihe cyo kwirinda ibihuha
Mu butumwa burebure Gitwaza yavuze ko abantu bagomba kwirinda ibihuha bitangazwa n’abantu batizewe ahubwo bagakurikira amakuru atangwa n’ibitangazamakuru byemewe.
Ati “Mureke kwirirwa mukwirakwiza ibihuha mwakuye kuri Youtube, Facebook no kuri internet. Ibintu bari kuvuga hari ibirimo amakuru menshi y’ibihuha, hari abarimo babeshya, benshi nimugende mukurikize ibiriho bivugwa ku miyoboro yizewe n’igihugu, amaradio y’igihugu, televiziyo y’igihugu n’ibindi bitangazamakuru byemewe ariko ntupfe gutoragura akantu kuri internet ngo nawe ugakubite ku rubuga. Ibihuha bizana ubwoba, ubwoba bugateza umutekano muke…”
Coronavirus yagaragaye bwa mbere mu Ntara ya Wuhan mu Bushinwa mu Ukuboza 2019, ariko igenda isakara ku Isi yose. Umurwayi wayo wa mbere yagaragaye mu Rwanda ku wa 13 Werurwe 2020, itahuwe ku Muhinde ukorera rimwe mu mashami y’Umuryango w’Abibumbye.
Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima, OMS, ryemeje ko Coronavirus ari icyorezo cyugarije Isi cyane ko imibare igaragaza ko abasaga 156,948 bamaze kucyandura, muri bo 5,839 cyarabahitanye mu gihe 75,939 babashije kuyikira.

Title: Ubugenzuzi bwagaragaje gusesagura, kunyereza no gucunga nabi umutungo muri ADEPR
Body:
Ubugenzuzi ku mikoreshereze y’umutungo ku cyicaro cy’itorero ADEPR, bugaragaza ko hagati ya tariki 1 Mutarama kugeza tariki 30 Nzeri 2019, habayeho gutanga amasoko binyuranyije n’amategeko, umutungo w’itorero ucunzwe nabi, gusesagura umutungo n’ibindi.
Ubugenzuzi ku mikoreshereze y’umutungo ku cyicaro cy’itorero ADEPR, bugaragaza ko hagati ya tariki 1 Mutarama kugeza tariki 30 Nzeri 2019, habayeho gutanga amasoko binyuranyije n’amategeko, umutungo w’itorero ucunzwe nabi, gusesagura umutungo n’ibindi.
Iri genzura ryitaye ku bikorwa byo ku cyicaro gikuru cya ADEPR ndetse no mu isomero ryayo. Ryitaye kureba niba ibikoresho biramba bibyazwa umusaruro uko bikwiye cyangwa niba bifatwa neza, kureba niba ibikorwa byatwaye amafaranga yaratanzwe mu buryo bwemewe n’ibindi.
Iri genzura ryakozwe n’abagenzuzi b’umutungo b’imbere muri ADEPR, ari bo Matabaro Evariste, Mukumburwa Joyeuse na Mukamurenzi Angelique.
Bimwe mu byagaragaye mu igenzura ni ibibazo n’amayobera ku cyuma gisya amabuye akavamo umucanga kiri mu Karere ka Bugesera (Crusher), aho cyari kimaze amezi 11 gikora ariko nta faranga na rimwe ryinjira mu isanduku y’itorero kandi cyaragombaga kwishyurwa miliyoni 9 Frw buri kwezi.
Muri iyi nyandiko y’ubugenzuzi IGIHE ifitiye kopi, abagenzuzi bavuga ko ‘bageze aho iki cyuma gikorera ntibahasange ugikoresha ndetse yari yabujije n’abakozi be kugira icyo bavuga yikanga ko hari amakuru baha abagenzuzi’.
Bati “Ibyo twari twaganiriye na bo ndetse n’ibyo twabonye kuri chantier biduhamiriza ko kuvuga ko crusher [icyuma gisya amabuye] itigeze ikora ari ibinyoma byambaye ubusa”.
Abagenzuzi bavuga ko mu mezi 11 nta musaruro iki cyuma cyatanze muri ADEPR kuko byavugwaga ko kidakora nyamara ariko bagikoraho barababwiye ko hari amasaha gikora ku munsi.
Bati “Ikimenyetso simusiga kigaragaza ko crusher ikora ni ikirundo cy’umucanga ukomoka ku mabuye yasewe cyakuzura nk’amakamyo abiri. Twabwiwe ko chemise ya moteur yamenetse mu Ukwakira 2019, bikaba bitumvikana uko yamenetse kandi crusher idakora”.
Muri iyi raporo y’agateganyo abagenzuzi bagaragaza amafaranga miliyoni 80 Frw, yaguze ikibanza cyanditse kuri Mukamuganga Judith kiri haruguru ya Dove Hotel, bakavuga ko ‘ni menshi cyane ugereranyije n’uko ibibanza nk’icyo bigurwa’.
Bakomeza bavuga ko ikindi giteye impungenge ari uko uhagarariye icungamutungo ugomba gusinya impapuro zose zemeza ko amafaranga akwiriye gusohoka yanze kubisinya nk’uwabigenzuye ko bikwiye.
Bati “Kugura ikibanza ku gaciro gahanitse cyane kuko ibibanza ku Gisozi bigurishwa hagati ya miliyoni 20 Frw na 30 Frw.”
Ubugenzuzi bugaragaza ko abayobozi ba ADEPR bafite abarinzi bishyurwa n’itorero kandi batabagenewe n’amategeko yaryo, ibi bigafatwa nko gusesagura umutungo.
Abagenzuzi bati “Kurihira abayobozi abo kubararira (abacunga umutekano bane ba EASCO), bakishyurwa binyuze muri EASCO ariko icyemezo kibibemerera ntacyometse aho bishyuriye...hakwiye kugaragazwa inyandiko isinye ibahesha izo avantage zo kurarirwa”.
Ubugenzuzi bugaragaza kandi abayobozi bahabwa amafaranga yo mu butumwa ariko ntihagaragare inyandiko y’ubutumwa [ordre de mission], na raporo y’ubwo butumwa, ibi bituma bifatwa nko gusesagura umutungo no kuwunyereza.
Kuri iyi ngingo hari urugero rwa 2 237 000 Frw yahawe Rev. Ntaganda Jean Paul yo kujya mu rugendo rw’iminsi icyenda muri Uganda ariko nta nyandiko y’ubutumwa ihari igaragaza ko uru rugendo rwakozwe nta na raporo y’urugendo ihari.
Hari kandi 185 000 Frw yahawe Karangwa John adafite inyandiko y’ubutumwa yatangiweho, ibi bigatuma abagenzuzi bavuga ko ashobora kuba atarakoze icyo yasabiwe kubera ko nta kigaragaza ko cyakozwe kandi cyagombye kuba gihari.
Ku micungire mibi y’umutungo, hari imodoka zaheze mu gishanga ubu zikaba ziri hanze aho basenye i Gikondo.
Abakoze ubugenzuzi barirukanywe
Abakoze ubugenzuzi mu gusoza bavuze ko ‘kubera ko gukora ubugenzuzi ku cyicaro cya ADEPR bisa nk’aho bibangamira ubuyobozi bwa ADEPR, turifuza ko bwajya bukorana n’abo hanze ariko batahawe isoko n’abo baje kugenzura.’
Bagaragaje kandi ko mu bugenzuzi bwabo bahuye n’ukunanizwa n’Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa ADEPR, Rev. Gatemberezi Paul, aho basabwaga gukora ubugenzuzi bw’ibintu bimaze imyaka ibiri bagahabwa umunsi umwe.
Mu bagenzuzi batatu bakoze ubugenzuzi, babiri bahagaritswe mu kazi ndetse bahabwa n’inyandiko z’integuza yo gusesa amasezerano yabo. Amakuru agera kuri IGIHE ni uko ibi byakozwe nyuma yo kubasaba kuvuguruza ibyavuye mu bugenzuzi bakoze abandi bakabyanga.
Inenge mu bugenzuzi
Umuvugizi wa ADEPR, Rev. Past Karuranga Ephrem, yabwiye IGIHE ko ubu bugenzuzi batabwemera kubera inenge bufite.
Ati “Inenge ya mbere, basohoye ibintu ariko abo bagombaga kubaza ntabwo bababajije, ikindi cya kabiri bahuje ibibazo bari bafitanye n’umuntu ku giti cye cyangwa se mu kazi, babihuza n’uko na byo ari igenzura (audit)”.
“Icya gatatu ni uko ari njye bagombaga kubiha no kumbaza uko bimeze, nanjye nagiye kubona mbona byarasohotse ntazi uko bimeze. Ntabwo bigeze bambwira ikibazo na kimwe bahuye na cyo”.
Ku kuba babiri muri batatu bakoze ubugenzuzi barahawe integuza yo gusesa amasezerano yabo, Rev. Past Karuranga avuga ko ‘Ntaho bihuriye kuko ibyo bagaragaje nta n’ikibazo gihari ahubwo ni uko nyuma y’aho bakomeje kugira imyitwarire mibi no kubagira inama ntibazumve, hanyuma duhitamo gusesa amasezerano ariko ibyo gusesa amasezerano dukurikije ubugenzuzi ntabwo ari byo’.

Title: Papa Francis yasubitse umwiherero kubera ibicurane
Body:
Papa Francis kuri iki Cyumweru yatangaje ko yahagaritse umwiherero w’amasengesho yateganyaga kugirira mu Majyepfo y’i Roma kubera ko arwaye ibicurane.
Papa Francis kuri iki Cyumweru yatangaje ko yahagaritse umwiherero w’amasengesho yateganyaga kugirira mu Majyepfo y’i Roma kubera ko arwaye ibicurane.
Uyu mukambwe w’imyaka 83 yabwiye abakiristu bari bateraniye i Vatican mu rubuga rwitiriwe Mutagatifu Petero, ko uwo mwiherero w’iminsi itandatu yateganyaga atakiwugiyemo.
Yagize ati “Kubw’amahirwe make, ibicurane byambujije kuzawujyamo uyu mwaka.”
Gusubika uyu mwiherero Papa yagombaga gutangira kuri iki Cyumweru, bije mu gihe u Butaliyani buhanganye n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus gikomeje guhitana benshi ku Isi.
Kugeza kuri iki Cyumweru, abantu basaga igihumbi bari bamaze kugaragaraho ibimenyetso by’iyo ndwara mu Butaliyani.
Papa nawe byari byatangiye guhwihwiswa ko yanduye coronavirus nyuma yo kugaragara abira ibyunzwe mu ruhame, ariko ubuyobozi bwa Vatican bwabinyomoje.
Umuvugizi wa Papa yabwiye Ibiro Ntaramakuru by’Abafaransa, AFP ko nta kibazo gikanganye Papa afite, ko ari uburwayi busanzwe.
AFP ivuga ko Papa yagaragaye i Vatican akomeye nubwo yakoroye inshuro ebyiri ubwo yari imbere y’imbaga y’abakirisitu.
Abantu 29 bamaze gupfa mu Butaliyani mu gihe abandi 105 bari kwitabwaho n’abaganga mu buryo bwihariye.

Title: Abahoze bayobora ADEPR bihannye umucamanza kubera gusubika urubanza kenshi
Gitwaza yaguze urusengero rwa miliyoni 8 $ muri Amerika
Body:
Itorero rya Zion Temple Celebration Centre ryaguze urusengero muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu Mujyi wa Dallas rwa miliyoni umunani z’amadolari zizishyurwa mu gihe cy’imyaka itanu.
Itorero rya Zion Temple Celebration Centre ryaguze urusengero muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu Mujyi wa Dallas rwa miliyoni umunani z’amadolari zizishyurwa mu gihe cy’imyaka itanu.
Uru rusengero rwari rusanzwe ari urw’umuvugabutumwa ukomeye wo muri Amerika witwa Mike Murdock. Yari asanzwe yararushyize ku isoko mu cyamunara nk’uko bigaragara ku mbuga za internet.
Amakuru avuga Umushumba w’Itorero Zion Temple, Apôtre Dr Paul Gitwaza yaje kumenya ko Murdock ari kugurisha uru rusengero, yuririra ku bushuti bari bafitanye, amusaba ko yarugura kugira ngo Zion Temple ariho izajya isengera dore ko hari amakuru avuga ko ari narwo rushobora kuba icyicaro gikuru cy’iri torero.
Bivugwa ko ngo Gitwaza yasabye Murdock kumudohorera akarumuhera ku mafaranga make, undi yemera gukura agaciro karwo kuri miliyoni 13 z’amadolari yemera ko arwegukana ku nguzanyo ya miliyoni umunani z’amadolari izishyurwa mu gihe cy’imyaka itanu.
Mu materaniro yabaye kuri iki Cyumweru muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Gitwaza yashimiye abakirisitu b’itorero rye muri Amerika mu gihe cy’umwaka rimaze rihakorera.
Yavuze ko muri icyo gihe, ryari rimaze kwimuka inshuro ebyiri ariko “ubwa gatatu tuzabayo burundu’.
Aha niho yahereye ahishura iby’igurwa ry’urwo rusengero ati “Kandi uwabigizemo uruhare ni umubyeyi Dr Murdock”.
Yavuze ko uyu Murdock yabwiwe n’Imana ko urwo rusengero akwiye kurureka ariko ko akaruha umuntu Imana izamushyira ku mutima.
Ati “Bamuhaye amafaranga miliyoni 13 z’amadolari, njye yarabimbwiye ngira ngo ni inkuba zikubise mu matwi, nagize ukwizera guke ariko nabisabiye imbabazi. Arambwira ati wowe ndumva iyi nzu Imana yambwiye ngo nyiguhe, anshyira mu mutego arambwira ngo urampa angahe ndananirwa, natashye ntavuze.”
“Namubwiye ayo nshobora kumuha bwa mbere ariko sinayavuga hano kuko ateye isoni, ariko nyuma […] ndabaza, ngisha inama, nandikira n’inshuti yanjye nti nakoze ishyano. Irambwira iti ntutinye Murdock ni umubyeyi.”
Ngo yabajije iyo nshuti ye niba ashobora kuba yakongera kuvuga ayo yakwishyura, imubwira ko yabikora nta kibazo. Ati “Turandika, musaba ko yahaduhera kuri miliyoni umunani. Umubyeyi ntiyanze. Abandi bamuhaye miliyoni 13, akuraho miliyoni eshanu! Mwibaze.”
Gitwaza yavuze ko yabwiye Murdock ko nta mafaranga afite, ko ashobora kuba yakwishyura mu myaka itanu, undi nawe amubwira ko nta kibazo.
Ati “Ndamubwira nti nanjye ngiye gukora, imyaka itanu ntizagera.”
Yavuze ko abakirisitu ba Zion Temple n’Imana aribo bazatuma bigerwaho bityo kuko bari bamaze igihe basembera mu bukode.
Murdock wari witabiriye ayo materaniro ngo yemereye Gitwaza ko azamufasha mu bikorwa byo gukusanya amafaranga agamije kwishyura iri deni. Muri ayo masengesho, abakirisitu bitanze ibihumbi 250 by’amadolari.
Urwo rusengero rufite buri kimwe cyose nkenerwa ku itorero, nk’icyumba cyo gusengeramo, ibiro, ibyumba bito byo kwigiramo n’iby’inama, icyumba cya televiziyo n’ibindi.
Zion Temple yatangiye mu 1999, ku itariki 11 Nyakanga bigizwemo uruhare n’abantu 120.
Inkuru wasoma: Apôtre Gitwaza yahishuye byinshi: Ubuhanuzi, amadini, ikiganiro gikomeye n’intumwa ya Papa n’ibindi (Video)
Amafoto agaragaza uru rusengero ruherereye Denton muri Leta ya Dallas

Title: Abanyarwanda babaye aba mbere mu irushanwa ryo gusoma Korowani
Body:
Nshimiyimana Saidi w’imyaka 18 na Zigabe Muhamad w’imyaka 18, babaye aba mbere mu kurushanwa gusoma korowani, ni irushanwa ryabereye muri Kenya.
Nshimiyimana Saidi w’imyaka 18 na Zigabe Muhamad w’imyaka 18, babaye aba mbere mu kurushanwa gusoma korowani, ni irushanwa ryabereye muri Kenya.
Ryari ryitabiriwe n’ibihugu icyenda ari byo; Kenya, Tanzania, Djibouti, Ethiopia, Burundi, Sudani y’Epfo, Uganda, Somalia n’u Rwanda.
Nshimiyimana Saidi wabaye uwa mbere mu cyiciro cy’abazi korowani yose mu mutwe yahembwe ibihumbi 7$ mu gihe Zigabe Muhamadi, warushanyijwe amajuzu 20 yahawe 5000$.
Aba bana babwiye IGIHE ko bishimye cyane ndetse amafaranga bahawe azabafasha mu buzima bwabo cyane.
Nshimiyimana Saidi yagize ati “Nabyakiriye neza kandi nishimye cyane kuko aya mafaranga natsindiye agiye kumfasha mu myigire yanjye no muri gahunda z’iterambere ryanjye.”
Yakomeje avuga ko yizeye ko nawe agiye guteza imbere ubuzima bwe bugahinduka bitewe n’ibihumbi 7$ yahawe.
Zigabe na we yemeza ko amafaranga yahawe azayifashisha mu kwiyishyurira ishuri.
Ati “Aya mafaranga agiye kumfasha mu myigire kuko amafaranga iyo atagufashije mu ishuri ntabwo aba yarakugiriye akamaro.”
Yakomeje avuga ko nta kintu cyamushimishije nk’uburyo batsinze abantu baturuka mu bihugu byitwa ibya kiyisilamu.
Mufti w’u Rwanda, Hitimana Salim, yashimiye aba bana anashimangira ko intsinzi yabo ari iy’abanyarwanda bose kuko bari bahagarariye igihugu.
Ati “Ni gikorwa gikomeye cyane by’umwihariko ku bayisilamu no ku gihugu muri rusange kuko bagiye bagihagarariye n’ubwo basomaga korowani, ni ishema mu gihugu cyose kandi nibaza ko ari igikorwa gikwiye gushimwa na buri wese.”
Mufti Hitimana yongeyeho ko ibihembo nk’ibi bifasha imiryango ya kiyislamu gutera imbere kuko nk’umwaka ushize mu miryango y’abayisilamu hinjiyemo miliyoni zirenga 100 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda zagiye zegukanwa n’abana bitabiriye amarushanwa yo gusoma korowani mu bihugu bitandukanye.

Title: Abashakanye n’abitegura kurushinga bateguriwe igiterane kiziga ku kibazo cy’ingo zisenyuka
Body:
Umuryango utanga ubujyanama ku miryango cyane cyane ibanye mu makimbirane, River Ministry, ugiye guhuriza hamwe abashakanye n’abitegura kurushinga mu giterane kigamije kuganira ku kubaka ingo zigakomera cyane ko inyinshi zisenyuka buri munsi cyangwa bikaviramo ba nyirazo kwicana.
Umuryango utanga ubujyanama ku miryango cyane cyane ibanye mu makimbirane, River Ministry, ugiye guhuriza hamwe abashakanye n’abitegura kurushinga mu giterane kigamije kuganira ku kubaka ingo zigakomera cyane ko inyinshi zisenyuka buri munsi cyangwa bikaviramo ba nyirazo kwicana.
Iki giterane gifite insanganyamatsiko igira iti ‘‘Ukuri n’amahoro mu bashakanye’’ cyateguwe n’Umuyobozi wa River Ministry, Mukabaramba Jacky afatanyije n’umugabo we.
Giteganyijwe kubera kuri Kigali Convention Centre ku wa 14 Gashyantare 2020, aho kizatangira saa kumi n’imwe n’igice z’umugoroba.
Abazacyitabira bazaganirizwa n’Umuyobozi wa Evangelical Restoration Church ku Isi, Apôtre Joshua Ndagijimana Masasu n’umufasha we Pasiteri Lydia Masasu. Aba bombi baheruka kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka 30 bamaze babana nk’umugabo n’umugore mu birori byabaye mu Ukuboza 2019.
Iki giterane cyahuriranye n’Umunsi w’Abakundana, cyanatumiwemo abahanzi bagezweho barimo James na Daniella bakunzwe cyane mu ndirimbo “Mpa amavuta”, “Nkoresha” n’izindi n’abandi barimo Arsene Tuyi waririmbye “Naranyuzwe”, “Icyaremwe gishya” ndetse na Irimbere Christian ugezweho mu yitwa “Obligado” na “Ndi hano”.
Umuyobozi wa The River Ministry, Mukabaramba akaba n’umwanditsi w’ibitabo yabwiye IGIHE ko yahisemo gutegura iki gikorwa bitewe n’izamuka ry’ingo zisenyuka.
Uyu mubyeyi wanditse igitabo “Izahabu ihishe mu muryango” ni na we uyobora abagore kuri Restoration Church Masoro. Yagize iyerekwa ashaka kongera guhuriza hamwe abashakanye n’abandi bari mu nzira yo kurwubaka kugira ngo baganire uko bakubaka ingo zihamye zubakiye ku rufatiro rutanyeganyezwa.
Imibare y’inkiko igaragaza ko gatanya zizamuka ubutitsa kuko kugeza mu Ugushyingo 2018, hari hamaze gucibwa imanza za gatanya 1311, ni ubwikubwe bw’inshuro 19 ugereranyije n’umwaka wa 2017.
Imibare igaragaza ko mu 2016 ingo zatandukanye zari 21, mu 2017 ziba 69; yerekana ko gatanya zikubye inshuro 62 bingana na 6,200% mu myaka itatu ishize.
ERC ni itorero rishingiye ku musingi wo kubaka umuryango uhamye, aho imfubyi ibonera umubyeyi, umupfakazi akagira umwitaho. Ihishurirwa ryo kuritangiza Apôtre Masasu yarihawe mu 1984, aza kurishinga mu 1994.
Amafaranga yo kwinjira muri iki giterane ku bashakanye ni 30 000 Frw ku bagura amatike mbere naho abazayagura uwo munsi ni 35 000 Frw; itike ku muntu umwe ni 15 000 Frw ariko izazamurwa ku 20 000 Frw.

Title: Inkomoko y’umusaraba wifashishwa cyane mu madini ya Gikirisitu
Body:
Inkomo y’umusaraba ukunze gukoreshwa cyane mu madini yemera Yezu Kirisitu nk’umucunguzi ntikunze kuvugwaho rumwe n’abantu batandukanye ndetse bamwe bakavuga ko ari ikimenyetso cya Gipagani kurusha uko waba icya Gikirisitu.
Inkomo y’umusaraba ukunze gukoreshwa cyane mu madini yemera Yezu Kirisitu nk’umucunguzi ntikunze kuvugwaho rumwe n’abantu batandukanye ndetse bamwe bakavuga ko ari ikimenyetso cya Gipagani kurusha uko waba icya Gikirisitu.
Ku madini aha agaciro cyane umusaraba ndetse akawufata nk’ikimenyetso cy’ibanze kiranga imyemerere yabo, bashingira ku kuba ari wo Yezu/Yesu Kirisito yabambweho bityo ukaba ari ikimenyetso cy’ugucungurwa kwabo.
Ibimenyetso byinshi biri mu nzu ndangamurage y’Abongereza birimo ibigaragaza Imana kazi y’Abagiriki ba kera iri iruhande rw’Umusaraba byerekana ko umusaraba wabayeho ibinyejana byinshi mbere y’ivuka ry’amadini ya Gikirisitu ndetse bikemezwa ko ufite inkomoko mu Abanya-Babuloni ba kera mbere y’uko ukwira mu bindi bice by’Isi.
Umusaraba wa mbere y’Ubukirisitu wakoreshwaga nk’ikimenyetso mu madini gakondo y’Abanyamisiri, Abanya-Syria n’Abagiriki.
Uyu musaraba wa mbere wari mu bwoko bubiri uzwi nka ‘Tau Cross’ wabaga ukoze nk’inyuguti nkuru ya T’ yo mu Kigiriki ndetse n’undi witwaga ‘fylfot cross’.
Uyu musaraba wa Tau niwo wakoreshwaga cyane n’abapagani gusa nyuma uza gutangira gukoreshwa n’Abakirisitu bo mu Misiri.
Umusaraba waje kuba gute ikimenyetso gikomeye kiranga Abakirisitu ?
Mu kinyejana cya 4, Umwami w’Abami Constantine yemeye Ubukirisitu ndetse yemeza ko hakwiye gushakishwa ahantu hari n’ibintu bifite amateka y’ingenzi mu buzima bwa Yezu.
Muri iki gikorwa cyo kuvumbura ahantu hafite amateka ku buzima bwa Yezu nibwo hamenyekanye amakuru ko Nyina wa Costantine witwaga Helene yavumbuye ibice by’umusaraba, ndetse biza kwemezwa ko ari iby’umusaraba wa Yezu kuko habaye igitangaza cy’uko ubwo byavumburwaga hari umugore wabikozeho arakira.
Kuva icyo gihe kubambwa kwa Yezu no gupfira ku musaraba byatanze isura nshya ku musaraba kuko gusa watangiye kwifashishwa mu nsengero ndetse nyuma ya Costantine ugirwa ikimenyetso kiranga Ubukirisito.
N’ubwo kugeza uyu munsi amadini menshi afata umusara nk’ikimenyetso gikomeye kuko ari wo Yezu yabambweho, hari andi makuru avuga ko Icyo Yesu Kirisito yabambweho ari igiti gisanzwe cy’Inginga aho kuba umusaraba.
Izi mpaka z’icyo Yesu yaba yabambweho mu by’ukuri ntizigarukira mu nyigisho z’amadini gusa kuko na Bibiliya iyo zigeze ku murongo uvugamo umusaraba ziranyuranya.
Bibiliya ntagatifu ikunze gukoreshwa cyane muri Kiliziya Gatolika,ivuga ko igihe Yezu Yesu yicwaga, abamwitegerezaga baramunnyeze, maze bamushinyagurira bamusaba ko niba afite ubushake yakwikura kumusaraba.
Hari aho igira iti “Wowe usenya Ingoro y’Imana, ukongera kuyubaka mu minsi itatu, ikize ubwawe niba uri Umwana w’Imana, maze umanuke ku musaraba. Abatware b’abaherezabitambo na bo bakamuseka, n’abigishamategeko, n’abakuru b’umuryango, bati ‘Yakijije abandi, none ntashoboye kwikiza ubwe!’Harya ngo ni Umwami wa Israheli, ngaho namanuke ku musaraba tumwemere!”.
Ibi Bibiliya ntagatifu ivuga ibihuza na Bibiliya Yera ariko byagera kuri Bibiliya ikoreshwa n’Abahamya ba Yehova yo aho kuvuga ijambo umusaraba ivuga Igiti cy’Umubabaro.
Bagira bati “Wowe ngo wari gusenya urusengero ukarwubaka mu minsi itatu, ngaho ikize! Niba uri Umwana w’Imana, manuka kuri icyo giti cy’umubabaro!”
Abo muri mu madini atemera ibijyanye n’umusaraba bavuga ko Bibiliya Yera na Bibiliya Ntagatifu ubwo zashyirwaga mu Kinyarwanda, bashafe ijambo ry’Ikigiriki ‘Stauros’ risanzwe rivuga ingiga y’igiti akaba ariryo bahinduramo umusaraba.

Title: Umwaka w’ivugabutumwa ryo kuri internet! Youtube yamamaje abapasiteri, yigarurira iyobokamana rya 2019
Body:
Buriya nta kintu mubonamo mwebwe? Niba utarumvise intambara y’amagambo hagati ya Pasiteri Zigirinshuti Michael wo muri ADEPR n’umuhanzi Nsengiyumva François [Igisupusupu], waba warataye mu gutwi indamukanyo y’umuvugabutumwa Riziki Chantal igira iti “Muraho, muraho yemwee!’’
Buriya nta kintu mubonamo mwebwe? Niba utarumvise intambara y’amagambo hagati ya Pasiteri Zigirinshuti Michael wo muri ADEPR n’umuhanzi Nsengiyumva François [Igisupusupu], waba warataye mu gutwi indamukanyo y’umuvugabutumwa Riziki Chantal igira iti “Muraho, muraho yemwee!’’
Aba basangiza b’ijambo ry’Uhoraho ni babiri ku rutonde rurerure rw’abo amazina yabo yagarutsweho cyane mu 2019 binyuze mu kwifashisha umuyoboro wa Youtube, mu kwamamaza ubutumwa bwiza.
Uko iminsi yicuma ni ko umubare w’imbuga nkoranyambaga ugenda wiyongera, ibi bituma abantu benshi bitabira kuzikoresha. Mu zikoreshwa cyane harimo Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, Twitter na Youtube isa n’iyoboye izikunzwe bitewe n’uko ininjiriza ba nyirayo agatubutse.
Youtube yazamuye igikundiro cya bamwe mu bavugabutumwa, ibyo bigisha byambutse imipaka y’u Rwanda bigera hakurya y’amazi magari.
Ntibishingiye kuri za ngendo zakorwaga abavugabutumwa, abafataga rutemikirere berekeza hanze ubu ikoranabuhanga ryoroheje iyamamazabutumwa binyuze mu gufata amashusho y’ubutumwa agasakazwa Isi yose binyuze kuri internet.
Mu Rwanda abenshi basigaye bamara umwanya munini kuri Youtube bareba amashusho; uru rubuga ku Isi yose rukoreshwa n’abasaga miliyari 1.9.
Usibye ibikorwa byo gufasha abatishoboye binyuze mu bukangurambaga bwo gukusanya inkunga, kwerekana abanyempano bashya, Youtube yanatumbagije ubwamamare bw’ababwirizabutumwa bwiza.
IGIHE yanyujije amaso mu mezi 12 ashize ikusanya urutonde rw’abavugabutumwa bagarutsweho cyane muri uyu mwaka, binyuze mu magambo yabo adasanzwe bavuze ndetse n’ibyo bigishije bigakurura benshi mu bakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga, bakagenda babihererekanya.
 	Habuze gato ngo Pasiteri Zigirinshuti afatane n’Igisupusupu
Kanama ya 2019, yabyaye amahari hagati ya Pasiteri Zigirinshuti Michel na IGISUPUSUPU wendaga kumuhagama nyuma yo kuvuga ko uyu muhanzi afite ubwamamare bushyigikiwe na Satani.
Yabitangarije mu cyigisho yatangiye muri ADEPR Nyarugenge mu masengesho ya saa sita, ubwo yigishaga ku ‘buhanuzi n’amasezerano byo mu isezerano rishya byuzuriye mu byasezeranijwe bishya’.
Hari aho yageze avuga uburyo hari abantu b’imburamukoro bahururira ibyo babonyeho byose ari naho yavuzemo Nsengiyumva wamamaye kubera indirimbo ye “Igisupusupu”.
Ati “Ntimugakunde kuba imburamumaro, muri imburamukoro. Iyo ubaho wandagaye Satani arakubona. Nta mpamvu yo kugira ngo ugushaka wese akubone, uguhamagariye igitoki, brochette, Nyabugogo, uguhamagariye kubyina, uguhamagariye kumva Igisupusupu, byose mukaboneka.”
Pasiteri Zigirinshuti yatinze kuri Nsengiyumva abwira abakirisitu ko ukwamamara k’uyu musaza wa Rwagitima kurimo imbaraga za Satani, nyamara abakorera Imana bo bahera hasi.
Ati “Igisupusupu kiragatsindwa! Syii! Ubonye ukuntu cyamamaye mu mezi angahe? Murakibonye ukuntu cyamamaye mu mezi atatu? Ariko buriya nta kintu mubonamo mwebwe? Ikintu nka kiriya kikava Rwagitima cy’Igisupusupu uwo mwanya kikaba kigeze…”
Yunzemo ati “Ubuse nkoze ibiterane bingahe cyangwa waririmbye izingana iki? Ko ntaho zagiye se? None rundamo, rundamo aho ngaho aho ngaho mu mihanda yose, mu Burayi, yagiye. Mujye mumenya imbaraga zamamaza ibintu nka biriya izo ari zo, ugasanga Isi yose yashitse. Ariko ubahamagaye mu giterane ntiwababona, mwajya kumenya imbaraga ziri hariya hantu izo ari zo. Kuki ibintu bya Satani byihuta ariko ibyacu bikagenda gahoro?”
Uretse Nsengiyumva, abantu batandukanye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga banenze Pasiteri Zigirinshuti bamushinja kugirira ishyari uyu musaza ndetse ko amagambo yakoresheje adakwiriye kuvugirwa mu rusengero.
Amagambo ya Zigirinshuti n’ibyo Nsengiyumva yamusubije byose anenga ko uwitwa umukozi w’Imana yamwutse inabi byatijwe umurindi na Youtube kuko ni ho byanyujijwe.
 	Ni gute umusore arara yifumbase n’ama-baby yuzuye i Kigali?
Mukeshimana Emerthe ni izina ryagarutsweho muri uyu mwaka. Uyu mubyeyi yamamaye cyane ku izina rya Mama Charlène, asengera mu Itorero rya ADEPR Nyakabanda. Yatangiye ivugabutumwa mu 2005 ariko atangira gukoreshwa cyane mu ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka.
Muri Kamena 2019 nibwo yatangaje amagambo yiganjemo ay’imvugo zitamenyerewe gukoreshwa mu nsengero. Abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga bararikase bararihanahana.
Muri iyo nyigisho yakomoje ku mbaraga zishobora gufasha umuntu gukora ibidasanzwe.
Yagize ati “Mbere ni nk’uwaza akakubaza ikigutera kudasambana uri umukobwa kandi abakobwa barashize. Ni mbaraga ki? Wa musore we, ni iki kigutera kurara wifumbase, wizinze nk’ipine ry’imodoka, n’abana bahiye bari i Kigali, abana bacyeye n’ibyuki n’ibyuma bihari kandi harimo n’ab’ubuntu, ni iki kigutera kubaho gutya udasambana? Ni mbaraga ki?’’
Usesenguye neza ubutumwa bukubiye muri iyi nyigisho, uyu muvugabutumwa yashakaga kuvuga ko hari izindi mbaraga zishobora gufasha umukobwa n’umusore kudasambana nyamara hari ibigusha byinshi.
Kimwe n’abandi bavugabutumwa Mama Charlène yahisemo gukoresha amagambo arimo aba-baby, ama-nigger, aba-type, abakoboyi n’abajama kuko na bo baza mu rusengero kandi bakeneye kumva ubutumwa bwiza binyuze mu mvugo iboroheye, ikurura amarangamutima yabo.
 	Muraho yemwee! Imwe mu ndamukanyo zamamaye cyane
Umuvugabutumwa Riziki Chantal, na we arazwi. Biroroshye kumwibuka niba uzi umukobwa wigisha anyuzamo asuhuza abamuteze amatwi.
Imwe mu nyigisho yabwirijemo muri Kanama yagize ati “Muraho, muraho yemwe. Kangahe mwa bakobwa mwe, mubonanye abamasera ijipo n’amakanzu biriho pasura, bareba mu ntege no mu bibuno. Aribo ari natwe abakagombye kwiyubaha ni bande? Harya muri kwanga za rukubita ihuku, rukubita imbwa!’’
“Abasore bari kwambara ubusa, ugasanga yambaye icupa, uri umukirisitu urya igaburo ryera ujya mu icupa, ubwose uzajya mu ijuru gute warageze mu icupa? Muraho, muraho yemwee! Nujya mu icupa, byeri, urwagwa bizajya he? Niba ubona umubu ukihisha, uri wa nta kigenda (fake), hunga icyaha, hunga urupfu rwa kabiri.’’
 	Mafia mu madini! Ubuhamya bw’ibikomere bya Pasiteri Ntawiniga
Pasiteri Ntawiniga Jean-Désiré Hullet ari mu bagarutsweho mu ruhando rw’iyobokamana.
Izina rye ryatumbagiriye mu gikorwa cyo ku wa 19 Mata 2019 cyiswe ‘Because There Is Hope’ cyateguwe na Pearls Corner Organisation iyoborwa na Mireille Igihozo witabiriye irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2018. Cyari cyanatumiwemo umuhanzikazi Aline Gahongayire watanze ubutumwa avuga ko itangazamakuru ry’u Rwanda riciriritse.
Mu nyigisho ye yagize ati “Njye nari ikirara. Mu rugo bagiye muri Amerika ndi mu kabari. Nari umurara, nagiye i Kanombe nsanga ba masenge baryana inzara bati ‘ngicyo kiraje’. Nahageze bagiye kare. Nakuze mu rugo ntahaba, meze nk’aho ndi externe. Nageze muri Amerika nsanga ababyeyi ntabazi, abavandimwe tutaziranye.’’
Uyu mupasiteri w’imyaka 43 yavuze ko igituma ahorana itoto ari uko adakunda kurakara.
Ati “Hari abantu barakara bakamarana umujinya ibyumweru bitatu, hari urakara akanuka, akamera nk’urutoryi rutose.’’
Yabwiye IGIHE ko mu murimo w’Imana habamo ibibazo byinshi cyane , yagereranyije na mafia zikorerwamo.
Ati “Singiye kukubeshya buriya abakozi b’Imana biriya bibazo byo gucikamo ibice mu matorero harimo ibinyoma byinshi, harimo intambara zirenze n’iza politiki harimo mafia. Njye rero ukuntu navutse mvuga ibintu uko biri.
 	Kabanda Julienne, umuvugabutumwa wari icyamamare mu tubyiniro dukaze!
Pasiteri Julienne K. Kabanda ayobora Umuryango w’ivugabutumwa wa Grace Room Ministries. Yumvikanye abwiriza inyigisho ziganjemo izikebura abana b’abakobwa ku myitwarire ikwiye kubaranga.
Yigisha muri ‘Because There Is Hope’, hari aho yagize ati “Narakuze, sinigeze nsambana, ndashaka. Hari utumalayika. Hari abavuye mu ijuru bagera ku Isi; hari n’abavuye ikuzimu bagana mu ijuru, biterwa n’aho ukonkobotse.’’
“Twavuye ikuzimu ariko turagana mu ijuru. Iyo Yesu atwogeje baratwifuza. Hari ibintu ntinya kuvuga. Wararaga mu kabyiniro? Njye nari nararenze urwo rwego. Nageze aho nari mfite imbyino izwi. Sinitwaga Julienne ryari izina ry’abaturage. Nakoze amarushanwa yo gusubiramo Michael Jackson. Naranyereye ibigabo bikajya bigwa hasi.’’
Kabanda yakanyujijeho mu tubyiniro dukomeye, yari umuhanzi uzwi ku banyabirori b’i Kigali ndetse yigeze ategura igitaramo cy’ubuntu cyahuruje imbaga irimo na nyina agatungurwa no kubona umwana we yitwara atyo!
 	Imvugo zo ku muhanda zarifashishijwe mu ivugabutumwa rishya!
Pasiteri Niyonshuti Théogène wakuriye mu buzima bwo ku muhanda, ubu ni Pasiteri uyoboye umwe mu midugudu igize Itorero rya ADEPR. Umwaka wa 2019 wasize yamamaye mu kubwiriza byihariye akoresheje imvugo zisanisha n’ubuzima bwabo.
Ati “Ntiwaba umaze gucoma ngo ugende nka babiloni, uhita uhindura ingendo (bounce).’’
