Kuzwa iteka si indirimbo nshya mu matwi y’abantu benshi, kuko ari indirimbo ya kera. Abakirisitu Gatolika bayizi cyane mu masengesho menshi anyuranye nko mu Gusingiza Imana, Gushengerera ndetse no mu Misa mu gihe cyo gushimira.
Chorale Christus Regnat yahisemo gusubiramo (Remix) iyi ndirimbo kugira ngo ikomeze gufasha Abakrisitu gusingiza Imana yo ikwiye guharirwa ikuzo n’ibisingizo.
Bizimana Jérémie usanzwe ari umuhimbyi, umwarimu w’indirimbo ndetse akanamamaza ibikorwa by’iyi korali yabwiye IGIHE ko kuri bo iyi ndirimbo ari nziza ku buryo yari ikenewe gukorwa neza kugira ngo ikomeze gufasha abantu kwegera Imana.
Yanavuze ko bafite umushinga mugari wo gukora indirimbo nyinshi mu buryo bw’amajwi n’amashusho nk’uko abakunzi babo bahoraga babibasaba.
Chorale Christus Regnat ni Chorale ibarizwa muri Kiriziya Gatolika muri Paruwasi yitiriwe Umwamikazi w’Amahoro (Regina Pacis) i Remera, Arikidiyosezi ya Kigali.
Tariki ya 12 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo Chorale Christus Regnat bashyize hanze indirimbo “Mama Shenge” yagaragayemo Yverry Rugamba na Andy Bumuntu, abahanzi bagezweho muri iyi minsi. Iyo ndirimbo “Mama Shenge” yishimiwe ku rwego rwo hejuru n’abatari bake nk’uko bigaragara kuri Youtube Channel yabo, aho imaze kurebwa n’abarenga ibihumbi Magana abiri na makumyabiri mu minsi 29.

Title: Apôtre Muhire arasaba ko ururimi rw’Umwuka Wera rwemerwa, Abanyarwanda bakaganira n’Imana (Video)
Body:
Apôtre Muhire James wo mu itorero New Hope yavuze ko agiye kugeza ubusabe ku nzego zitandukanye asaba ko ururimi rw’Umwuka Wera rwashyirwa mu ndimi zemewe n’Itegeko Nshinga rya Repubulika y’u Rwanda, abanyarwanda bakabasha kuganira n’Imana.
Apôtre Muhire James wo mu itorero New Hope yavuze ko agiye kugeza ubusabe ku nzego zitandukanye asaba ko ururimi rw’Umwuka Wera rwashyirwa mu ndimi zemewe n’Itegeko Nshinga rya Repubulika y’u Rwanda, abanyarwanda bakabasha kuganira n’Imana.
Ingingo ya munani y’Itegeko Nshinga rya Repubulika y’u Rwanda ryo mu 2003 nk’uko ryavuguruwe mu 2015 ivuga ko ururimi rw’Igihugu ari Ikinyarwanda naho muri rusange indimi zemewe mu butegetsi ari Ikinyarwanda, Icyongereza n’Igifaransa. Igiswahili giherutse kongerwamo.
Inteko y’ururimi n’umuco isobanura ko ururimi ari igikoresho nyamuryango cy’ubwumvane gishingiye ku gukoresha ubushobozi kamere abantu bifitemo bwo kumvikana bakoresheje amajwi yatuye abantu bagize umuryango nyarurimi umwe baba baremeranyijeho.
Ururimi rufasha abantu gushyikirana, kugezanyaho amakuru, kuranga ibibakikije, gushyira ku murongo ibitekerezo no kubigaragaza, kugaragaza imbamutima n’ibindi.
Indimi zose zifite uko zandikwa n’uburyo zivugwa ku buryo abantu bazikoresha bumvikana, hakaba n’amategeko n’amabwiriza ku bazikoresha ku buryo ushaka kurwiga arumenya.
Ibyo bitandukanye n’ururimi rw’Umwuka Wera kuko uruvuga adashobora kumvikana n’abo bari kumwe, akenshi ibyo avuga byumvwa na we wenyine keretse iyo abisobanuriye abo bari kumwe mu rurimi bumva.
Muhire James avuga ko ururimi rw’Umwuka Wera ‘ari ururimi rwatanzwe n’Imana rutangiwe mu Mwuka Wera.’ Akavuga ko yifuza ko rwajya mu ndimi zemewe z’ubutegetsi mu Rwanda.
Ati “Icyifuzo dufite ni uko rwakwemerwa mu Itegeko Nshinga rya Repubulika y’u Rwanda. Naratekereje nsanga ururimi rw’Imana narwo rwemewe n’itegeko Nshinga rikuru ry’igihugu cyanjye cyaba ari igikorwa cyiza gihambaye imbere y’Imana. Nzabisaba mu nzego zose zishoboka.”
Uyu mugabo avuga ko icyo gitekerezo atazakigeza mu Rwanda gusa ahubwo yifuza ko byakorwa hirya no hino mu bindi bihugu. Ati “Sinzandikira igihugu cyanjye gusa, n’ibindi bihugu nzabyandikira.”
Ururimi rw’Umwuka Wera si ururimi abantu bagenda baganira cyangwa bakoresha mu itumanaho mu bundi buryo cyangwa ngo umuntu naruvuga umwegereye arwumve. Urugero rwo muri Bibiliya muri Matayo umutwe wa 17 umurongo wa 46 n’uwa 47 yerekana ko urwo rurimi rumenywa n’uruvuze.
Mu rwandiko rw’Abakolinto ba mbere umutwe wa 12, havuga ko Abakirisito bahawe impano zitandukanye barimo n’abasobanura izo ndimi.
Ubwo Pawulo yasobanuriraga abakirisito b’i Korinto uko impano z’umwuka zitandukanye, yababwiye ko hari impano nyinshi z’umwuka ariko umwuka ari umwe. Mu gice cya 10 yabandikiye ati “Undi agahabwa gukora ibitangaza, undi agahabwa guhanura, undi agahabwa kurobanura imyuka, undi agahabwa kuvuga indimi nyinshi, undi agahabwa gusobanura indimi.”
 Kuki ashaka ko rujya mu Itegeko Nshinga?
Itegeko Nshinga rya Repubulika y’u Rwanda ryo mu 2003 nk’uko ryavuguruwe mu 2015, ritanga umwitangirizwa wo kongera cyangwa kugabanya indimi zemewe z’ubutegetsi. Riteganya ko Itegeko Ngenga rishobora kongera cyangwa kugabanya indimi zemewe mu butegetsi.
Muhire James ashaka ko abantu bamenya urwo rurimi kugira ngo babashe kuganira n’Imana.
Ati “Impamvu nifuza ko uru rurimi rujya mu ndimi zemewe ni ukugira ngo bitere imbaraga abenegihugu. Umuturage nagira amatsiko yo kuvuga urwo rurimi ni ko kuva mu byaha, niko kuva mu bidatunganye, niko kubaha Imana. Byanze bikunze umuntu wese uvuga uru rurimi rw’Umwuka Wera ni umuntu wageze ikirenge mu cya Kristo.”
Avuga ko mu matorero yo mu Rwanda hari abanyarwanda bazi urwo rurimi kandi buzuzwa bakaruvuga, abo ngo nirwemerwa hari izindi mbaraga bazagira.
Ati "Abanyarwamda benshi bararuzi, bararuvuga hirya no hino mu matorero kuko buzuzwa Umwuka Wera, ariko hari izindi mbaraga abanyamadini cyangwa abanyarwanda bazagira uru rurimi niruramuka rwemejwe abanyarwamda bose bazagira amatsiko yo kurumenya.”
Abadepite bazarwemeza basoma Bibiliya
Ntibyoroshye gusuzuma ururimi rudafite inyandiko nyejwi cyangwa nyemvugo izwi abantu bahuriyeho.
Muhire James avuga ko bizasaba abarusuzuma kwizera. Ati “Ndatekereza ko abagize inteko bashatse gusuzuma uru rurimi, icya mbere ni ugusoma Bibiliya ijambo ry’Imana, icya kabiri ni ukwizera ikintu cyose cyiza ubona. Burya hari n’abantu benshi hanze aha batarakizwa kuko Imana idusaba ko tuyizera bazasuzuma uru rurimi mu byanditswe byera mu Ijambo ry’Imana. Bazarusuzumira mu kwizera.
Muhire avuga ko ubutumwa bwiza Imana yatanze butagenewe abanyamadini n’aboroheje gusa, ngo n’abayobozi burabareba.
Ati “Nabo bagomba kwizera ubutumwa bwiza ntabwo ari ubw’abanyamadini n’abantu bo hasi bose. N’abanyapolitiki n’abaminisitiri n’abategetsi b’Isi yose bagomba gukizwa kuko na bo Imana irabashaka mu bwami bwayo.”
Umunyamakuru yasabye Apôtre Muhire James kuvuga amagambo make muri urwo rurimi , avuga ko umuntu atarukoresha uko yishakiye kandi ko rutiganwa icyiza ari uko umuntu arwiyuzurira rumujemo.
Uyu mugabo amaze imyaka 20 mu ivugabutumwa aho yaritangiriye muri Uganda afite imyaka 18. Arubatse afite umugore n’umwana. Ibyo agiye gusaba ari kubikora ku giti cye bitari mu izina ry’itorero abarizwamo yewe ngo nta n’ubwo arabiganira n’abo bakorana umurimo w’Imana.

Title: Pastor Bugembe na Nkundabose wamamaye muri Alarm Ministries batumiwe mu giterane gikomeye
Body:
Umushumba Mukuru w’Amatorero ya Foursquare Gospel Church mu Rwanda, Bishop Dr. Masengo Fidèle, yatumiye abahanzi barimo Pastor Wilson Bugembe wo muri Uganda na Nkundabose Patrick wamamaye muri Alarm Ministries mu giterane gikomeye kizabera mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Umushumba Mukuru w’Amatorero ya Foursquare Gospel Church mu Rwanda, Bishop Dr. Masengo Fidèle, yatumiye abahanzi barimo Pastor Wilson Bugembe wo muri Uganda na Nkundabose Patrick wamamaye muri Alarm Ministries mu giterane gikomeye kizabera mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Ni igiterane cyiswe ‘Youth Connection’ kizabera ku rusengero rushya rwa Foursquare Gospel Church ruherereye Kimironko mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
‘Youth Connection’ ni igiterane kigamije kwigisha urubyiruko no kuruhugura, kuruhuza rukina imikino itandukanye no gutaha urusengero rushya rw’iri torero riri mu akomeye mu Rwanda.
Wilson Mugwema ushinzwe Itumanaho muri Foursquare Gospel Church Kimironko yavuze ko batekereje guhuza urubyiruko kugira ngo barwigishe kwihangira imirimo no kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge.
Ati “Hazaba harimo ibikorwa bizahuza urubyiruko rutandukanye rwo muri za Kaminuza kugira ngo tugire urubyiruko rwinshi ruze tubaganirize ku bikorwa bitandukanye birimo kurwanya ibibyabwenge n’uko umuntu yakwihangira umurimo.”
Kizatangira ku wa 15 Werurwe 2020 kimare icyumweru cyose. Mbere y’uko gitangira hazaba igitaramo kinini kizatumirwamo amakorali akomeye mu Rwanda n’abandi bahanzi bataratangazwa.
Patrick Nkundabose wamamaye muri Alarm Ministries usanzwe aba muri Suède we yamaze kugera mu Rwanda yitabiriye iki giterane. Uyu muhanzi wamamaye atera indirimbo zitandukanye z’uyu muryango w’ivugabutumwa zirimo ‘Hariho Impamvu’ n’izindi yakoze nk’uwigenga.
Pastor Wilson Bugembe we ategerejwe gususurutsa igiterane ku wa Mbere no ku wa Kabiri tariki 16 na 17 Werurwe 2020.
Uyu muhanzi ukomoka muri Uganda yaherukaga mu Rwanda mu gitaramo cya Kingdom of God Ministries cyiswe ‘Victorious album launch’ cyabereye mu ihema rya Kigali Conference and Exhibition Village ahahoze hitwa Camp Kigali, ku wa 12 Gicurasi 2019.
Cyari cyatumiwemo abaramyi bakomeye mu Rwanda barimo Arsène Tuyi [wegukanye igihembo cy’umuhanzi mwiza ukizamuka muri Groove Awards Rwanda 2016], Bosco Nshuti [ufite igihembo cy’umuhanzi w’umwaka muri Groove Awards 2018]. Bafatanyije n’amatsinda yo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana ya Alarm Ministries na Healing Worship Team n’umuhanzikazi Liza Kamikazi wamamaye mu ndirimbo zisanzwe ariko akaza kwiyegurira Uwiteka.

Title: Bwa mbere Itorero ‘Impact Centre Chrétien’ rigiye gukorera igiterane gikomeye mu Rwanda
Body:
Nyuma y’igihe gito Itorero Impact Centre Chrétien (ICC) rigeze mu Rwanda ryatangaje ko rigiye gukora igiterane kizahuriza hamwe abavugabutumwa batandukanye barimo n’abakomoka ku Mugabane w’i Burayi.
Nyuma y’igihe gito Itorero Impact Centre Chrétien (ICC) rigeze mu Rwanda ryatangaje ko rigiye gukora igiterane kizahuriza hamwe abavugabutumwa batandukanye barimo n’abakomoka ku Mugabane w’i Burayi.
Iki giterane kizamara iminsi itatu, kizatangira ku wa 19 kigere ku wa 21 Werurwe 2020, kuri Kigali Convention Centre, aho kwinjira bizaba ari ubuntu.
Abazacyitabira bazasobanurirwa byimbitse ‘Ijambo rya Yesu Kirisitu’ ndetse n’akamaro k’umubiri wa Kirisitu by’umwihariko ku Rwanda.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe Itumanaho mu Itorero ICC, Karen Mambiki, yavuze ko nta muntu uwo ari we wese n’imyemerere ye uzahezwa mu giterane kizitabirwa n’abavugabutumwa bahagarariye iri torero mu bice bitandukanye by’Isi n’abo mu Rwanda.
Yagize ati "Inyigisho zizahatangirwa zizafasha abantu kubohoka no kurushaho kumenya ‘Yesu Kirisitu.’’
Iri torero riyobowe na Pasiteri Yvan Castanou, na we uzaba ari i Kigali gusangiza ijambo ry’Imana abazitabira icyo giterane.
ICC imaze kugira amashami asaga 85 hirya no hino ku Isi by’umwihariko mu bihugu byose bivuga Ururimi rw’Igifaransa, Francophonie.
Inyigisho zizatangirwa muri iki giterane zizaba ziri mu rurimi rw’Igifaransa ariko zisemurwe mu Kinyarwanda. Abagiteguye bahamya ko kizaba ari n’umwanya mwiza wo gutangiza ku mugaragaro iri torero mu Rwanda.
Gahunda y’iki giterane iteganya ko ku wa Kane tariki ya 19 Werurwe no kuwa Gatanu tariki ya 20 Werurwe 2020, kizajya gitangira saa Kumi n’Ebyiri kugeza saa Tatu z’umugoroba. Ku wa Gatandatu tariki ya 21 Werurwe, igiterane kizatangira saa kumi kigeze saa Moya z’umugoroba.
Itorero rya Impact Centre Chrétien ryashinzwe mu 2002, rifite inkomoko i Paris mu Bufaransa, ari na ho hari icyicaro gikuru. Iri torero ryatangiye gukorera mu Rwanda mu mwaka ushize.
Buri cyumweru abayoboke baryo bakora amateraniro 106, agahuza abayoboke barenga 26 400.
Kubera inyigisho zifasha abatari bake zishingiye ku butumwa bw’Umwami Yesu Kirisitu, abayoboke ba Impact Centre Chrétien biyongera ku rugero rwa 27% buri mwaka.

Title: Kigali: Yibye igikoresho gitagatifu ‘Ostensoir’ muri Kiliziya azi ko ari zahabu
Body:
Umusore utaramenyekana yinjiye muri Kiliziya yitiriwe Mutagatifu Visenti Pallotti i Gikondo mu mujyi wa Kigali, yiba igikoresho gitagatifu cyifashishwa mu kumurika ukarisitiya cyizwi nka "Ostensoir".
Umusore utaramenyekana yinjiye muri Kiliziya yitiriwe Mutagatifu Visenti Pallotti i Gikondo mu mujyi wa Kigali, yiba igikoresho gitagatifu cyifashishwa mu kumurika ukarisitiya cyizwi nka "Ostensoir".
Mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki ya 26 Gashyantare 2020, nibwo uwo musore yahengereye umukirisitu wa nyuma wari muri iyi Paruwasi ya Gikondo asohotse, na we ahita yinjira yiba Ostensoir.
Padiri wa Paruwasi ya Gikondo, Rwasa Chrysante, yabwiye IGIHE ko uwo musore yibye iki gitereko cy’isakaramentu azi ko abonye zahabu.
Yagize ati “Umusore yaje ejo mu gitondo mbere ya misa aterura isakaramentu aragenda. Nta bantu bari barimo, yacunze uwa nyuma asohotse muri ako kanya aragenda arayitwara.”
Rwasa yavuze ko bahise bamenyesha inzego z’umutekano kandi ngo hari amakuru y’ibanze ashobora gutuma uwibye icyo gikoresho afatwa.
Yavuze ko abajura bakunze kwiba za Ostensoirs bakeka ko ari zahabu y’umwimerere, nyamara ziba zikozwe muri zahabu y’umwomekano.
Ostensoir yibwe ifite agaciro kari hagati y’ibihumbi 600 na miliyoni 1 y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.

Title: Itorero Angilikani ry’ u Rwanda riri gushaka miliyoni 115 zo gushyigikira diyosezi nshya ya Karongi
Body:
Itorero Angilikani ry’u Rwanda ryatangiye ubukangurambaga bwo gushaka amafaranga yo gushyigikira diyosezi nshya ya Karongi izatangira imirimo muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka.
Itorero Angilikani ry’u Rwanda ryatangiye ubukangurambaga bwo gushaka amafaranga yo gushyigikira diyosezi nshya ya Karongi izatangira imirimo muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka.
Iri torero ryagaragaje ko rikeneye nibura miliyoni 115 Frw zo gushyigikira imirimo y’iyo diyosezi nshya mu gihe cy’imyaka itatu, kugira ngo nayo itangire kwibeshaho.
Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu, iryo torero ryatangije ubukangurambaga bwiswe ‘25 Km walking Challenge in Suppot of Karongi Missionary Diocese’ mu rugendo rw’ibirometero 25. Abarwitabiriye bagiye n’amaguru guhera i Nyanza mu Karere ka Kicukiro kugera i Nyamata mu karere ka Bugesera.
Intego y’urwo rugendo kwari ugukusanya ubushobozi bwo gushyigikira Diyosezi nshya ya Karongi izatangizwa tariki ya 31 Gicurasi uyu mwaka.
Ni urugendo rw’amasaha atanu rwatangijwe n’Umwepisikopi Mukuru w’itorero Angilikani ry’u Rwanda Dr.Laurent Mbanda , rukitabirwa n’abakristo b’itorero Angilikani.
Iri torero rigaragaza ko mu mwaka wa mbere wa Diyosezi ya Karongi hakenewe byibura 86,000,000 Frw. Buri Diyosezi ya Angilikani mu zisanzweho yiyemeje gutanga 3. 500.000 Frw.
Ayo mafaranga azafasha mu gushaka imodoka y’Umwepiskopi, Umushahara we, gukodesha inzu mu gihe Diyoseze itaragira inyubako zayo, ibikoresho by’ibanze byo mu biro, gufasha za paruwasi n’amakanisa, gusana no kubaka insengero zitujuje ibisabwa, kwigisha no guhugura abapasitoro.
Rev.Prof .Ndikumana Viateur, umwe mu bitabiriye urugendo rwo gushakira amikoro Diyosezi ya Karongi yagize ati " Uru rugendo rwatunejeje, ni urugendo rw’amateka rugaragaza ubumwe mu gukora umurimo w’Imana. Biratwereka ko tuzagera kure nidufashanya kandi tugatahiriza umugozi umwe mu kubaka ubwami bw’Imana.”
Rev.Rukundo Jean Pierre Methode watowe n’inama y’Abepisikopi kuzayobora Diyosezi nshya ya Karongi , yavuze ko Diyosezi ya Karongi niboneka izafasha gukomeza iyogezabutumwa rikagera kuri benshi.
Yagize ati “Iyo Diyosezi izunganira abandi bari basanzwe bakora muri kariya gace mu kwamamaza Inkuru nziza y’ Agakiza ka Yesu no kuzana Iterambere ryuzuye, dore ko kariya gace ka Nyamasheke, na Rutsiro turi mu duce tubarizwamo abaturage bakennye kurusha abandi mu Rwanda.”
Umwepisikopi Mukuru w’itorero Angilikani ry’u Rwanda Dr.Laurent Mbanda, yavuze ko bakeneye inkunga yo gushyigikira Diyosezi nshya ya Karongi, no gutegura umunsi nyirizina wo kuyitaha.
Yavuze ko kuri uyu wa Gatandatu hakusanyijwe miliyoni zirenga enye, bakaba bagiye no gukomereza mu zindi Diyosezi kugira ngo amafaranga akenewe aboneke.
Diyosezi nshya ya Karongi izaba ifite imbibi z’icyahoze ari perefegitura ya Kibuye, ubu ikaba igizwe na Paruwase 9 zabarizwaga muri Diyosezi ya Kivu.

Title: Patient Bizimana yatumiwe mu gitaramo gikomeye mu Buholandi
Body:
Umuhanzi umaze gushinga imizi mu ndirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, Patient Bizimana, yatumiwe mu gitaramo azahuriramo na Fortran Bigirimana mu Buholandi.
Umuhanzi umaze gushinga imizi mu ndirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, Patient Bizimana, yatumiwe mu gitaramo azahuriramo na Fortran Bigirimana mu Buholandi.
Iki gitaramo cyiswe “Thanksgiving Celebration Live Concert” giteganyijwe kubera Kerkplein1 mu Buholandi ku wa 4-5 Mata 2020. Cyateguwe na Family Fellowship Ministries.
Patient Bizimana azagihuriramo n’umuramyi Fortran Bigirimana ukomoka mu Burundi, akaba afite ibingano binyura benshi mu bakunda umuziki uhimbaza Imana.
Bigirimana yakunzwe mu Rwanda binyuze mu ndirimbo zirimo “Ntaco Nzoba”, ‘‘Ni amahoro” n’izindi.
Amakuru agera kuri IGIHE ni uko Patient Bizimana azahaguruka mu Rwanda mu mpera za Werurwe yerekeza mu Buholandi.
Agiye gusubira gutaramira i Burayi nyuma y’amezi asaga abiri ahavuye. Ubwo aherukayo mu mwaka ushize, urugendo rwe yarusoje mu gitaramo yahuriyemo na Gentil Misigaro cyabereye mu Mujyi wa Bruxelles mu Bubiligi ku wa 31 Ukuboza 2019.
Uyu muramyi yabwiye IGIHE ko yiteguye neza kuzataramana n’abakunzi b’ibihangano bye ku Mugabane w’u Burayi.
Yagize ati “Ni ubwa mbere nzaba ndirimbye muri iki gihugu; ikindi kandi guhurirayo na Fortrand uzaba uvuye mu Bufaransa nabyo bizatuma igitaramo kirushaho kuba cyiza.”
Bizimana Patient yizeye ko igitaramo kizaba cyiza cyane ko amaze kumenyera ikirere cyaho n’uburyo abatuye muri ibi bihugu baba bafite inyota yo kuramya Imana.
Uyu muhanzi usengera muri Evangelical Restoration Church yakoreye ibitaramo mu bihugu hafi ya byose bya Afurika y’Uburasirazuba, yaririmbiye mu Burayi n’ahandi henshi. Ni we muhanzi rukumbi mu bakora umuziki uhimbaza Imana mu Rwanda umaze gukora ibitaramo bikomeye ndetse bikagaragaramo abahanzi bubatse izina.
Ategura ibitaramo ngarukamwaka bya ‘East Celebration’ byitabirwa n’ibihumbi by’abakunda umuziki we. Mu 2016 yatumiye Solly Mahlangu, umunyempano ukomeye wo muri Afurika y’Epfo, Umunya-Nigeria Osinachi Joseph [Sinach] (2018) na Alka Mbumba wiyita ’Umusazi wa Yesu’ (2019) n’abandi.
Umuziki yawutangiye akiri muto, agitangira kwiyumvamo impano yatangiye kwihatira kwiga gucuranga piano mu rusengero hanyuma bigeze mu 2007 asohora indirimbo ye bwite yitwa ‘Andyohera’ ari nabwo benshi batangiye kumubwira ko afite ijwi ryiza. Yakunzwe bihambaye mu ndirimbo nka ‘Iyo neza’, ‘Amagambo yanjye’, ‘Menye neza’, ‘Andyohera’ n’izindi.
 	Reba indirimbo “Ijambo rya nyuma” ya Patient Bizimana

Title: Itorero Angilikani mu Rwanda ryemeje ishyirwaho rya Diyoseze nshya n’Umwepisikopi wayo wa mbere
Body:
Itorero Angilikani mu Rwanda ryatangaje ko ryungutse Diyoseze nshya ya Karongi, izatahwa ku wa 31 Gicurasi 2020 ari nabwo hazimikwa Umwepisikopi wayo wa mbere, Rev. Jean Pierre Methode Rukundo.
Itorero Angilikani mu Rwanda ryatangaje ko ryungutse Diyoseze nshya ya Karongi, izatahwa ku wa 31 Gicurasi 2020 ari nabwo hazimikwa Umwepisikopi wayo wa mbere, Rev. Jean Pierre Methode Rukundo.
Byemejwe n’inama y’Inama y’Abepisikopi (House of Bishops ) yateraniye mu Karere ka Musanze muri Diyoseze ya Shyira ku wa Gatanu tariki 15 Gashyantare 2020.
Itangazo ryashyizweho umukono n’Umwepisikopi Mukuru w’Itorero Angilikani mu Rwanda, Dr.Laurent Mbanda ryerekana ko byo iyo nama yemeje harimo gushyiraho Diyoseze ya Karongi izaba igizwe n’iyahoze ari Intara ya Kibuye.
Iyo nama yanatoye uzaba Umwepisikopi wa mbere w’iyo Diyoseze nshya Rev. Jean Pierre Methode Rukundo uzimikwa ubwo izaba itahwa ku mugaragaro ku itariki ya 31 Gicurasi 2020.
Itorero rya Angilikani rifite abayoboke barenga miliyoni imwe kuva ritangiye mu Rwanda mu 1992 ryari rigizwe na Diyosezi 11, ubu zikaba zibaye 12.
Rev. Jean Pierre Methode Rukundo afite impamyabumenyi ihanitse muri Tewologiya n’Iterambere (Theology and Development) yayikuye i Nairobi muri Kenya.
Yakoze imirimo itandukanye harimo kuba Pasitoro muri za Paruwasi, kuyobora ishami ry’iterambere muri Diyosezi ya Shyogwe. Ubu ni Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’Itorero Anglikani ry’u Rwanda.
Kubera ubuzima bubi yakuriyemo nyuma y’uko ababyeyi be batandukanye afite imyaka ine bigatuma amara umwaka mu buzima bwo ku muhanda ariko akaza kugira amahirwe ya kabiri yamufashije kwiga, Rev. Jean Pierre Methode Rukundo yashinze umuryango yise amahirwe ya kabiri “Second Chance Rukundo Ministry” ufasha abagize ibibazo bitandukanye kongera kugaruka mu buzima.

Title: James na Daniella bahurije couple z’abaramyi mu gitaramo cy’amateka gitegerejwe i Kigali
Body:
Benshi bari bamaranye imyaka icyifuzo cyo kubona couple z’abaramyi zizwi mu muziki uhimbaza Imana zahuriye mu gitaramo kimwe. Izo nzozi zigiye kuba impamo, ibyifuzo bigiye gusubizwa binyuze muri James na Daniella.
Benshi bari bamaranye imyaka icyifuzo cyo kubona couple z’abaramyi zizwi mu muziki uhimbaza Imana zahuriye mu gitaramo kimwe. Izo nzozi zigiye kuba impamo, ibyifuzo bigiye gusubizwa binyuze muri James na Daniella.
James na Daniella bafite igikundiro cyo ku gasongero mu bihebeye ibihangano byo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana bateguye igitaramo gikomeye bahurijemo couple z’abaramyi zikunzwe mu gihugu.
Iki gitaramo cyiswe “Mpa Amavuta Live Concert” gitegerejwe kubera muri Kigali Arena ku wa 1 Werurwe 2020.
James na Daniella bagiteguye bagamije kumurika album yabo ya mbere bise “Mpa Amavuta’’ izaba iriho indirimbo umunani.
Cyatumiwemo abahanzi bakomeye barimo andi ma-couple azwi cyane mu muziki wo kuramya Imana arimo iya Ben na Chance; Tuyizere Papi Clever na Ingabire Dorcas; Maya na Fabrice na Amanda Fung na Kavutse Olivier babarizwa muri Beauty for Ashes.
Abazacyitabira kandi bazataramirwa n’abahanzi barimo Prosper Nkomezi uri mu bafite igikundiro, René Patrick, Ndayisenga Esron wamamaye muri True Promises na Gaby Kamanzi.
Couple ya James Rugarama na Daniella Mukiza ifitanye abana babiri. Ni imwe mu zakoze umuziki ukabasha kugera ku kigero nk’icyo uyu munsi bariho. Bavuga ko kuba indirimbo zabo ziri kwamamara cyane mu buryo bwihuse ari ubushake bw’Imana n’amasengesho yabo adasiba.
Mu minsi ishize babwiye IGIHE ko babanye igihe kinini babitsanya amabanga, nyuma bafata umwanzuro wo kugirana umubano w’urukundo no kuririmbana nka Couple.
Aba bombi iyo bavuga amateka yabo bavuga ko batangiye baririmbana ariko mu 2019 bakaza gufata umwanzuro wo gutangira kuririmba nyuma y’uko baririmbiraga mu rugo bakumva ni byiza cyane.
James ati “Twararirimbaga tutarabana ubundi tugahurira mu matsinda atandukanye. Tumaze kubana dutangira kujya turirimbana ariko bitari mu buryo bweruye. Uyu mwaka nibwo nk’itsinda ryacu nibwo twagiye muri studio dukora indirimbo ya mbere twise ‘Mpa Amavuta’.”
Daniella avuga ko urukundo rwabo rwatangiye gututumba mu 2008 cyangwa 2009, mu 2012 bajya kwiga muri Uganda, umugabo yiga iby’Ububanyi n’Amahanga mu gihe umugore icyo gihe yigaga Ibaruramari.
Ati “Twamenyanye kera kuko twari abaturanyi Kimironko nyuma tugiye kwiga muri Uganda nibwo twaje kubana. Mu 2008 cyangwa 2009 nibwo twamenyanye noneho mu 2012 tujya kwiga kaminuza, tuyirangiza mu 2015 aba ari nabwo tuba umuryango.”
Ubu bamaze gushyira hanze indirimbo zirimo ‘Mpa Amavuta’ bahereyeho imaze no kurebwa n’abasaga miliyoni ku rubuga rwa Youtube, “Nkoresha”, “Ububyutse” na “Narakijijwe”.
Kuba ari couple ikora umurimo w’Imana wo kuririmba, bavuga ko ari ikintu kibafasha kuko kuba bafite icyerekezo kimwe ari ikintu gihambaye ama-couple yose yakabaye yitaho cyane.
Ni ku nshuro ya mbere James na Daniella bagiye gukorera igitaramo mu Rwanda, gusa si cyo cya mbere bakoze kuva batangiye umuziki kuko hari icyo bakoreye muri Uganda mu mpera za 2017.
Kwinjira muri “Mpa Amavuta Live Concert” ku bazagura amatike mbere ni 3 000 Frw, 15 000 Frw na 30 000 Frw ku bazagura amatike mbere mu gihe abazayagurira ku muryango bizaba ari 5 000 Frw, 10 000 Frw na 20 000 Frw.
 	Reba ‘Mpa Amavuta’ ya James&Daniella

Title: Papa Francis yanze icyifuzo cyo kuba abapadiri ku bagabo bafite abagore muri Amazon
Body:
Papa Francis yanze kwemeza icyifuzo cyo kwemerera abagabo bafite abagore kuba abapadiri mu gace ka Amazon, mu rwego rwo guhangana n’ubuke bw’abapadiri.
Papa Francis yanze kwemeza icyifuzo cyo kwemerera abagabo bafite abagore kuba abapadiri mu gace ka Amazon, mu rwego rwo guhangana n’ubuke bw’abapadiri.
Abasenyeri bo muri ako gace bari bashyigikiye uwo mwanzuro umwaka ushize, ariko byagombaga kwemezwa na Papa.
Ubusanzwe abapadiri ba Kiliziya Gatolika basabwa gukomeza kuba imanzi igihe cyose bahamagariwe uwo murimo.
Ubwo abagabo muri Amazon basabirwaga kwemererwa kuba abapadiri bafite abagore, byararwanyijwe cyane mu bice by’Uburayi na Amerika, bavuga ko byaba biganisha ku kwemerera abapadiri bose ku isi gushaka abagore ari umwe mu myihariko Kiliziya yari ifite.
Itangazo ryavuye i Vatikani rigira riti “Amazon yaduhaye umukoro, Papa arandika, agamije ko tuva mu kibazo gihari bya nyabyo aho kwinezeza mu bisubizo bitanga umuti w’ikibazo igice.”
Papa yavuze ko hakenewe abapadiri bumva neza ikibazo kiri muri Amazon n’umuco wo muri ako gace. Yasabye abashumba gusengera abantu ngo bagire umuhamagaro w’ubupadiri ku bwinshi.
Umwaka ushize abasenyeri 184 bahuriye i Vatikani biga ku hazaza ha Kiliziya mu gace ka Amazon. Hanaganiriwe niba abagabo bakuze n’abashatse abagore bakwemererwa kuba abapadiri.
Bivugwa ko nibura 85 % by’uduce two muri Amazon batabasha guhimbaza misa buri cyumweru kubera ko nta bapadiri bahagije bahari. Hari abavuga ko babona padiri rimwe mu mwaka.

Title: Pasiteri Antoine Rutayisire agiye kujya mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru
Body:
Umuyobozi wa Paruwasi ya Remera mu Itorero Angilikani, Rev Past Dr Antoine Rutayisire wamenyekanye mu nyigisho zitandukanye z’iyobokamana, yatangaje ko mu myaka itatu azajya mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru nk’uko biteganywa mu mahame itororo Angilikani rigenderaho.
Umuyobozi wa Paruwasi ya Remera mu Itorero Angilikani, Rev Past Dr Antoine Rutayisire wamenyekanye mu nyigisho zitandukanye z’iyobokamana, yatangaje ko mu myaka itatu azajya mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru nk’uko biteganywa mu mahame itororo Angilikani rigenderaho.
Itorero Angilikani riteganya ko Pasiteri cyangwa Musenyeri wujuje imyaka 65 ku munsi yizihirijeho isabukuru y’imyaka 65 ahita ajya mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru.
Hashize iminsi ku mbuga nkoranyamabaga hacicikana amakuru y’uko Rev. Past. Dr. Antoine Rutayisire agiye kujya mu kirihuko cy’izabukuru ariko ugasanga abantu batabivugaho rumwe benshi bavuga ko agikenewe mu murimo w’Imana.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE, Rutayisire yavuze ko ayo makuru ari ukuri kandi ko agenda abyibutsa abantu iyo avuga ubutumwa mu materaniro atandukanye.
Ati “Ibyo ni ukuri nta kinyoma kirimo kubera ko twebwe buriya mu Itorero Angilikani iyo wujuje imyaka 65 ujya mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru. Nta muntu wabimpimbiye ni njye wabivuze. Nkunze no kubivuga muri iyi minsi.”
Kugeza ubu Rev. Past. Dr. Antoine Rutayisire afite imyaka 62. Yavuze ko ku itariki 29 Gicurasi 2023 azaba asoje imirimo ahabwa n’itorero, gusa avuga ko atazahagarika ivugabutumwa.
Ati “Ku itariki 29 z’ukwezi kwa Gatanu nzabyuka ntakiri umukozi wa Diyoseze. Ntabwo nzaba nahagaritse ubutumwa ariko nzaba nahagaritse kuyobora Paruwasi n’indi mirimo yose.”
Uyu mugabo wize imiyoborere avuga ko iyo umuntu asigaje imyaka itanu ngo ajye mu kiruhuko cy’iza bukuru aba agomba gutegura ubuzima bwe buri imbere kandi ngo we yarabirangije.
Yavuze ko iyo ari kwigisha ijambo ry’Imana bimunezeza ariko ko hari n’undi munezero yumva ategereje kandi ngo ntibizamubuza gutanga umusanzu mu itorero atari mu buyobozi.
Ati "Mfite undi munezero numva ntegereje imbere Imana nintiza ubuzima burenga imyaka 65. Namaze gukora gahunda y’akazi k’ubuzima bwanjye, uko nzasaza ntabwo nzasaza nsaziye mu biro, ntabwo mbyifuza.”
Akomoza ku byo azibandaho mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru, yavuze ko azakomeza kwandika ibitabo akarushaho no kwishimana n’umuryango we cyane abuzukuru be.
Ati “Maze kugira abuzukuru, byanezeza nicaye hamwe nkajya njyana abuzukuru ku ishuri ba nyina na ba se bagiye mu kazi nkajya kubabafatira bakaza nkabagaburira nkicarana nabo nkasekana nabo nkagira igihe cyo kunezerwa.”
Rev. Past. Dr. Antoine Rutayisire yatangiye ivugabutumwa 1983 akimara gukizwa. Mu 1990 yaretse akazi ko kuba mwalimu igihe cye agiharira kwigisha ijambo ry’Imana. Icyo gihe yahise ajya kuyobora Umuryango w’ivugabutumwa rishingiye kuri Bibiliya w’abanyeshuri ba Kaminuza, akaba ariwe wabaye Umunyamabanga mukuru wawo wa mbere kugeza mu 1994.
Nyuma Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, yayoboye umuryango w’ivugabutumwa wa AEE. Mu 2008 ayobora paruwasi ya Saint Etienne mu Biryogo ahava ajya kuyobora Paruwasi ya Remera arimo kugeza ubu.

Title: Korali Iriba y’i Huye igiye kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka 25 imaze mu ivugabutumwa
Body:
Korali Iriba ikorera umurimo w’ivugabutumwa ry’indirimbo muri ADEPR Paruwasi ya Taba mu Karere ka Huye mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo, yinjiye mu bikorwa by’urukundo bigamije gufasha abatishoboye mu myiteguro yo kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka 25 imaze.
Korali Iriba ikorera umurimo w’ivugabutumwa ry’indirimbo muri ADEPR Paruwasi ya Taba mu Karere ka Huye mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo, yinjiye mu bikorwa by’urukundo bigamije gufasha abatishoboye mu myiteguro yo kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka 25 imaze.
Iyi korali yashinzwe ku wa 15 Gashyantare 1995, yatangijwe n’abantu 18. Izina ryayo ryamenyekanye cyane mu ndirimbo zirimo ‘‘Nta kibasha’’, ‘‘Witinya’’, ‘‘Turiho ku bw’ubuntu’’, ‘‘Urakomeye’’ na ‘‘Icyampa’’.
Mu kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka 25 imaze ishinzwe, Korali Iriba yatangije ibikorwa byagutse byiswe “IribaWeek” bibanziriza ibyo birori biteganyijwe ku wa 16 Gashyantare 2020.
Korali Iriba yinjiye mu cyumweru cy’ibikorwa bibimburira isabukuru y’imyaka 25 biteganyijwe ku 3-9 Gashyantare 2020. Ni icyumweru cyateguwemo ibikorwa byo kubakira ubwiherero imiryango itanu itishoboye n’ibindi bikorwa by’urukundo.
Abajijwe impamvu bahisemo kubakira abatishoboye, Umuyobozi wa Korali Iriba, Mukasine Jeanne D’arc, yavuze ko bifuje kuvuga ubutumwa mu bikorwa.
Yagize ati “Twahisemo noneho kuvuga ubutumwa mu bikorwa kuko binazamura imibereho y’abantu, iki gikorwa kizakomeza n’ibindi twateguye.’’
Biteganyijwe ko ku wa 15 Gashyantare, Korali Iriba izagira umwiherero wo gushima Imana, naho ku wa 16 Gashyantare 2020 kuva saa Munani, ikore igitaramo cy’amashimwe akubiye muri Zaburi ya 107, kizabera ku rusengero rwa ADEPR Taba mu Karere ka Huye.
Abazacyitabira bazataramirwa na Korali Iriba ifatanyije na Korali Itabaza. Umuvugabutumwa uzakibwirizamo ni Umuvugizi wa ADEPR, Karuranga Ephrem.
Mu myaka 25, Korali Iriba ishima buri wese wagize uruhare mu kugira ngo umurimo ukomeze gutera imbere.
Korali Iriba igizwe n’abarenga 130 bari mu byiciro bitandukanye biganjemo abatuye mu duce two mu Mujyi wa Huye turimo Matyazo no ku Itaba n’abakorera mu bindi bice by’igihugu.
Mu myaka 25 imaze mu ivugabutumwa, Korali Iriba yashyize hanze album enye z’amajwi n’eshatu z’amashusho.

Title: Tanzania: Abantu 20 baguye mu mubyigano wabereye mu rusengero
Body:
Nibura abantu 20 bo muri Tanzania nibo baguye muvundo wabereye mu giterane ku mu Majyaruguru y’icyo gihugu, nyuma y’uko uwabwirizaga asutse hasi amavuta yise ko yera, abantu bakabyiganira kuyakoramo bizeye gukira indwara zitandukanye.
Nibura abantu 20 bo muri Tanzania nibo baguye muvundo wabereye mu giterane ku mu Majyaruguru y’icyo gihugu, nyuma y’uko uwabwirizaga asutse hasi amavuta yise ko yera, abantu bakabyiganira kuyakoramo bizeye gukira indwara zitandukanye.
Nyuma y’igiterane cyabaye kuri iki Cyumweru, Umuyobozi w’umujyi wa Moshi uherereye mu Majyaruguru ya Tanzania ibyo byabereyemo, Kippi Warioba, yavuze ko atewe impungenge n’uko umubare w’abapfuye ushobora gukomeza kwiyongera biturutse kuri uwo mubyigano.
Ati “Kugeza ubu abantu 20 bapfuye ariko imibare ishobora kwiyongera kuko hari abakomeretse.” Abakomeretse habarurwa 16.
Ibyo byago byabaye ubwo abantu benshi bari bitabiriye igiterane cyayobowe n’umupasiteri ukunzwe cyane muri icyo gihugu, Boniface Mwamposa, uyoboye itorero Arise and Shine Ministry ryo muri Tanzania.
Jennifer Temu wari muri ayo materaniro yabwiye Ibiro Ntaramakuru by’Abafaransa, AFP, ko ikibazo cyaje kuvuka ubwo Mwamposa wiyita intumwa y’Imana, "Apôtre", yasukaga ibyo yise amavuta yera hasi abantu bakabyiganira kuyakoramo.
Mwamposa yahise ahunga. Umuyobozi wa Polisi muri icyo gihugu Simon Sirro wemeje ko hapfuye abantu 20 mu kiganiro kuri Televisiyo y’igihugu muri Tanzania, TBC1, yasabye Mwamposa kwishyikiriza Polisi kuko ari umuntu uzwi, ntaho yacikira.
Yavuze ko Polisi igiye kureba uburyo amadini n’amatorero ategura amateraniro arimo abantu benshi.
Perezida John Magufuli na we yavuze ko ababajwe n’abantu 20 baguye i Moshi ndetse n’abandi 20 bahitanywe n’imyuzure mu Majyepfo ya Tanzania, mu Karere ka Lindi mu cyumweru gishize.

Title: Gatsibo: Umupasiteri n’Umubwiriza barwaniye mu materaniro, harakekwa ko bapfuye amaturo
Body:
Pasiteri Ignace Mbaraga, n’Umubwiriza witwa Sayinzoga Alex bakunze kwita Said, bo mu itorero Inkuru Nziza, barwaniye mu materaniro ku cyumweru tariki 26 Mutarama 2020.
Pasiteri Ignace Mbaraga, n’Umubwiriza witwa Sayinzoga Alex bakunze kwita Said, bo mu itorero Inkuru Nziza, barwaniye mu materaniro ku cyumweru tariki 26 Mutarama 2020.
Amakuru agera kuri IGIHE aravuga ko abo bagabo barwaniye imbere y’abayoboke b’ishami ry’Itorero Inkuru Nziza, riherereye mu Murenge wa Ngarama mu Karere ka Gatsibo.
Abakristu bahise batabaza inzego z’umutekano, ubu abo bagabo bombi bacumbikiwe kuri Sitasiyo y’Urwego rw’Ubugenzacyaha ya Ngarama.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Ngarama Rugaravu Jean Claude yabwiye IGIHE ko basanze bapfa amakimbirane bari bafitanye ashingiye ku kutubahana nubwo hari amakuru avuga ko baba bapfuye amaturo.
Ati “Barwanye bari bafitanye amatiku mu Itorero ryabo yo gusuzugurana, ejo rero barashwanye barwanira mu rusengero bari mu materaniro.”
Yavuze ko abakristu bahise babatabaza nk’inzego z’ibanze bafatanyije n’iz’umutekano basanga koko bari gushwana.
Ati “Twahise tuhagera abakristu badutabaje, dusanga barimo bashwana birumvikana bagombaga guhita bafatwa bagafungwa kuko bari bateje amakimbirane mu bakristu.”
Rugaravu yabwiye IGIHE ko iryo shami ry’itorero Inkuru Nziza bari baranarifungiye urusengero rikoreramo kubera rutujuje ibyangombwa, nyuma riza gukomeza amateraniro rwihishwa.
Ati “Ni itorero ubona ritanashinga twari twaranarifunze nyuma biza kugaragara ko baje kugenda bagasubiramo bataratubwira ariko ntabwo bapfa amaturo kuko si itorero rifatika. Barafunzwe bari muri RIB Ngarama.”
Rugaravu asaba abaturage kwirinda amakimbirane ariko na none afatiye kuri iryo torero asaba abakristu gusengera mu nsengero zujuje ibyangombwa.
Si ubwa mbere humvikana imirwano mu bayoboke b’itorero ry’Inkuru Nziza kuko nko mu 2017 abayobozi baryo bo mu Karere ka Ngoma ahitwa ku Cyasemakamba bafatanye mu mashati barwanira imbere y’imbaga y’abayoboke yari yagiye kumva ijambo ry’Imana bapfa amaturo no kuba bamwe barimuwe bakanga kujya aho bimuriwe bitwaje ko nta maturo atubutse ahaboneka.
Icyo gihe bamwe baranakomeretse kuko byageze n’aho bakristu bajya muri iyo mirwano yashyamiranyije abari bahasanzwe n’abari bahimuriwe.
Amakimbirane mu matorero akomeje kuvugwa no mu bindi bihugu. Mu minsi ishize mu mujyi wa Mombasa, muri Kenya, Elisha Misiko w’imyaka 55, yiyahuye nyuma yo kwica umugore we Ann Mghoi amutsinze mu rusengero bafatanyije gushinga rwitwa Ground of God ‘s gospel Ministries.

Title: Uko Kiliziya Gatolika yeguriwe ahahoze gereza ya 1930 ngo hubakwe katederali y’abantu 5000
Body:
Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali yeguriwe ubutaka bungana na hegitari 5.5 z’ahahoze gereza ya Nyarugenge izwi nka 1930, ngo ihubake katederali igezweho.
Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali yeguriwe ubutaka bungana na hegitari 5.5 z’ahahoze gereza ya Nyarugenge izwi nka 1930, ngo ihubake katederali igezweho.
Ubusanzwe Katederali ya Kigali iherereye mu Kiyovu mu Karere ka Nyarugenge ahari Paruwasi ya St Michel, aho ari nto ku buryo ibikorwa binini bitabasha kuhabera.
Umwaka ushize ubwo Musenyeri wa Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali, Antoine Kambanda, yimikwaga, ibirori byabereye muri Stade Amahoro i Remera.
Icyo gihe kandi yagaragarije abanya-Kigali, icyifuzo cyo kubaka ingoro y’Imana, Katederali y’umujyi kandi ihesha Imana icyubahiro.
Perezida Kagame na we witabiriye ibyo birori yemeye inkunga mu kubaka iyo katederali, yongeraho ko bishobotse yanubakwa ahantu hashya.
Ati “Tuzafatanya kuyubaka, twubake katederali nziza kandi icyo gihe nibikunda twanayubaka ahandi hashya, ariko bizava mu bushake bwa Kiliziya cyangwa mu bwumvikane tuzaba twagize mu gutera inkunga tugere kuri icyo cyifuzo kandi bidatinze.”
Mu kiganiro Musenyeri Kambanda yagiranye na TVR, yashimiye Umukuru w’Igihugu ko imvugo ye ari yo ngiro, kubera ko ubu yabafashije bagahabwa ikibanza.
Ati “Nyuma y’aho twagiye dusaba tureba n’ubuyobozi bw’umujyi, n’ubwa Minisiteri y’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu idushinzwe, tugenda tureba ahashoboka mu mujyi atari kure y’umujyi, ariko kandi hanatunganye, habereye, hanashoboka”.
Mgr Kambanda avuga ko byahuriranye n’uko ahahoze gereza ya 1930 hari ikibanza kandi ubuyobozi bw’umujyi bwifuza ko hakorerwa ikindi kintu.
Ati “Muri ibyo bintu rero byari byifujwe natwe twashyizemo igitekerezo cya katederali. Nyakubahwa Perezida wa Repubulika yarabyumvise kandi igitekerezo aragishyigikira tukaba tumushimira ko bahaduhaye ngo habe hakubakwa kiliziya ibereye umujyi”.
Mgr Kambanda avuga ko ubu harimo gukorwa igishushanyo kigendanye n’icyerekezo 2050 u Rwanda rufite.
Ati “Turateganya kiliziya yajyamo abantu 5000, ariko ikagira n’umwanya imbere ya kiliziya, iyo habaye nk’iminsi mikuru katederali igira umwanya imbere yayo aho abantu bashobora guteranira bageze nko ku 10 000 no kugeza kuri 20 000”.
Mgr Kambanda avuga ko hataramenyekana agaciro kubaka iyi katederali izatwara.
Ubuyobozi bw’Umujyi wa Kigali buherutse gutangaza ko mu mpera za Gashyantare, igishushanyo kizaba cyarangiye, kikazaba cyerekana imiterere ya katederali, ubushobozi bwayo n’ibindi, ku buryo imirimo yo kubaka izaba yarangiye mu mpera za 2021.
Bwavuze kandi ko mu rwego rwo gusigasira ibimenyetso by’amateka by’inyubako, Kiliziya yasabwe gutanga igishushanyo cyerekana uburyo bateganya kubungabunga inyubako zishaje zihari.
Mgr Kambanda yemeje ko ibyo bumvikanyeho n’umujyi ari ugukora inyigo y’uburyo amateka ya gereza yajya agaragara no mu kuhasura abantu bakamenya amateka yahabaye n’uko hahindutse ahantu h’umugisha.
Avuga ko kuba ahari gereza hagiye kujya Kiliziya ‘nk’abakristu tubibonamo ubutumwa bukomeye, ni ukuvuga ngo ahari ahantu ho gucibwa n’urupfu, ubungubu hagiye kuba ahantu h’umukiro n’ubuzima’.
Mgr Kambanda avuga ko ahubatse katederali ya St Michel hataratekerezwa ikizahakorerwa kuko ari ibintu byo kwigwahoku bufatanye n’ubuyobozi. Yahakanye kandi ko aho bahawe ari ingurane ya St Michel.

Title: Ese gusenga uhumirije hari icyo byongera ku Isengesho ?
Body:
Kimwe mu biranga abayoboke bo mu madini atandukanye yo hirya no hino ku Isi cyane cyane aya gikirisitu igihe bagiye gusenga, ni ugufunga amaso n’ubwo baba batazi impamvu babikora.
Kimwe mu biranga abayoboke bo mu madini atandukanye yo hirya no hino ku Isi cyane cyane aya gikirisitu igihe bagiye gusenga, ni ugufunga amaso n’ubwo baba batazi impamvu babikora.
N’ubwo gufunga amaso igihe umuntu ari gusenga byabaye nk’ihame mu madini atandukanye, nta byahumetswe byera na bimwe bigaragaza ko ari ngombwa kubikora igihe ugiye gusenga, bitandukanye n’ibindi Bibiliya yagiye itegeka nko kujya ahantu hatuje.
Umuyobozi wa Zion Temple mu ntara y’amajyepfo Pasiteri Eric Ruhagararabahunga avuga ko n’ubwo ntaho uyu muco wo gusenga umuntu ahumirije wanditse muri Bibiliya, ko ariko ufasha usenga kutarangara.
Ati “Ntaho twahita tubibona muri Bibiliya ako kanya ariko guhumiriza bigufasha kutarangara, usenze ureba hari igihe urangara, ikinyuraho cyose uba ukireba rero ntabwo uba witaye cyane kuri uriya muntu uri gusabana nawe, niyo mpamvu rero akenshi umuntu afunga amaso, n’ubwo ntaho Bibiliya ivuga ngo muzasenge mufunze amaso”.
Past. Ruhagararabahunga yongeyeho ko iyo usenze uhumirije Imana ibona ko ibyo uvuga bikuvuye ku mutima “Urumva ko iyo usenze uhumirije icya mbere nturangara ikindi n’uriya uri kuramya biratuma abona ko ukomeje mu byo ukora, bituma Imana ibona ko uyihanze amaso”.
N’ubwo gusenga bifasha usenga kutarangara, Pasiteri Ruhagararabahunga, avuga ko umuntu usenga areba kandi akabikora neza nta kosa aba akoze.
Umutoni Sandrine, Umukirisitu usengera muri Kiliziya Gatolika avuga ko kuri we gusenga ahumirije bigira icyo byongera ku isengesho.
Ati “Iyo mumpirije mba numva niyumva mu isengesho, nkumva ibyo ndi kuvuga bimvuye ku mutima, ariko iyo uri kureba hari ibintu byinshi bikurangaza ni yo waba uri ahantu hatari kunyura abantu”.
N’ubwo abakirisitu bavuga ko uyu muco wo guhumiriza ubafasha kutarangara, ku rundi ruhande abahanga mu mateka bo bavuga ko umuco wo gusenga umuntu ahumirije ukomoka mu bihe by’abami, aho umuntu atashoboraga kujya imbere y’umwami cyangwa undi muyobozi ngo amuhange amaso.
Kureba umuyobozi cyangwa umwami byafatwagwa nk’ikinyabupfura gike, ni yo mpamvu uwabajyaga imbere yafungaga amaso cyangwa akareba hasi.
Ibi byaje gukomeza no mu muco w’amadini, gufunga amaso mu gihe uri gusenga biba ikimenyetso cyo kwiyoroshya no kubaha uwo uri kubwira.

Title: Kiliziya Gatolika igiye kubaka Katederali nshya ya Kigali ahahoze gereza ya 1930
Body:
Kiliziya Gatolika igiye kubaka Katederali igezweho ya Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali ahahoze gereza ya Nyarugenge benshi bazi nka 1930, ni nyuma y’igihe kirekire hibazwa ikizakorerwa ku butaka bwahozeho iyi gereza yimuriwe i Mageragere mu 2018.
Kiliziya Gatolika igiye kubaka Katederali igezweho ya Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali ahahoze gereza ya Nyarugenge benshi bazi nka 1930, ni nyuma y’igihe kirekire hibazwa ikizakorerwa ku butaka bwahozeho iyi gereza yimuriwe i Mageragere mu 2018.
Ubusanzwe Katederali ya Kigali iherereye mu Kiyovu mu Karere ka Nyarugenge ahari Paruwasi ya St Michel, aho ari nto kandi ikaba ishaje.
Umuyobozi w’ishami ry’imiturire n’imitunganyirize y’Umujyi wa Kigali, Eng Mugisha Fred, avuga ko ubutaka bw’ahahoze gereza bungana hegitari 5.5, Kiliziya Gatolika yamaze kwemererwa gukora igenamigambi y’uko yabukoresha nubwo ari igitekerezo kikiri mu ntangiriro.
Ati “Hari igitekerezo cyo kwegurira ubutaka Kiliziya Gatolika yerekanye ubushake bwo kubwubakamo katederali. Barimo gukora ku mushinga ugaragaza ubwoko bw’inyubako bifuza kuhashyira hanyuma tububegurire”.
Mugisha avuga ko mu rwego rwo gusigasira ibimenyetso by’amateka by’inyubako, Kiliziya yasabwe gutanga igishushanyo cyerekana uburyo bateganya kubungabunga inyubako zishaje zihari.
Akomeza avuga ko icyo Umujyi wa Kigali ushaka ari ukubungabunga ibimenyetso by’amateka ku buryo byaba n’ibisurwa n’abakerarugendo. Uyu akaba ari umurongo w’ibanze wahawe kiliziya.
Mugisha avuga ko mu mpera za Gashyantare, igishushanyo kizaba cyarangiye, kikazaba cyerekana imiterere ya katederali, ubushobozi bwayo n’ibindi, ku buryo imirimo yo kubaka izaba yarangiye mu mpera za 2021.
Mu birori byo kwakira Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda nka Arikiyepisikopi wa Kigali asimbuye Musenyeri Thaddée Ntihinyurwa wagiye mu kiruhuko cy’izabukuru, yagaragaje inyota nyinshi yo kubaka katederali.
Icyo gihe yagize ati “Bakirisitu b’uyu mujyi, icyifuzo ni uko twazubaka ingoro y’Imana, Katederali y’uyu mujyi kandi ihesha Imana icyubahiro.”
Perezida Kagame na we witabiriye ibyo birori yemeye inkunga mu kubaka iyo katederali, yongeraho ko bishobotse yanubakwa ahantu hashya.
Ati “Tuzafatanya kuyubaka, twubake katederali nziza kandi icyo gihe nibikunda twanayubaka ahandi hashya, ariko bizava mu bushake bwa Kiliziya cyangwa mu bwumvikane tuzaba twagize mu gutera inkunga tugere kuri icyo cyifuzo kandi bidatinze.”
Mu gitambo cya Misa ya Noheli iheruka, Musenyeri wa Arkidiyosezi ya Kigali, Antoine Kambanda, yakomoje kuri iyi katederali avuga ko umushinga wo kuyubaka urimo kugenda neza.

Title: Korali Shalom y’i Nyarugenge yasohoye indirimbo ibimburira iziri kuri album yayo nshya
Body:
Korali Shalom ikorera umurimo w’ivugabutumwa ry’indirimbo muri ADEPR Nyarugenge yasohoye indirimbo ya mbere izagaragara kuri album nshya iteganya kumurika mu 2020.
Korali Shalom ikorera umurimo w’ivugabutumwa ry’indirimbo muri ADEPR Nyarugenge yasohoye indirimbo ya mbere izagaragara kuri album nshya iteganya kumurika mu 2020.
Iyi ndirimbo yiswe “Wampaye amahoro’’ yubakiye ku buhamya bw’abantu Imana yatuye imitwaro yari ibaremereye ikabaha amahoro yo mu mutima, bakaba basigaye bagenda bemye.
Korali Shalom imaze kugwiza igikundiro mu ruhando rw’abakunzi b’umuziki uhimbaza Imana iri mu zigezweho muri ADEPR.
Urukundo igirirwa rwazamuwe n’indirimbo zifitemo ubutumwa bwururutsa imitima y’abababaye zirimo “Nzirata’’, “Abami n’abategetsi’’, “Nzamamaza”, ‘‘Nyabihanga’’ n’izindi.
‘Wampaye amahoro’ ni indirimbo ya mbere igiye hanze yatanzwe nk’impano ku bakunzi b’ibihangano bihimbaza Imana mu mwaka wa 2020.
Visi Perezida wa Korali Shalom, Ngamijimana Charles, yabwiye IGIHE ko iyi ndirimbo itangiza umushinga wa album nshya iri gutegurwa.
Yagize ati “Indirimbo yitwa ‘Wampaye amahoro’ ni yo twatangiranye umwaka wa 2020, ibimburiye izindi ziri kuri album y’amajwi y’indirimbo umunani izajya hanze mu 2020.’’
Ubutumwa buri muri iki gihangano cy’iminota ine n’amasegonda 52 buganisha ku ‘mahoro atangwa n’Uwiteka ku wamwisunze arushye.’
Ngamijimana yavuze ko uyu mwaka bazakomeza kwegera abakunzi b’ibihangano byabo no kubategurira ibikorwa byagutse cyane ko mu 2019, Korali Shalom yibanze cyane mu ngendo z’ivugabutumwa.
Ati “Ntitwagiye kure y’abakunzi bacu. Uyu mwaka dufitemo igitaramo cyagutse turi gutegura. Umwaka ushize twawuhariye ingendo, twagiye aho twatumiwe kuvuga ubutumwa.’’
Korali Shalom yakoreye ingendo mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu birimo ibitaramo yakoreye mu turere twa Rubavu (Rubona), Rwamagana (Rwikubo), Musanze (Nyarubande), Huye (Matyazo) no mu Mujyi wa Kigali aho yaririmbye mu Umucyo Live Concert yabereye muri Dove Hotel, Ibihamya Live concert yabereye muri ADEPR Gatenga, mu Bibare i Remera no kuri Maison des Jeunes Kimisagara aho batangiye ubutumwa mu gikorwa cyo kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge.
Umwaka wa 2019 wayibereye mwiza kuko yanakoze ibitaramo mu yandi madini arimo irya Methodiste Libre n’iry’Abangilikani mu Giporoso kwa Rev. Pasiteri Rutayisire Antoine. Yanaremeye abatishoboye aho yakoreye umuganda rusange mu Karere ka Nyabihu.
Korali Shalom imaze imyaka 34 itangijwe ni ubuheta mu makorali y’i Nyarugenge nyuma ya Hoziana yayitanze mu ivugabutumwa ry’indirimbo.
Yashinzwe mu 1986 ari korali y’abana bato, yitwaga “Umunezero”. Icyo gihe muri ADEPR Nyarugenge hari korali nkuru imwe ariyo Hoziyana. Mu 1990 yemerewe kwitwa izina, ifata “Shalom” rimaze gushinga imizi. Iyi korali imaze gukora album enye z’amajwi n’ebyiri z’amashusho.
Iya kabiri iriho indirimbo umunani izamurikwa mu 2020. Amashusho yayo yafatiwe mu gitaramo gikomeye cya Korali Shalom cyiswe ‘‘Imbere ni heza’’ cyabereye muri Kigali Convention Centre mu 2018.
Korali Shalom igizwe n’abaririmbyi 105 hatabariwemo ababa hanze y’u Rwanda.

Title: I Kibeho ku butaka butagatifu hagiye kubakwa Bazilika
Body:
Kiliziya Gatolika ku bufatanye n’Akarere ka Nyaruguru igiye gutangira imirimo yo kubaka Bazilika mu gace kabereyemo amabonekerwa ka Kibeho.
Kiliziya Gatolika ku bufatanye n’Akarere ka Nyaruguru igiye gutangira imirimo yo kubaka Bazilika mu gace kabereyemo amabonekerwa ka Kibeho.
Nyuma y’aho Igishushanyo mbonera cyerekana imiterere y’iyi Basilika kigiriye hanze, kuwa 9 Mutarama Ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Nyaruguru n’ubwa Kiliziya Gatolika bwahuye n’abazayubaka kugira ngo harebwe uburyo imirimo yo kuyubaka izashyirwa mu bikorwa.
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Nyaruguru Habitegeko François yavuze ko imirimo y’ibanze yo kubaka iyi Bazilika igeze kure ndetse ko mu 2021 izaba yuzuye.
Yagize ati “Izuzura mu Ugushyingo 2021. Imirimo y’ibanze irimo iy’inyigo no gushyiraho ikigega kigamije gukusanya inkunga yararangiye”.
Iyi Bazilika izaba yubatse ku butaka butagatifu bw’i Kibeho busanzwe bugendererwa n’Abakirisitu batari bake kubera amabonekerwa yahabereye mu myaka ya 1980.
Kuri ubu inzego zose bireba zarangije gusuzuma ibikenewe, bikaba biteganyijwe ko imirimo yo kubaka iyi Bazilika izatwara amafaranga y’u Rwanda agera kuri miliyari 70.
Binyuze kuri Twitter, ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Nyaruguru bwasabye abikorera gushora imari muri Nyaruguru, cyane cyane mu bijyanye n’ibikorwa remezo by’ubukerarugendo n’amahoteli.
Ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Nyaruguru buvuga ko kandi iyi Bazilika izaba ifite ibindi bikorwa remezo birimo inzu z’amacumbi zishobora basanzwe bagenderera aka karere buri mwaka mu ngendo z’iyobokamana, by’umwihariko abaza ku munsi wizihizwaho kujya mu ijuru kwa Bikira Mariya.
Tariki 28 Ugushyingo 1981, ni bwo Bikira Mariya yabonekeye umukobwa wa mbere witwa Mumureke Alphonsine wigaga mu Rwunge rw’Amashuri rwa Mère du Verbe i Kibeho.
Nyuma y’umwaka umwe, yongeye kubonekera uwitwa Mukamazimpaka Anathalie, nyuma yongera kubonekera Mukangango Marie Claire na bo bigaga kuri iryo shuri. Bose yabahaga ubutumwa bagomba kugeza ku batuye Isi.

Title: Abayobozi bagera kuri 700 bitabiriye amasengesho yo gusengera igihugu (Amafoto)
Body:
Abayobozi muri Guverinoma, abikorera ku giti cyabo, abagize sosiyete sivile n’inshuti z’u Rwanda zavuye mu bihugu bigera ku 10, kuri iki Cyumweru bateraniye muri Kigali Convention Centre mu masengesho yo gusengera igihugu azwi nka National Prayer Breakfast.
Abayobozi muri Guverinoma, abikorera ku giti cyabo, abagize sosiyete sivile n’inshuti z’u Rwanda zavuye mu bihugu bigera ku 10, kuri iki Cyumweru bateraniye muri Kigali Convention Centre mu masengesho yo gusengera igihugu azwi nka National Prayer Breakfast.
Aya masengesho yitabiriwe n’abagera kuri 700, abaye mu gihe u Rwanda rusoje icyerekezo 2020 cy’iterambere, no gutangiza icyerekezo 2050.
Ategurwa n’Umuryango, Rwanda Leaders Fellowship, akaba afite insanganyamatsiko igira iti “Imiyoborere Izana Impinduka:Kwishimira aho tugeze-Dutegura ejo hahaza.”
Aya masengesho yatangijwe mu 1995 agamije gushyira hamwe abayobozi bakuru mu kwiyegereza Imana, bagasangira, hakabaho gusengera igihugu n’abayobozi bacyo ndetse bagasangira ijambo ry’Imana.
Ku nshuro ya mbere yabereye muri Hotel Hotel des Mille Collines tariki 1 Nzeri 1995, kuva icyo gihe iki gikorwa kitabirwa n’abayobozi batandukanye n’abandi.
Ay’uyu mwaka azaba ari ayo gushimira ibyo Imana yakoreye Igihugu ariko no gusengera abayobozi bacyo bagashyirwa mu maboko y’Imana.
Aya masengesho abaye ahurirana kandi n’igihe u Rwanda rurimo kwishimira ibyo rwagezeho mu cyerekezo 2020 rwari rwarihaye no gutangira icyerekezo 2020.
Hagendewe kuri iyi nsanganyamatsiko, aya masengesho afite intego yo kureba ibyakozwe no gushimira urugendo rwagenzwe, ariko no kureba aho baganisha igihugu.
Agamije kandi kugira umuco wo gushimira bitari gusa Imana ahubwo n’abo yakoresheje ngo babe bagejeje aho igihugu kiri uyu munsi, kwiga ibyakozwe n’indangagaciro z’Imana yashyize mu bantu, ibi bigafasha kubaha inzira nziza yo gukomeza imbere.
Mu masengesho y’umwaka ushize, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko bidakwiye ko umuyobozi abaho neza mu gihe abo areberera bafite ibibazo, ashimangira ko biteye isoni kumubona ashyiriye Imana abaturage yamuhaye kuyobora barwaye bwaki.
Yagize ati “Njye rwose mpora mfite impungenge ku kuzashorera abantu barwaye bwaki, bashonje, bameze nabi nkavuga nti ‘Mana ng’aba abantu bawe wanshinze’. Ntabwo umutima wanjye ujyanye na byo. Numva bidakwiye. Kugira ngo utazashorera abantu bameze batyo, ikintu cya mbere ni uko buri muyobozi bikwiye kumutera isoni. Mugomba kugira isoni. Iyo wemera indangagaciro ukazibura bikwiriye kugutera isoni.”
Yakomeje avuga ko iterambere rirambye rikwiye gushingira ku ndangagaciro y’imikorere hagati y’abayobozi n’abayoborwa.
Amafoto: Niyonzima Moses

Title: Prophet Sultan yasabye korali ye kuririmba injyana zigezweho, ashimagiza Kinyatrap ya Bushali
Body:
Umuyobozi wa River of Joy and Hope Ministries, Prophet Sultan Eric, yahishuye ko akunda umuraperi Hagenimana Jean Paul [Bushali The Trigger], anasaba korali yo mu itorero rye kuririmba mu njyana zikunzwe kuko Imana ikwiye ibigezweho.
Umuyobozi wa River of Joy and Hope Ministries, Prophet Sultan Eric, yahishuye ko akunda umuraperi Hagenimana Jean Paul [Bushali The Trigger], anasaba korali yo mu itorero rye kuririmba mu njyana zikunzwe kuko Imana ikwiye ibigezweho.
Ni ubutumwa yatanze mu materaniro yo ku wa 5 Mutarama 2019 yabereye Cosmos i Nyamirambo aho itorero riri; yibanze ku ntego y’uko abakirisitu bakwiriye gusenga mu kuri no mu mwuka.
Ubwo yari ageze mu mwanya wo kwakira amashimwe ku buhanuzi bwasohoye, Munyemana Eric [Prophet Sultan] yavuze ko akunda umuraperi Bushali ndetse ko azamuha impano.
Yatangiye aririmba ati “Ese ni muebue, ni tuebue?’’ Abari mu iteraniro bahise basekera rimwe. Yateye Hallelujah, akomeza n’indirimbo ya Bushali yitwa ‘‘Kinyatrap’’.
Yakomeje ati ‘‘Umwana w’umwirabura, ….Kinyatrap ku mugongo [akabisubiramo].’’
Ibi yabikoraga anabyina nk’ugerageza kwigana Bushali, akabaza ati ‘‘Hallelujah! Siko babyina?’’ abakirisitu bakamwikiriza banamwenyura.
Prophet Sultan ati ‘‘Abaziranye na we bazamubwire ko hari umuhanuzi umukunda. Amahoro abe kuri Bushali, akomeze kuzamuka, abahanzi bacu bakomeze kuzamuka mu izina rya Yesu. Nta kibazo mfitanye na bo, bataramana neza.’’
Prophet Sultan yasabye Korali Voice of Life yo mu itorero rye kugendana n’ibigezweho no kuririmba injyana zikunzwe.
Ati “Korali musirimuke, murusheho kuba abasirimu, muse neza. Korali yacu yarazamutse. Imana yacu ishaka ibintu bishya. Ishaka ko tuyisenga twambaye amakote agezweho kuko ari Imana ijyana n’ibigezweho. Ni Imana y’abazima n’ibizima.’’
Abajije injyana ikunzwe cyane, yasubijwe ko ari Trap. Ati “Niyo ba Cardi B baririmba?’’
Belcalis Marlenis Almánzar azwi mu muziki nka Cardi B. Uyu muraperikazi w’imyaka 27 ari mu bagezweho muri Amerika; akora injyana ya Trap ifatwa nka hip hop igezweho ariko yavukiye mu Majyepfo ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ahagana mu 1990.
Mu bahanzi bakora iyi njyana harimo T.I., Gucci Mane, Waka Flocka Flame, 2 Chainz, Lil Uzi Vert na 21 Savage.
Bushali washimagijwe na Prophet Sultan aheruka kwishimirwa bidasanzwe mu gitaramo ngarukamwaka cya East African Party cyabereye i Kigali ku wa 1 Mutarama 2019.
Umwaka wa 2019, Bushali ni wo wamuzamuriye igikundiro, yitabiriye ibitaramo bikomeye birimo Iwacu Muzika Festival, MTN Izihirwe n’ibindi.
Bushali yatangiye umuziki mu mpera za 2013. Izina rye ryazamuwe n’indirimbo ‘Nituebue’ yahuriyemo na B-Threy n’uwitwa Slum Drip.
Afite album zirimo ‘Nyiramubande’ n’iyo yise ‘Ku gasima’ iriho indirimbo zikunzwe; iyi iriho indirimbo 12 zirimo iyitwa ‘Kinyatrap’, ‘Sindi Mubi’, ‘Zunguzayi’, ‘Ipafu’, ‘Kinyarock’, ‘Mamayiwe’, ‘Kugasima’, ‘Inganjyi’, ‘Ayura’, ‘Bitinze’, ‘Impanda’ na ‘Niyibizi’.
Prophet ni umuhanuzi uvuga ko yasigiwe guhanurira amahanga. Mu ntangiriro za 2018, yahaye abakirisitu be ‘papier mouchoir’ zo kwifashisha mu gukemura ibibazo.
Imyemerere y’abayoboke be ishingiye ku kuba Yesu yaratanze imbabazi z’iteka ryose ku byaha bakoze, ibyo bakora ubu n’ibyo bazakora mu bihe bizaza.
Hari abakirisitu yatuyeho gukira indwara zirimo ibibyimba byo mu nda na kanseri ndetse hari n’abatanze ubuhamya ko bakize, banitwaza inyandiko zo kwa muganga zibishimangira.
Amafoto: Muhizi Serge na Munyarugerero Gift

Title: Kenya: Umupasiteri yiyahuye nyuma yo kwicira umugore mu rusengero
Body:
Mu mujyi wa Mombasa Elisha Misiko w’imyaka 55, yiyahuye nyuma yo kwica umugore we Ann Mghoi amutsinze mu rusengero bafatanyije gushinga rwitwa Ground of God ‘s gospel Ministries.
Mu mujyi wa Mombasa Elisha Misiko w’imyaka 55, yiyahuye nyuma yo kwica umugore we Ann Mghoi amutsinze mu rusengero bafatanyije gushinga rwitwa Ground of God ‘s gospel Ministries.
Uyu mugabo yishe umugore we amuziza ko yamwangiye kureba abana be nyuma yo gutandukana ndetse agashaka no gutwara itorero bafatanyije gushinga.
Mtengo Amuri, umwe mu bagize iryo torero, yatangaje ko Misiko n’umugore we bari bamaze imyaka umunani bashinze iryo torero, nyamara bakunze gushwana kenshi bapfa imitungo no kuryegukana.
Kuri iki Cyumweru ahagana saa tatu za mu gitondo, nibwo Misiko yinjiye mu rusengero ruri ahitwa Chembani, ahita yicara iruhande rw’umugore we. Abakirisitu bakomeje amateraniro bisanzwe.
Mu gihe amateraniro yari agezemo hagati, Misiko yarahagurutse yegera umugore we ahita amutera icyuma mu mugongo inshuro nyinshi. Mu gihe yari agiye kumukata ingoto, umugore yamufasha amaboko, undi amutera ikindi cyuma mu kiganza aramukomeretsa.
Abakirisitu bahise bahagoboka bafata uwo mugabo, umugore bahita bamujyana kwa muganga. Mu gihe bari bagikubana bajyana umugore ku bitaro, umugabo na we yabaciye mu rihumye yitera icyuma mu ijosi arapfa.
Umugore yajyanywe kwa muganga, agezeyo ahita apfa kubera ibikomere byinshi.
Bamwe mu nshuti z’uyu muryango batangaje ko bahoranaga amakimbirane ndetse ngo bari baherutse gutandukana.
Uhagararariye Polisi mu gace ka Kisauni, Julius Kiragu yavuze ko uyu mugore yatewe icyuma mu mugongo , mu kiganza ndetso no mu nda ari nabyo byamuviriyemo urupfu.
 Yakomeje avuga ko Misiko yari yarabigambiriye nkuko yabigaragaje mu rwandiko yasize yanditse mbere yo kwiyahura.
Misiko mu rwandiko yavuze ko uwo mugore yari yaramubujije kureba abana be nyuma yuko batandukanye ndetse akanashaka kwikubira itorero bafatanyije gushinga, kandi bari bacyishyura ideni rya banki bafashe ngo barishinge.
Itorero Ground of God ‘s gospel Ministries ryatangiye mu myaka 8 ishize aho yari imaze kugira abayoboke benshi mu gihugu ariko kubera intonganya z’abarishinze, bari batangiye kurivamo, nkuko Daily Nation yabitangaje.

Title: Apôtre Gitwaza yimitse abashumba barimo Pasiteri Ndizeye wayoboye GBU-KHI
Body:
Umushumba w’Itorero Zion Temple Celebration Center ku Isi, Apôtre Dr. Paul Gitwaza, yimikishije amavuta aninjiza mu murimo w’ivugabutumwa abapasiteri bashya batandatu.
Umushumba w’Itorero Zion Temple Celebration Center ku Isi, Apôtre Dr. Paul Gitwaza, yimikishije amavuta aninjiza mu murimo w’ivugabutumwa abapasiteri bashya batandatu.
Uyu muhango wabereye muri Zion Temple Gatenga ku wa Gatandatu, tariki ya 4 Mutarama 2020.
Abasizwe amavuta y’ubushumba bari baherekejwe n’abafasha babo baturutse muri paruwase zitandukanye yo mu Rwanda. Barimo Gisore Richard w’i Rusizi, Sentozi August uhagarariye Rwamagana, Ngendahayo Jacques wotorewe guhagararira itorero rya Nyamagabe akaba yungirijwe na Habyarimana Alphonse, Ndizeye Olivier uhagarariye Itorero rya Ntarama na Wironja David w’i Bukavu.
Apôtre Gitwaza yasabye abasizwe amavuta kugira ubunyangamugayo no kubaha neza inshingano bahawe.
Yakomeje avuga ko ‘‘Ubu iyi ndahiro ibari ku mutwe kubera ko mwabivugiye imbere y’abamalayika n’itorero. Ikibazo muzagira muzaze munyegere tuzagikemura kandi mukomeze mukorere Imana.’’
Mu byo bahamagariwe harimo kwamamaza ubutumwa bwiza, umuzuko wa Kirisitu no kurinda itorero.
Gitwaza yabasabye kuba abungeri beza, ba bandi batabona isega igeze mu bana b’intama bagahunga.
Yakomeje ati “Ni umugambi w’Imana kuduha abungeri, ni umugambi w’Imana kwita ku ntama kandi buri ntama ikeneye umwungeri ariko siko buri mwungeri wese ari mwiza. Hari abungeri bakorera ibihembo n’abakoreshwa n’umuhamagaro.”
“Bibiliya iravuga ngo nzabaha abungeri bahwanye n’umutima wanjye. Umutima wa Yesu, umutima w’Imana ni umutima w’ubwungeri kuko Yesu ni Umwungeri usumba abandi. Bibiliya iravuga ngo Umwungeri mukuru naza azatanga ingororano.”
Pasiteri Ndizeye Olivier uhagarariye Itorero rya Ntarama rimaze umwaka rifunguye azwiho kugira ishyaka ryo guhindura benshi kuza kuri Kirisitu yatangarije IGIHE yishimiye inshingano nshya yahawe.
Ati “Ncishijwe bugufi imbere y’Imana n’abantu guhabwa inshingano zo kuba umushumba w’Imana n’abantu. Ni umurimo ukomeye ariko ibyo Imana inshakaho nari mfite isezerano guhera mu 2005 ryo kuzayobora ubwoko bw’Imana. Imyaka 15 irashize none uyu munsi birasohoye ; gusigwa bizana izindi mbaraga; nciye bugufi izo mbaraga zizankoreremo kugira ngo nkore ibyo Imana ishaka muri iki gihe.’’
Pasiteri Ndizeye yabaye Umuyobozi w’Umuryango w’Ivugabutumwa mu Ishuri rikuru ry’Ubuvuzi rya Kigali (KHI) rizwi nka GBU-KHI Nyamishaba.
Yashimiye cyane umufasha we Benimana Nadège umuba hafi cyane mu murimo Imana yamuhamagariye no kumusunikira neza mu muhamagaro we.
Pasiteri Ndizeye yakiriye agakiza ku wa 4 Ugushyingo 2001 ubwo yigaga mu mwaka wa kane w’amashuri yisumbuye kuri Groupe Scolaire de Rilima, ari naho yatangiriye umurimo w’ivugabutumwa, akomereza muri Groupe Scolaire de Kabare aho yagiye ayobora ivugabutumwa no gutoza abigishwa.
Yayoboye Umuryango w’Ivugabutumwa muri Kaminuza (Groupe Biblique Universitaire) muri KHI akaba ari n’umwe mu bakomeje gushyigikira uyu murimo muri za Kaminuza mu itsinda rigizwe n’abarangije kaminuza banyuze muri GBU bari mu kazi. Yakuriye anakorera umurimo w’Imana mu Itorero rya Miracle Center Rubirizi ari naho yasengewe bwa mbere nk’umukuru w’itorero.
Abashumba bimitswe batanze isezerano ryo kubaha umuhamagaro, kuba abizerwa no kwamamaza ubutumwa bwa Yesu Kirisitu nta kujenjeka.

Title: USA: Itorero ry’aba-méthodiste rigiye gucikamo ibice kubera gushyingira abahuje ibitsina
Body:
Abayoboke b’itorero ry’aba-méthodiste bo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, batangaje umugambi wo gutandukana kubera kutumvikana ku kibazo cyo gushyingira abaryamana bahuje ibitsina.
Abayoboke b’itorero ry’aba-méthodiste bo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, batangaje umugambi wo gutandukana kubera kutumvikana ku kibazo cyo gushyingira abaryamana bahuje ibitsina.
Abayoboke b’iri torero bafata uyu mugambi nk’igisubizo kirambye ku makimbirane amaze igihe muri iri torero, kandi biteguye kuwemeza bidasubirwaho muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka, nk’uko byemejwe kuri uyu wa Gatanu.
Iri torero ryigaruriye abayoboke hafi miliyoni 13 ku isi hose, ni irya kabiri rifite abayoboke benshi mu madini ya giporotesitanti muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Uyu mugambi wo gutandukana niwemezwa bidasubirwaho, hazavuka ibice bibiri muri iri torero, aho abadashyigikiye ishyingirwa ry’abaryamana bahuje ibitsina bazarema itorero ryabo rishya; naho abashyigikiye iryo shyingirwa bagakomeza igice cyabo cyigenga, kandi bagaha amasakamentu abo baryamana bahuje ibitsina.
Muri Gashyantare 2019, mu nama rusange y’itorero ry’aba-méthodiste yabereye ahitwa Saint Louis, muri Leta ya Missouri, haganiriwe mu buryo bwihariye ku bijyanye n’imibonano mpuzabitsina ndetse n’ubumwe bw’itorero.
Icyo gihe hanabaye amatora aho 53% by’abari bahagarariye abandi, batoye bamagana ishyingirwa ry’abaryamana bahuje imiterere y’umubiri.
Nyuma yo kutumvikana kuri iyo ngingo, abagize inama nyobozi y’itorero banzuye ko gutandukana ari bwo buryo bwiza bwo guhosha uko kutumvikana, mu rwego rwo guha uburenganzira buri ruhande rugakomeza imyizerere yarwo.
Muri Gicurasi 2020, nibwo hateganyijwe inama rusange izemeza bidasubirwaho uwo mushinga wo gutandukana, ikazabera mu mujyi wa Minneapolis.
Umuyobozi w’abashyigikiye gushyingira abaryamana bahuje imiterere y’umubiri muri iri torero, Thomas Berlin, yavuze ko anejejwe cyane n’iki cyemezo kuko itorero ry’aba-méthodiste ryabonye uburyo buzana igisubizo ku makimbirane yari amaze igihe.
Uku gutandukana nikuramuka kugezweho, uruhande rw’abadashyigikiye gushyingira abaryamana bahuje imiterere y’umubiri ruzahabwa miliyoni 25 z’amadolari ya Amerika.

Title: Iki cyorezo cyagaragaje ko nta gihangange, dukeneye ubufasha bw’Imana- Mgr Kambanda
Body:
Umushumba wa Arikidiyosezi ya Kigali akaba n’Umuyobozi wa Diyosize ya Kibungo, Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda yavuze ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyugarije Isi muri iki gihe cyagaragaje ko nta gihangage kiri mu Isi bityo ko bisaba kwiyambaza Imana cyane igatanga ubufasha.
Umushumba wa Arikidiyosezi ya Kigali akaba n’Umuyobozi wa Diyosize ya Kibungo, Musenyeri Antoine Kambanda yavuze ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyugarije Isi muri iki gihe cyagaragaje ko nta gihangage kiri mu Isi bityo ko bisaba kwiyambaza Imana cyane igatanga ubufasha.
Musenyeri Kambanda yabitangarije IGIHE kuri iki Cyumweru, mu gihe abayoboke ba Kiliziya Gatolika bizihiza umunsi wa Mashami bazirikanaho umunsi Yezu Kristu yinjiraga mu Murwa wa Yeruzalemu nk’Umwami, abaturage bakamusasira imyenda yabo.
Mgr Kambanda yavuze ko muri Kiliziya Gatolika ari umunsi ukomeye cyane batangiriraho icyumweru gitagatifu.
Ati “Ni icyumweru gikomeye mu mateka y’ukwemera kwacu. Ni icyumweru kitwinjiza muri Pasika nyir’izina nyuma y’iminsi 40 tumaze mu gisibo twibuka ububabare bwa Nyagasani, ari n’igihe cyo kwihana kugira ngo dushobore gutunganira Imana.”
Mu bihe bisanzwe, umunsi nk’uyu abakirisitu baturutse imihanda yose babaga bari mu nsengero bafite amashami y’imikindo bishimira kwakira Yezu nk’umwami wabo.
Kuri iki Cyumweru si ko biri bugende kuko abaturarwanda bari mu ngo zabo, bubahiriza amabwiriza yashyizweho na Guverinoma yo kwirinda icyorezo cya coronavirus gikomeje guhitana imbaga hirya no hino.
Kuba abantu bari mu ngo, Musenyeri Kambanda ntabibonamo ikibazo ahubwo avuga ko ari umwanya mwiza wo gusenga batakambira Imana kugira ngo itange ubufasha mu gutsinda Coronavirus kuko abatuye Isi bananiwe.
Ati “Kuguma mu nzu biduha umwanya wo gusenga cyane cyane no kubona ko Imana ariyo ifite ububasha. Iki cyorezo cyagaragaraje ko nta mukuru, nta muto, nta gihangange. Ko nta mukire, nta mukene, twese twicisha bugufi. Abafite ubushobozi n’intwaro zikomeye ntawe ushobora kukirwanya ngo agitsinde, bigaragara ko dukeneye ubufasha bw’Imana.”
Yavuze ko kuba ibihe bya Pasika bisanze abakirisitu bari mu ngo zabo, nta mpungenge biteye ku kwizihiza uwo munsi Yezu yatsinzeho urupfu, ngo kuko n’Abiyisilaheli bizihirizaga Pasika mu ngo iwabo.
Ati “Pasika Abiyisilaheli buri umwe yayizihirizaga mu rugo rwe, ngo Imana ibakingire urupfu baraye iri bubakure mu bucakara mu Misiri. Urugo rwarateranaga rukizihiza Pasika, rugasangira intama ya Pasika. Biratwibutsa rero ko natwe dushobora kwizihiza Pasika mu ngo zacu, umukuru w’umuryango agateranya umuryango, agasenga bakumva ijambo ry’Imana.”
Ni ibihe byo kuzirikana ba nyakabyizi…
Gusabwa kuguma mu ngo, hari abo byabereye ihurizo cyane abaryaga ari uko bavuye gukora, bazwi nka ba nyakabyizi.
Leta yashyize uburyo bwo gufasha abantu nk’abo badafite icyo barya muri ibi bihe, ariko siko bigera kuri buri wese bitewe n’ubwinshi bw’abakeneye ubufasha.
Musenyeri Kambanda yavuze ko muri ibi bihe, abakirisitu bafite ubushobozi bakwiriye kugoboka bagenzi babo batishoboye, bakagendera ku byo amategeko y’Imana abasaba.
Ati “Urukundo rwa kivandimwe ari ryo tegeko rikuru ry’Imana rudusaba ko tumenya abaturanyi, ba Lazaro b’abakene duturanye tukabasangiza ku byo dufite bityo Imana yatwoherereje umwana wayo akemera kutubera igitambo ngo adutsindire urupfu, inaduherekeze mu gutsinda urupfu n’iki cyorezo cyugarije isi.”
Yavuze ko no ku rwego rwa Kiliziya Gatolika, batangiye gushishikariza imiryango remezo gukusanya inkunga, abishoboye bagafasha abakene.
Umuryango ufasha, Caritas wa Kiliziya Gatolika nawo watangiye kwegeranya inkunga y’ibiribwa bikagezwa muri Paruwasi zitandukanye kugira ngo abatishoboye bagobokwe muri ibi bihe.
Musenyeri Kambanda yavuze ko bahereye cyane mu bice by’imijyi kuko ariho hakenewe ubufasha kurusha ahandi.
Ati “Niho bibabaje cyane kuko mu cyaro ho iyo umuntu afite urutoki munsi y’urugo, umurima w’imyumbati cyangwa uw’ibijumba, ntabwo aba amerewe nabi nk’uri hano mu mujyi. Turashishikariza abari mu cyaro mu mirima guhinga kuko iki ni igihe cyo guhinga , ntibibacike kugira ngo ejo bazaramire n’abandi.”
Kugeza kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 4 Mata 2020, Minisiteri y’Ubuzima mu Rwanda yagaragazaga ko umubare w’abanduye coronavirus umaze kugera ku 102, mu gihe ku isi hose basaga miliyoni imwe. Bane nibo bamaze gusezererwa mu bitaro mu Rwanda.

Title: Icyo Imana idushakaho muri ibi bihe bya Pasika
Body:
Bavandimwe Kristu Yezu akuzwe, ku Cyumweru cya Mashami twibuka kandi tugahimbaza igihe Nyagasani Yezu yasesekaye mu murwa wa Yeruzalemu, akakirwa nk’Umwami koko, agatambagizwa bikomeye, agakomerwa amashyi, akavugirizwa impundu akaririmbirwa. Nyamara icyo gihe nticyarambye kuko abamutambagije nibo bamuhindukanye bidatinze ngo nabambwe nabambwe!
Bavandimwe Kristu Yezu akuzwe, ku Cyumweru cya Mashami twibuka kandi tugahimbaza igihe Nyagasani Yezu yasesekaye mu murwa wa Yeruzalemu, akakirwa nk’Umwami koko, agatambagizwa bikomeye, agakomerwa amashyi, akavugirizwa impundu akaririmbirwa. Nyamara icyo gihe nticyarambye kuko abamutambagije nibo bamuhindukanye bidatinze ngo nabambwe nabambwe!
Iki cyumweru kandi kitwinjiza mu cyumweru gitagatifu aho tuzirikana ku mateka y’ugucungurwa kwacu, cyane cyane mu minsi nyabutatu ibanziriza Pasika: Uwa Kane Mutagatifu aho turarikirwa kuzazirikana ku isangira rya nyuma n’umwami wacu Yezu Kristu. Ku wa Gatanu Mutagagatifu nk’umunsi w’ubutayu no kuzirikana ku mpamvu yo kwifatanya bucece na Yezu Kristu muri iyo nzira y’umusaraba izatugeza ku gutsinda. Naho ku wa Gatandatu mutagatifu duhimbaza igitaramo cya Pasika kitwinjiza mu kuzirikana ku Izuka rya Kristu ari naryo shingiro ry’ukwizera kwacu, kuko nk’uko Pawulo Mutagatifu abivuga “niba Kristu atarazutse, ukwemera kwacu kwaba ari amanjwe” (Reba 1Kor 15, 17).
Iki gihe kandi cyo kwitegura Pasika, kije mu gihe isi yose iri mu bihe bidasanzwe byo guhangana n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, aho abantu bakomeje gupfa ari benshi hirya no hino ku isi. Ni igihe cyo kwiyinjiramo buri wese ukwe kugira ngo azabashe guhimbaza Pasika neza. Kimwe mu byatuma duhimbaza Pasika neza ni ukwisuzuma, tukamenya ko turi abanyabyaha, tugasaba imbabazi Imana n’abo twahemukiye kandi buri wese akiyunga n’umutima we.
Igihe cy’ububabare cyegereje, Yezu yajyanye na bake mu bigishwa be ku musozi gusenga. Arababwira ati “Umutima wanjye urashavuye byo gupfa, Nimugume aha kandi mube maso hamwe nanjye mu gihe ngiye gusenga” (Mt 26, 38). Yezu agarutse yasanze basinziriye, abwira umwe muri bo witwa Petero ati“Ni ibyo byawe, ntiwashoboye kuba maso nibura isaha imwe hamwe nanjye!” (Mt 26, 41). Yezu yarebye ukuntu bananiwe arababwira ati“Umutima w’Umuntu uharanira ibyiza ariko umubiri ukagira imbaraga nke”!
Ni nk’aho yakavuze ati “Yooo! Nabo bifuzaga kugumana nanjye muri ibi bihe ariko dore barananiwe”. Yarongeye ajya gusenga ubwa kabiri na none ariko asiga abakanguye ngo bagerageze babe maso. Agarutse nabwo asanga barasinziriye, umugono ari wose! Icyakora arabihorera kuko ngo yabonaga amaso yabo aremerewe! Asubirayo ubwa gatatu, agarutse asanga bamwe basinziriye abandi bakirwana n’ibitotsi, arababwira ati “Noneho nimusinzire muruhuke”! Nuko abaguma iruhande kugeza igihe bukereye. (Reba Mt 26, 45-46).
Turasabwa kugumana n’Imana mu isengesho
Muri ibi bihe bikomeye Nyagasani aradusaba kumuguma iruhande. Tukagumana na we nibura isaha imwe mu isengesho buri munsi aho turi mu ngo zacu, kugira ngo tutagwa mu bishuko bitandukanye: Kwiheba, kugira ubwoba, kwiba, kwandavura, ubugugu, ubwikunde, intonganya n’ibindi.
Turi abanyantegenke:
Imana izi neza intege nke zacu, iyo tunaniwe iratwihanganira. Kugira ngo tuzahimbaze Pasika neza, twisuzume tutihenze, twicuze ibyaha byacu kuko burya turi abanyantegenke nk’uko Pawulo Mutagatifu abivuga ati“Kuko icyiza nifuza ntagikora, naho ikibi ntashaka akaba aricyo nkora” (Rm 7, 19). Iki gihe turimo ni icyo kwigorora n’Imana, n’abavandimwe bacu ndetse no kwiyunga n’umutima wacu. Turi abanyantege nkeya kandi buri wese yifitemo umusemburo wo gusenyuka kwe. Twicuze, koko burya nta mahoro y’umunyabyaha udashaka kubivamo.
Icyubahiro cy’isi ni icy’akanya gato
Byinshi mu bicumuza bene muntu ni ugushakisha ubutunzi, gushakisha imbaraga zishingiye ku cyubahiro n’ibindi.
Igihe turimo kirimo isomo rikomeye: Yezu yatemberejwe mu mujyi wa Yeruzalemu, bamuririmbira ngo “Hozana, nihasingizwe uje mu izina rya Nyagasani”! Ngo “niwe Mwami wa Israel, inkomoko nyacyubahiro ya Dawudi”! Nyamara ntibyamaze kabiri, baramushushubikanye ngo akwiye urwo gupfa! Maze abo yagaburiye bagahaga bamwicisha inzara, abo yahaye Divayi nziza bagatangara bo bamuha Divayi irura! Abo yakijije uburwayi bamutera inguma umubiri wose!
 Ibyo dukora byose dushakishe ubukungu mu ijuru kuko isi yo ntigira inyiturano. Tubitse ubukungu bwacu aho imungu zitagera. Ubibuko nyabwo buri mu mutima wita ku bandi kandi udategereje gushimwa nabo.
Iki ni igihe cyo kubabazwa n’ikibi twakoze
Bavandimwe, iki ni igihe cyo kubabazwa n’ikibi cyaturutse mu ruhande rwacu. Usanga kenshi hari igihe twigira “abahigi b’ibyaha by’abandi”, tukabangukirwa no gucira abandi imanza aho kwikebuka ngo buri wese yirebe atihenze maze ababazwe n’ikibi yakoze kabone n’iyo nta wundi muntu waba ukizi.
 Hari abantu twakuraho isomo dusanga mu Ivangili ya Matayo hari hati “Umutegeka hamwe n’abasirikare be barindaga Yezu, babonye umutingito w’isi n’ibyari bibaye, bagira ubwoba bwinshi baravuga bati: “Uyu koko yari Umwana w’Imana!” (Mt 26, 54).
Dusenge:
Nyagasani Mana, wavuze ko abakomera ku Ijambo ryawe batazakorwa n’ikimwaro (Reba Yh 8, 51 na Zab 22), muri ibi bihe twugarijwe n’icyorezo gikomeye cya Coronavirus gihuriranye no kwitegura Pasika, duhe umutima wo kukugarukira, umutima wo kwiyunga nawe, umutima wo kwiyunga n’abavandimwe bacu ndetse no kwiyunga natwe ubwacu. Turi abantu ntabwo turi abamalayika, aho twaguye tubyutse dukomeze urugendo. Aho turwaye udukize, ni wowe Muganga utagira gisumbwa, tabara abana bawe bari mu kato cyangwa ubundi bubanare buzwi nawe wenyine, uri imbabazi zimenya imbabare.
Turinde ubwoba no kwiheba. Bana natwe ibihe byose, by’umwihariko muri iki cyumweru gitagatifu twinjiyemo maze uko dusangiye ububabare bwa hano ku isi, tuzanasangire nawe ibyishimo by’izuka. Tubisabye twizeye, ku izina ry’Imana Data na Mwana na Roho Mutagatifu, Amen!
Padiri Victor AMERIKA

Title: Gisèle Precious yasohoye indirimbo ‘Mbega Urukundo’ yibutsa ab’Isi ko hari uwabitangiye
Body:
Umuhanzikazi Nsabimana Gisèle Precious yashyize hanze indirimbo yise ‘Mbega Urukundo’ yifitemo ubutumwa bushimangira ko Yesu yitangiye Isi kugira ngo akize abayituye ibyaha byabo.
Umuhanzikazi Nsabimana Gisèle Precious yashyize hanze indirimbo yise ‘Mbega Urukundo’ yifitemo ubutumwa bushimangira ko Yesu yitangiye Isi kugira ngo akize abayituye ibyaha byabo.
Gisèle Precious ari mu bahanzi bahimbaza Imana b’igitsina gore mu babarizwa mu Itorero rya ADEPR, bari gukora cyane. Indirimbo ye nshya ‘Mbega Urukundo’ yatunganyijwe na Producer Clement The Guitarist mu buryo bw’amajwi.
Uyu muhanzi yabwiye IGIHE ko yayanditse ashaka gutanga ubutumwa bwibutsa abantu urukundo Yesu yakunze ab’Isi kandi badakwiriye.
Yagize ati “Ni indirimbo nziza ikangurira abantu gufatanyiriza hamwe kuririmba urwo rukundo kugira ngo n’abatararumenya barumenye!’’
Gisèle Precious yavuze ko mu gihe hakomeje gukazwa ingamba zo kurwanya Coronavirus yugarije Isi, bikwiye ko baniyubaka mu buryo bw’umwuka.
Ati “Turusheho no gufata izindi ngamba zubaka ubugingo bwacu turushaho kwegere Imana, gusenga cyane kandi ntiduterwe ubwoba n’ibiriho ngo bitwibagize n’ibindi bikomeye Imana yatunyujijemo ntibiduhitane.’’
Mu mishinga ye, Gisèle Precious arateganya gukora indirimbo nyinshi no gutegura ibitaramo mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu bijyanye n’uko Uwiteka azamushoboza.
Izina rya Gisèle Precious ryatangiye kumenyekana mu ruhame mu 2018 ubwo yatumirwaga mu gitaramo cyo gutangiza iserukiramuco rya Gikirisitu ryiswe “Rabagirana Worship Festival” ku wa 4 Ugushyingo 2018.
Icyo gihe uyu mukobwa waserukanye gitari ye, akayicuranga bya gihanga yishimiwe na benshi, banyurwa n’umuziki we.
Tariki ya 16 Kamena 2019 yongeye kwandika amateka mashya mu rugendo rwe rwa muzika kuko nibwo yakoze igitaramo cye cya mbere cyiswe “Imbaraga Live Concert” cyabereye kuri ADEPR Gisenyi.
Nsabimana Precious yatangiye kuririmba akiri umwana. Urugendo rw’ubuhanzi ku giti cye yarutangiye mu 2017. Asengera muri ADEPR Gatenga ndetse umubyeyi we ni pasiteri muri iri torero. Kuva atangiye umuziki amaze gushyira hanze indirimbo zirindwi zirimo “Imbaraga z’amasengesho”, “Urampagije”, “Niwe”, “Inzira zayo” n’izindi.
Mu mwaka ushize kandi Precious yatangije Anointed Band, itsinda rihuriyemo abakobwa n’abagore bahimbaza Imana. Yaserutse bwa mbere iririmba muri Rabagirana Worship Festival yabereye muri Dove Hotel ku Gisozi ku wa 10 Ugushyingo 2019.
 	Umva Mbega Urukundo ya Gisèle Precious

Title: Burya dusangiye gupfa no gukira!
Body:
Hari benshi barajwe ishinga no gushakisha inkomoko y’iki cyorezo cya coronavirus. Byaba bituruka ku makosa cyangwa ubushake bw’umuntu, byaba bikomoka ku mihindagurikire y’ikirere cyangwa ku misazire y’isi nk’uko bamwe babivuga, icyo tubona ni uko twese dusangiye gupfa no gukira.
Hari benshi barajwe ishinga no gushakisha inkomoko y’iki cyorezo cya coronavirus. Byaba bituruka ku makosa cyangwa ubushake bw’umuntu, byaba bikomoka ku mihindagurikire y’ikirere cyangwa ku misazire y’isi nk’uko bamwe babivuga, icyo tubona ni uko twese dusangiye gupfa no gukira.
Iki cyorezo cyadushyize ku munzani w’ubuzima kandi cyitwereka ko iby’ingenzi ari ibyo duhuje kurusha ibidutandukanya.
Abakomeye n’aboroheje, abami n’abatware bahuje icyifuzo n’aboro! Twese turasaba Imana kubaho. Intambara zari zarananiranye zerekanye ko burya turwaniraga ubusa, nazo ziraceceka! Twese twabonye akanya ko kwitekerezaho, maze tubona ko dusangiye gupfa no gukira koko!
Dusangiye gukira: Twese twaremwe mu ishusho y’Imana kandi iduha Ubuhanga, Ubwenge, ubwigenge n’umutima ukunda kugira ngo tubashe gukora ugushaka kwayo, harimo kugenga ibindi biremwa no kubana neza mu rukundo n’abandi. Twese twaremewe gusingiza Imana no kubana nayo (Reba Yh 17).
Dusangiye gupfa: Dusangiye gupfa nk’uko dusangiye ingaruka z’icyaha cy’inkomoko. Kuva ubwo Muntu yasuzuguraga Imana, agashaka kunganya ubwenge nayo ndetse akumva ashaka no kuyirusha, Imana yamusubije mu mwanya we ariko iranamuhana. Bityo aba asemeye bene muntu twese.
Uhoraho abwira umugore ati “Nzongera imiruho yawe igihe utwite, maze uzabyare ubabaye, uzahora wifuza umugabo wawe”. None se Babyeyi babyaye, ni nde wabyaye atababaye cyangwa atamennye amaraso? Kuva ubwo twese dusangiye gupfa no gukira. (Intg 3, 16).
 Uhoraho abwira n’umugabo ati ‘Kuko wansuzuguye, Umugati wawe uzawurya wiyushye akuya kugeza ubwo uzasubira mu gitaka, kuko ari cyo wavuyemo. Koko rero uri umukungugu, kandi uzasubira mu mukungugu”. (Intg 3, 17-19). Ibi se ntitubihuriyeho, ntiturya ari uko twiyushye akuya? Nyamara tujye twibuka ko dusangiye gupfa no gukira.
Iki gihe rero si igihe cyo gushakisha inkomoko y’icyorezo gusa ahubwo ni igihe cyo gufashanya nk’abahuje gupfa no gukira. Niba twese duhuje ibibazo niduhuze no gushakisha ibisubizo, cyane cyane twita ku mbabare n’abatishoboye. Ni igihe kandi cyo kugendera mu gushaka kw’Imana!
Bavandimwe nk’uko tubibonye umubabaro n’ibyago byacu byakomotse ku gusuzugura Imana; aho umuntu wa mbere yihaye gushaka kuresha nayo! N’uyu munsi hari ibyo tubona ukabona ko Muntu yagiye ashyira imbere ubuhanga, ubwenge bwe ndetse agakora ibyo yishakiye aho kugira ngo byose bigende uko Imana yabigennye.
Dukomeze gusenga twizeye ngo Imana idukize ibyaha byacu kandi iturengere idukize iki cyorezo.
Dusenge Nk’uko Uhoraho yabibwiye Dawudi ati “Ntacyo ntagukoreye niba kandi bidahagije nzongeraho n’ibindi (2 Sam 12, 7-8) Natwe, turagushimira Nyagasani kubera ibyiza byose wadukoreye ariko kandi tugarutse imbere yawe n’umutima unyuzwe nabyo, tunagusaba ngo wongereho n’ibindi byiza, utugirire Impuhwe maze udutabare ikibi cyugarije isi. Ni wowe wivugiye ngo igihe kirageze ngo ndengere umuryango wanjye: turengere nk’uko warengeye Daniyeli ukamukura mu rwobo rw’intare zishonje, nk’uko warengeye abayisiraheli bakurikiranywe n’ingabo za Farawo.
 Dutabare nk’uko watabaye Pahulo mu Nzu y’imbohe, maze inzugi z’uburoko zigafunguka, turwanirire ishyaka nk’uko warirwaniriye abavandimwe batatu (Meshaki, Sadaraka na Abedenego) baciriwe urwo gupfa, bakarohwa mu muriro ugurumana ariko ukohereza umumalayika wawe agatemberana nabo mu muriro, maze bose bagatangarira izina ryawe. Ubwo twiyemeje kukugarukira no kongera kukubera abana, ngwino utubere Imana, natwe tuguhoranire icyubahiro hejuru ya byose. Ku bwa Yezu Kristu Umwami wacu. Amen”.

Title: Amasengesho dusengera mu rugo muri ibi bihe Imana irayumva?
Body:
Mu ivanjili Ntagatifu uko yanditswe na Matayo (Mt 9, 27-30), haranditse ngo “Muri icyo gihe, Yezu akomeza kugenda, impumyi ebyiri ziramukurikira, zisakuza ziti Mwana wa Dawudi tugirire impuhwe!
